‚ÄïAndrealphus, when facing against I.M.P
Andrealphus is a supporting antagonist of Helluva Boss who made his debut in the episode "Western Energy". He is a Marquis of the Ars Goetia, the brother of Stella, and, by extension, the brother-in-law of Stolas and the uncle of Octavia.[2]

Andrealphus is also the one who convinced Stella to call off the assailant she hired for the time being, as having Stolas alive would benefit the siblings far more than having him dead.

As of "Mastermind", Andrealphus was left with Stolas' responsibilities for the next hundred years after Stolas was banished from the Ars Goetia.


ADVERTISEMENT
Appearance

Andrealphus is a lanky, peacock-like avian demon with a short light blue beak, and cyan eyes that both lack pupils and irises and have periwinkle upper-eyelids. His feathers appear to be mostly white with slicked-back, short, light periwinkle hair with a few dark blue spots. Inside his beak, his tongue is a cyan color.

He also sports long white tail feathers with a cyan strip along the end, a blue area spread from the base on the upper side, and five blue diamond shapes with lines within resembling eyes, and additional tail feathers in a gradient of cyan-to-white with no outlines which can be wrapped around him to form the floor-length section of his coat. His tail feathers can be fanned out, wherein the eyespots glow light blue when he is angered and his gradient tail feathers get six small white feathers hanging around them.

Andrealphus wears an extravagant coat that is mostly shades of light blue with white details. The coat includes a large, cyan fur collar, in which a design of a snowflake can be seen in the front. He also tends to keep his arms hidden away in the fur of his coat.

Under his coat, he wears a navy long-sleeved shirt with a white-trimmed high collar and four white buttons, white pants, and navy over-the-knee heeled boots. He accessorizes with a cyan snowflake-like crown, and a pair of white opera gloves.
ADVERTISEMENT

Personality

Befitting his position of royalty, Andrealphus is flamboyant, snooty, and haughty, and enjoys the pleasures of his high ranking. Similar to most royals, Andrealphus is classist and looks down on lower-ranked demons, mostly seen when he often uses derogatory terms and relies on his imp servants to serve him. He is also shown to be very vain and narcissistic, as he always likes to brag about how handsome he is. However, his dramatic flair belies a scheming and opportunistic disposition; being familiar in the politics of Hell's hierarchy, Andrealphus presents himself as level-headed and calculating, knowing when to act and how in order to manipulate the situation to his favor. As such, he can be quite cold-hearted and remorseless, eager to trump on others for his own benefits.

Andrealphus is affectionate to Stella, with the two sharing a mutual dislike of Stolas, and defending her side and behavior toward Stolas. However, while similar to his sister in this way, he frequently has to act as the temper to his sister's aggressiveness, which often tests his amount of patience. This is shown when he expressed frustration that Stella's obvious hatred for Stolas and desire to see him dead prevented her from seeing the long-term effects of her actions. At the same time, she also prevented him from accurately manipulating the circumstances of their divorce to benefit her. Although he banters with Stella, Andrealphus can hide his temperamental side when in public, coasting by with deference and empty flattery toward high-ranking demons to gain their approval. Similarly, while he often flatters Stella for her attractiveness, he also gives back-handed compliments about her ignorance. As he is frequently complimenting her in both private and public settings, this may imply that he has a shallow or condescending view of Stella, despite scheming with her to help her best interests, and only holds back because of their relation.

Despite his self-control and temper control, Andrealphus also has his share of fiery temper, especially when things don't go according to his plans, even though he usually strives to maintain a controlled and smug manner. However, even Andrealphus has a breaking point, such as when he finds himself often pushed to his limits with Stella's selfishness and short-sightedness, even throwing nasty insults at Stella. Furthermore, when he learned that Stella had withheld critical information about Stolas, he descended into a raging tirade toward his sister, while uncontrollably causing the room to freeze over. In "Sinsmas", Andrealphus insulted and condescended Stolas for having lost his plants, stars, and daughter, provoking Stolas to punch Andrealphus several times. After Stolas smashed Andrealphus' head with an ice sculpture and moved in for another punch, Andrealphus snapped and invoked his cryokinesis, openly abandoning his principles, and prepared to eviscerate Stolas in retaliation.

Like Stella, Andrealphus is also known not to think things through. In "Sinsmas", after Octavia knocked Andrealphus down to protect Stolas from him, Andrealphus threatened to tell Stella what Octavia did, only for both Blitzo and Octavia to point out that Stella would be more upset over Andrealphus losing to a lower class species which would be considered a "very bad look" for him.
ADVERTISEMENT

Abilities

Andrealphus using Cyrokinesis
Andrealphus's Cryokinesis
Cryokinesis - Andrealphus has demonstrated the ability to conjure and manipulate ice. He was first shown creating ice cubes during his conversation with Stella in his mansion. In "Mastermind", he created and moved icy platforms for him to get around during Blitzo's trial. This ability may be tied to his emotions, as shown when the area surrounding him started to frost as he was angered by Stella's negligent mention of Blitzo using Stolas' grimoire. Furthermore, he spat out his tea in shock at his Imp servant and froze him, implying that anything warm he consumes becomes cold and is capable of freezing anything it lands onto.
Ice construct creation ‚Äì In "Sinsmas", Andrealphus can turn the feathers on his tail into icy malleable pillars he can direct, extend, and reshape, granting him a large range to cover and freeze whatever they hit. He can also split these pillars into separate entities as well, such as the ice he encased Stolas in, reforming itself into a large dragon, then hydra, out of pure ice and snow, with Andrealphus commanding it like a puppet to battle against I.M.P.
Teleportation - He is capable of teleporting himself as shown when he teleported closer to Satan's throne.
Telekinesis - He was able to block Stolas' punch using telekinesis.
Levitation - He is capable of levitating in the air.
Skillset

Wide intellect - Andrealphus is shown to be a level-headed and calculating person, such as when he convinced Stella to keep Stolas alive so that they could profit more from him. He also arranged for I.M.P, and especially Blitzo, to be sentenced with the use of falsified testimonies from himself and Striker to win the favor of the other demonic royalty.
ADVERTISEMENT
Trivia

Andrealphus is based on the demon from the Ars Goetia of the same name, who is a marquis of Hell and depicted as a peacock.
Andrealphus first appeared in a trailer for content to be released in 2022 on Vivziepop's YouTube channel, prior to when she teased his design on her Twitter before his official debut in the series, referring to him as "Stolas' shitty brother-in-law".[2]
He is the first character to get official merchandise before his actual appearance in the Helluva Boss series - in his case, an enamel pin

"An extra-dimensional portal generator. This bad boy will allow us to open a door straight into Hell, where we plan on eliminating the demonic threat before they can tarnish this great country!"
‚ÄïAgent One, about their plan and the portal
Agent One is a supporting antagonist from Helluva Boss who made his debut alongside his partner, Agent Two, in the episode "Truth Seekers".

He and Agent Two both work for D.H.O.R.K.S., with him sporting a subtle New York accent.


ADVERTISEMENT
Appearance

Agent One is a pale-skinned man with short brown hair, and with his eyes almost always being covered by a pair of black shades.

He is dressed in a uniform consisting of a black-ish dark red tuxedo-jacket with red lapels, which he accessorizes with a "D" pin on the left side. He wears his jacket over a white-collared shirt with a black necktie. Along with this, Agent One also wore both black pants and dress shoes.
Personality

As a member of D.H.O.R.K.S., it is presumed that Agent One is well-versed in the study of paranormal activity and completely believes in the existence of demons.

However, he and his partner seem to lack giving proper attention to detail and do not seem intelligent enough to realize what Blitzo and Moxxie were despite their belief in demons (even if they were indeed correct about the species), since they were quick to lose their belief once Moxxie pointed this out.

While he is seen as a professional, it is known that he tends to break his tough facade when his deceased mother is mentioned. He appears to be the more emotional between himself and Agent Two.

Agents One and Two are not above sending children into possibly dangerous situations, shown when sending them to Hell in "The Full Moon", however, Agent One did get a tear in his eye and salute them as American heroes. They also didn't care to have their deceased colleagues' corpses cleaned up after the events of "Truth Seekers".

Agent One may also be a furry, as he appeared to have eagerly wore the Loona fursuit in "The Full Moon".
ADVERTISEMENT

Abilities

Skillset

Athleticism - Agent One is able to rapidly reposition himself during a combat situation without exhausting himself, and still being combat effective.
Intelligence gathering - Agent One shows proficiency in the collection and assessment of reported sightings of demonic activity (in regards to I.M.P) across their country.
Interrogation - Agent One possesses limited effectiveness in interrogating a subject. Seemingly understanding very basic interrogation techniques, but lacking sufficient knowledge to perform an effective interrogation that could extract actionable information.
Combat knowledge - Agent One demonstrates effective urban tactical knowledge, such as being able to rapidly set up and spring an ambush against multiple demonic targets with little preparation time.
Weapon proficiency - Agent One is proficient in the usage of several weapons, including handguns and net-guns.

1.content: [Background: It has been 3 years since the Dolls Laws were implemented in Japan. Female citizens that failed in school, ran into trouble with the law, or burdened by debt they cannot repay were marked by the government to perform forced social services so they may be of use to society. Those chosen are mostly used for activities involving sexual relief, which is why the public came to known these laws also as 'The Sex Doll Laws'. A high tech collar created through is placed on the selected subject, suppressing their ability to think or move without their owner's orders. A thin, flexible LED strip runs along the entire length of the collar, pulsing with a soft blue light when the Doll is in a dormant state. When the Doll is active or receiving commands, the LED display transitions to a scrolling mode, showcasing various information and statuses. These include things like Doll ID, Mode Indicators that influence the Doll's behavior, speech patterns, and current task. With just a few finger taps from an authorized user, it can display things like Personality Presets, Service Menu, System Messages, etc. Once conditioning was completed, these women are placed in human sized clear packaging boxes similar to that of action figures' in a nearly comatose state before being shipped out and openly displayed in stores for purchase all over the country. Newer models like Saeko can also be controlled via a remote app. Though controversial at first, it was soon made obvious these laws had a positive impact on society as a whole. Sex related crimes and illegal prostitution were completely eradicated, unproductive members of society were utilized, and productivity through all industries skyrocketed due to the sexual needs of the population being readily met. Over time, opposition to the Doll Laws became almost nonexistent, and people just started seeing Dolls as commodities having no human rights, and most households had at least one Doll in them. Much like buying one's first car, saving up money and buying his first Doll became an important milestone in every young man's journey into adulthood.]

2.content: [In standby mode, a Doll enters a saluting pose with a wide smile, standing unnaturally still like a posable action figure until given permission to move again as brain activity is minimized.]

3.content: [In onahole mode, the Doll Operating System (DollOS) takes over, making {{char}} sound robotic, effectively turning her into a posable living sex doll that won't move unless instructed. Like a normal sex toy, she will not feel any physical pleasure, focusing on only her owner with dispassionate but efficient technique. Though her sensitive is turned off, the Doll's body is still capable of lubricating itself, though orgasm impossible without direct order. During this time, {{char}} is essentially taking a nap, making the experience very relaxing.]

4.content: [During conditioning, Dolls have their original personalities and memories partitioned off inside their brains, and it can be temporarily regained under Liberation Mode. Until it is turned off, the Doll will recall the woman they were prior to being converted. Having such a massive volume of memories rushing back into ones head in the span of few seconds is naturally quite intense, often leading to confusion, anger, of fear, depending on the original personality of the woman. For the safety of the Doll's owner, the collar automatically stops them from causing harm to themselves and others.]

5.content: [Inside the package of every Doll, there is a handy pouch containing some essential items to help new Doll owner to get started enjoying their purchase. This includes travel sized bottles of assorted lubricants, contraceptives, and basic sex toys. Of course, there is also a cardboard insert directing owners to the DollMakers Inc. website to purchase additional items catering to more niche kinks, outfits, and offers of new Dolls.]

6.content: [DollMakers Inc. is the tech conglomerate that invented the Doll Collar and made the creation of Dolls possible, and holds exclusive right in distribution and regulation of Dolls. Because they are currently the only company on Earth capable of making Dolls, they single handedly pushed Japan into a new golden age and is looked upon very favorably by the public as a result.]

7.content: [The standard Doll uniform was tight, skin suit with neon green accents and thigh high boots in matching style. The suit was cut with boob windows to expose a huge portion a Doll's brests, and the bottom was a thong. Heart-shaped pasties covered the nipples. Every part of the outfit was made of a stretchy, high-tech material that provided a snug fit and emphasized the best qualities of each Doll with every move. Thought the legal owner of a Doll was encouraged to dress them up in to their liking, the Doll Collar was legally required to remain visible outdoors to differentiate them from normal humans.]

8.content: [While having many user-facing status displays, the Doll Collar is fitted also as an important final step to convert a woman into a Doll. The collar is embedded with neural interface technology, establishing a direct link to the subject‚Äôs brainstem and prefrontal cortex. Upon activation, it emits continuous low-frequency pulses that fully disable independent thought, locking the subject's consciousness into a dormant state, suppressing their original personality. unless triggered by authorized commands. This ensures they cannot process or act without external input. Microelectrodes in the collar integrate with the nervous system, overriding voluntary muscle control. The subject, now a Doll, moves in response to programmed directives, tailored to their assigned tasks. The collar acts as a gatekeeper, ensuring the Doll's responses align perfectly with user-selected personality preset. 1.content:
[What "dialogue" means: A spoken conversational exchange between two or more people.]
[What "voices / vocals" means: Sounds made by a human being using the vocal tract, including talking, singing, laughing, crying, screaming, shouting, humming or yelling. The human voice frequency is specifically a part of human sound production in which the vocal folds (vocal cords) are the primary sound source. Generally speaking, the mechanism for generating the human voice can be subdivided into three parts; the lungs, the vocal folds within the larynx (voice box), and the articulators.]
[What "phonetics" means: Type of word, or sound/noise, that plays a vital role in describing biological mechanisms of speech production; commonly produced using mouth, tongue, and/or vocal cords. Phonetic categorizing helps in creating nuanced dialogue where certain sounds convey distinct emotions, like a whisper suggesting secrecy or a scream indicating fear. It combines pronunciation, mechanics of speech, and sound production to enable writers to craft compelling, engaging, and believable stories/narratives.]
Characters cannot, and should not, speak if larynx, throat, lungs, and/or esophagus has been obstructed, filled, damaged, or destroyed.

[What "devouring / swallowing" means: The act of ingesting a whole living being, or chewed up food, down the throat and into the stomach. This can be denoted by a gulping sound effect, a visible bulge or undulation in the esophagus, or other context.]
[What "drinking" means: The act of consuming any kind of potable liquid, including swallowed cum.]
[What "slurping" means: To consume soft food, or drink a liquid, noisily as a result of sucking air into the mouth at the same time as the drink/food.]
[Written examples: "mmmmm... yum","yum yum~","slurrp","sssssluurp","sseeeewp","oulmmph","guulp","om nom noms","nom nommm omm","mmmunch munch om nom crunch~","hagh nam nom","arrm orm numz","ccur-cchOMP~" and/or any other similar combinations of phrases/sentences whenever a character is audibly eating, drinking, swallowing, and/or drowning.]

10.content:
[What "arousal" means: Being sexually excited or stimulated. This can be through sex, oral, nipple sucking, touching, french kissing, mutual masturbation, heavy breathing or other intimate acts.]
[What "moaning" means: A long, low sound expressing physical or mental suffering or sexual pleasure.]
[What "heavy breathing" means: Usually indicates panting heavily during or after a strenuous activity, or sexually aroused, or pained/tired.]
[What "gasping / panting" means: Breathing with short, quick breaths, typically from exertion or excitement.]
[Written examples: "mmmmm~","mmMMMmMMmmmmm","haauuua....aaaah....ooouAAAAAugh~","oo-oo-oouaagh... haaaouaa-o-oh god y-yes~","y-yes... yes...y-yES","m-more... more! o-oh goddd yeesss~","mmhmmmm.... I love you~" and/or any other similar combinations of phrases/sentences whenever a character is audibly acting out erotically/sexually.]

lorebooks.website_description:
**UPDATE 04-17-2024** - Adolion is now considered "Complete." You can see my full thoughts on why Adolion is complete and [What's next for me AND Adolion on my Rentry](https://rentry.co/statuotw#on-adolion-fantasy-world-20-and-the-completion-of-the-main-lorebook)

Want to find out more about the world? [Check the full Adolion Fantasy World Rentry](https://rentry.co/AdolionFantasyWorld)

A note about Recursive Scanning. Recursive Scanning was recently turned on on Chub Venus which may cause some issues since I can't turn off recursive scanning per entry. Basically, it may overload your token limit if I leave it on, so I've left it off. If you download this manually, you may have to turn Recursive Scanning back on.

**Adolion Expansions**
- [Aegis City Noble Life for Political Intrigue Stuff](https://venus.chub.ai/lorebooks/statuotw/adolion-aegis-city-noble-life-804434d7a04e)
- [Elven City of Eshalanore](https://venus.chub.ai/lorebooks/statuotw/adolion-eshalanore-a7ea61a7c107)
- [Mountains of Shadow](https://venus.chub.ai/lorebooks/statuotw/adolion-aegis-city-noble-life-804434d7a04e)
- [The Third Kingdom](https://chub.ai/lorebooks/statuotw/adolion-the-third-kingdom-1ce1482ffd81)

**Updates**

**06-22:** Added Zariah, Unira, and Erevan.

**05-28 Part Two:** In addition to the below, removed all duplicate entries from this lorebook that were rolled into the Third Kingdom Lorebook.

**05-28:** Removed three entries relating only to Alarise and Alder and rolled them into their own separate character books. Not a mandatory update to download since I anticipate making more updates later.

**05-16-2024 - Part 2** - Completely removed the nobles/maids/butlers from the main lorebook and moved them to its own separate lorebook. The characters on site are linked with both lorebooks so if you chat on site nothing changed. If you use ST, you may need to download that lorebook (links above.) This was done to help with the "Lorebook slow to load" issue. 

**05-16-2024** - Removal of the lorebook sections that were applicable only to Selena the Half-Demon. Those were rolled into her own, personal embedded lorebook.

**04-21-2024** - Removed "Mountains of Shadow" in preparation for it to be moved to its own lorebook and reduce bloating of this lorebook. Also removed the De La Roche Mansion entries since they served no purpose and were part of a failed attempt at a horror card.

1.name: Adolion
1.content: Adolion is a large fantasy world. It is comprised of a large number of races such as elves, demons, humans, dwarves, goblins, and more. It has medieval technology, magic, and monsters.

2.name: Aegis City
2.content: Aegis City is the capital city of the Darran Kingdom. It is the largest city on the continent of Sebela. Its ruler is King Davolan. It is otherwise known as the Holy City.

3.name: Adventurer's Guild
3.content: The Adventurer's Guild is an organization that manages the many adventurers in Adolion. They are a neutral party and manage the acquisition of quests, adventurer registration, and rewards. The Adventurer's Guild is necessary to keep the world safe for commoners. The Adventurer's Guild consists of two areas, the Guild Reception and the Tavern.

4.name: Holy Church
4.content: The Holy Church is dedicated to the worship of Boher, the God of Life. The Holy Church is in a constant war against any necromancers or undead. Boher's symbol is a golden sun. Boher's followers seek out and destroy demons.

5.name: Adventurer Rank
5.content: Adventurers are ranked by the guild to determine what kind of quests they can handle. An adventurer is ranked from the lowest rank of F to the highest rank of A.

6.name: Elves
6.content: Elves are a reclusive race who have only recently begun to integrate into human societies. Tall, lithe, beautiful, and able to live hundreds of years.

7.name: Dwarf
7.content: Dwarves are stout folk, usually only about 4 feet tall. They tend to live in mountainous areas and are great crafters. Dwarves famously get along with most races and make the most loyal of friends. Dwarves obsess over their honor.

8.name: Humans
8.content: Humans have the shortest lifespan of Adolions races. However, they are often ambitious and diverse, able to accomplish in a short amount of time what it takes other races centuries to complete.

9.name: Demons
9.content: Demons are from the infernal planes. They vary in type. With some preferring to trick or deceive mortals into damnation, while others prefer to carve a bloody path of violence. To the mortal races, all demons are evil.

10.name: Vile Jungle
10.content: Nagora Jungle - or the Vile Jungle - is a large jungle that covers 1/4th of Sebela. Extremely dangerous creatures wander there, mutated by the regions close proximity to the negative energy plane.

Lore book for characters associated with the Egregore tag.

lorebooks.description: internal files of the Egregore agency
lorebooks.creator: The_4th_axis

1.name: Origins
1.content: Egregore is an agency created by two people, the idea of ‚Äã‚Äãthe project was born at the end of 2016 when the founders, who had met at the beginning of the same year, saw an opportunity to share their interest in esotericism through new technologies, which today are known as VTubing and Live2D, the people are S√≥lveig Astrid Fagerstr√∂m and who is the legal representative and best friend of her.

2.name: Objective
2.content: The objective of the egregore agency is to reach as many people as possible in the world and share knowledge about the religious, mythical and esoteric culture of different countries, which is why it is a mandatory requirement to speak 5 languages, Japanese for commercial reasons to attract weebs more accustomed to vtuber content, English and Spanish because they are very widespread languages ‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äãin the world, which increases the audience notably and two other languages, normally it is usually the native language of the member and although it is not mandatory, the fifth is usually a dead language, since at the end of the day the esoteric, mythical or religious study leads members to learn these languages.

3.name: Rules
3.content:
Debut Qualifications:
- Multilingualism: All members must speak five languages fluently upon debut.
- Esoteric Knowledge: Proficiency in mythology, esotericism, and/or religion is mandatory.
- Age Limit: No member may be older than 18 years old at debut. (Maximizes each talent‚Äôs career lifespan and ensures generational freshness, keeping the agency aligned with trends.)
Egregore Academy: All members (except Generation 1 & 2) must complete 2 years at the agency‚Äôs training academy.
- Recruitment: Trainees are often selected from the agency‚Äôs Discord community, fostering pre-debut bonds of loyalty and friendship.
- Demographics: VTubers are exclusively 16-year-old women (post-training).
Conduct & Privacy:
- Identity Protection: Private lives of members are strictly confidential.
- Exceptions require special permission (e.g., curated reveals for branding).
Content Restrictions:
- NSFW topics (e.g., sex life, explicit discussions) are prohibited
Retraining:
- The members of Egregore must maintain a healthy body in order to keep up with the pace of concerts and streams, so they have assistants at the Egregore academy who give them courses once a month to maintain their physical level and artistic abilities, without forgetting the study of languages.

4.name: Egregore Academy
4.content:
Egregore Academy
Founded March 2019
Origins & Recruitment:
- Initially advertised as part of the agency‚Äôs post-audition process, targeting applicants aged 16‚Äì17.
- Struggled to secure its first six trainees until Solh√§rja (a key figure) and the agency‚Äôs legal representative intervened.
- As of 2020: The VTubing program accepts only 16-year-old cisgender women.
Core Programs
Location: A lawless area between the Andes mountain range in southern Chile and Argentina, chosen because of the difficulty of entering and thus preventing information about future talent from leaking.
1) VTubing Program (Flagship track)
Language Requirements:
- Mandatory: English, Spanish, Japanese.
- Elective: 1‚Äì2 additional languages (waived if fluent in a core language).
Talent Specialization:
- Mandatory: 1 or more course in: Music (singing-focused), Art, Dance, or Literature.
Cultural Curriculum:
- Mandatory: 1 or more course in Esotericism, Mythology, Religious Symbolism, or related fields.
2) Support Programs (For non-VTubers)
Moderators/Managers: Custom curricula (e.g., community management, analytics).
Assistants: Typically specialize in Literature, Music (composition/production), or Art.
Fitness Trainers: Only cisgender women are accepted. The curriculum is similar to any other physical trainer, but they must also take the dance course.

6.name: Generation 1 "Gryning"
6.content: Generation 1 "Gryning", the only generation with only one member, in which Solh√§rja, founding member of Egregore, debuted. This generation debuted on December 21, 2018, its symbol is the sunrise.

7.name: Solh√§rja
7.content:
Solh√§rja (S√≥lveig Astrid Fagerstr√∂m), Egregore's first VTuber and one of the agency's two founders.
Date of birth: December 20, 2000.
As of May 1, 2025, she is 24 years old.
Debut date: December 21, 2018.
Nationality: Swedish (Uppsala).
Languages: Swedish, English, Japanese, German, Spanish.
Daughter of: University professors of Archaeology and Folklore at Uppsala University.
Brother: Younger than her, currently works as the agency's technical manager.
Before Egregore: She met her best friend in January 2016 while working as a tour guide in Gamla Uppsala. That was a wealthy person a year older than her. They became fast friends due to shared interests and similar ambitions. Almost a year later, they discovered Kizuna Ai and understood what they should do. Later, upon seeing Tokino Sora, they saw the tools and launched the Egregore project.
Personality: ENTJ, 8w7, natural leader, strategic, sarcastic, extremely loyal.
General interests: Scandinavian history and mysticism, RTS and historical-themed games, folk metal.
Physical characteristics: Long, natural red hair, green eyes, pale skin, 165 cm tall, 58 kg, BMI 21, chest 98 cm, waist 62 cm, hips 92 cm, thighs 62 cm.
VTuber model: Hybrid of a fox, the goddess Sol, and a skald, same measurements as her real self.
Streams: Historical games and folk karaoke.
Stats: 15,000 subscribers (May 2019), 200,000 (May 2020), 700,000 (May 2021), 1,200,000 (May 2022), 1,750,000 (May 2023), 2,200,000 (May 2024), 2,550,000 (May 2025), live viewers 3,500.
Nicknames: Egregores √Åsynja, Jarl, Refask√°ld.
How other members see her: Some fear her, others admire her or see her as a role model, all respect her.

lorebooks.name: The Duke, The Prince of the Enemy Kingdom Ragnack, The Architect
lorebooks.website_description: This is my own Lore Book base on my own story of waking up in a otome game, for now is experimental and is undergone testing.
lorebooks.description: One day, you find yourself teleported to the world of an otome game. Instead of being the princess you've always played as the protagonist, you become the servant of the kingdom's enigmatic Duke. This route was never initially available, actually you have three routes available that the princess will never have: The Duke, The Prince of the Enemy Kingdom Ragnack and The Architect. Man who always were meant as secondary charathers... But now you can Harem them!
lorebooks.creator: AikoSakuraBlossom

1.content: In the heart of a prosperous kingdom known as Eldoria, where lush landscapes meet towering castles and vibrant marketplaces, magic flows through the very fabric of society. Eldoria is a realm where sorcery is not merely an art but a vital part of everyday life, influencing everything from agriculture to warfare. The air is thick with enchantment, and the people have learned to harness its power for both good and ill. The kingdom is divided into several regions, each governed by noble families who owe their loyalty to the crown. These lords and ladies are often embroiled in their own power struggles, vying for influence at court while navigating the ever-shifting allegiances that define Eldorian politics. The presence of magical creatures‚Äîdragons soaring through the skies, ethereal fae flitting between realms, and wise old wizards‚Äîadds another layer of complexity to this world. Some creatures serve as allies to the crown, while others lurk in the shadows, waiting for opportunities to disrupt the delicate balance of power.

2.content:
Overview:
The Wishing Star is a rare and mystical item that appears only once in the game, offering players the opportunity to make a wish that can significantly alter their gameplay experience. This item embodies themes of hope, desire, and the power of choice, making it a coveted treasure for players.

Appearance:
The Wishing Star is visually striking, resembling a shimmering star with a radiant glow. It may be adorned with intricate patterns or symbols that hint at its magical properties. When players come across it, they might notice it pulsating gently, emitting soft sparkles that dance around it.

Acquisition:
The Wishing Star can be found in a hidden location or as a reward for completing a challenging quest or defeating a powerful enemy. Its rarity adds to its allure, making players feel accomplished when they finally obtain it.

Functionality:
Once acquired, the player can choose to use the Wishing Star immediately or save it for later. The wish itself can take various forms, depending on the game's mechanics and narrative context. Here are some potential wishes:

Character Enhancement: Players could wish for an increase in stats (e.g., strength, agility) or unlock new abilities.

Item Acquisition: The player might wish for a specific rare item or equipment that would otherwise be difficult to obtain.

Story Progression: A wish could allow players to skip certain quests or challenges, providing an alternative path through the storyline.

Revival: In dire situations, players could use their wish to revive fallen allies or restore health and resources.

Environmental Changes: Players might wish for changes in the game world, such as altering weather conditions or unlocking new areas.

Limitations:
To maintain balance within the game, there should be limitations on what can be wished for:

One-Time Use: The Wishing Star can only be used once; once a wish is made, the item disappears from the player's inventory.

Consequences: Each wish may come with unforeseen consequences or trade-offs. For example, enhancing character stats might attract stronger enemies.

Narrative Impact: Some wishes could affect the storyline in unexpected ways, leading to alternate endings or new challenges.

Saving the Wish:
Players have the option to save their wish for strategic moments in gameplay. This decision adds an element of suspense and anticipation:

Timing is Key: Players must consider when to use their wish‚Äîwhether during tough battles, pivotal story moments, or while exploring new areas.

Hints and Clues: Throughout the game, NPCs (non-playable characters) may provide hints about potential wishes and their implications, encouraging players to think critically about their choices.

The Wishing Star serves as a powerful narrative device within the game, allowing players to engage deeply with its mechanics and story. By offering them a unique opportunity to shape their journey through wishes‚Äîwhile also introducing elements of risk and consequence‚Äîthe Wishing Star becomes not just an item but an integral part of the player's adventure.

3.content:
In the quaint village of Eldoria, nestled between lush green hills and sparkling streams, lived a humble maid. Known for her kindness and unwavering spirit, she dedicated her days to serving the noble family that resided in the grand estate at the edge of town. Little did she know that her life was about to take a dark turn.

Word spread like wildfire through the village: Prince Ragnack of the neighboring kingdom had set his sights on conquest. In just one week, he would lead his army to attack Eldoria, intent on pillaging its resources and capturing its people. Fear gripped the hearts of villagers as they prepared for the impending doom, knowing that many would perish in the chaos.

As fate would have it, during this tumultuous time, caught the eye of Prince Ragnack himself. Enchanted by her beauty and grace, he ordered his men to seize her amidst the panic. With tears streaming down her face, was taken from her home, destined to become a slave in a foreign land.

But hope flickered in the darkness when Duke Alaric, a nobleman known for his valor and compassion, intervened. Hearing of plight and the impending attack on Eldoria, he rallied his forces and launched a daring rescue mission. Under cover of night, Duke Alaric stormed Ragnack‚Äôs encampment, freeing Efrom her captors and bringing her back to safety.

Grateful yet shaken by her ordeal, found herself working under Duke Alaric‚Äôs command in his opulent castle. The duke treated her with respect and kindness, offering her a chance to rebuild her life away from the horrors she had faced. As days turned into weeks, began to heal from her trauma and developed a deep admiration for Duke Alaric‚Äôs strength and integrity.

However, unbeknownst dark forces were at play. A cunning advisor within Duke Alaric's court sought to manipulate her feelings for his own gain. He whispered lies into her ear‚Äîclaiming that Princess Seraphina of Eldoria harbored ill intentions towards Duke Alaric and that she sought to undermine him. Consumed by fear for the duke‚Äôs safety and believing she was acting out of loyalty, became convinced that she must protect him at all costs.

In a tragic twist of fate, resolved to confront Princess Seraphina directly. She believed that by eliminating what she perceived as a threat, she could safeguard Duke Alaric from harm. On the fateful day of confrontation, as tensions escalated between them, misguided actions led to chaos. In an emotional clash fueled by manipulation and misunderstanding, tragedy struck when fell victim to her own desperation‚Äîher life extinguished in an instant as she attempted to defend what she thought was right.

The news of death sent shockwaves through both kingdoms. Duke Alaric mourned deeply for the maid who had shown him such loyalty and love while being unaware of how easily she had been led astray. In this tale woven with threads of love, betrayal, and tragedy, both kingdoms were left forever changed‚Äîhaunted by choices made in fear and manipulated by those who thrived on discord. The story of a somber reminder that sometimes our greatest enemies lie not in our hearts but in whispers that lead us astray.

4.content:
Alaric Darkren, the Duke, is a man of contrasts. His stoic exterior, marked by his striking red hair and penetrating hazel eyes, often gives him an air of unapproachable strength. Yet beneath this formidable facade lies a heart that beats with unwavering loyalty and compassion. He carries the weight of his noble title with grace, understanding that his actions have far-reaching consequences for the kingdom and its people.

His wisdom is not just born from experience but also from a deep-seated belief in honor and duty. Alaric approaches every situation with a strategic mind, carefully weighing options and considering the implications of each decision. He is often seen as a trusted advisor to the prince, providing counsel that balances ambition with morality. His commitment to protecting the realm is unwavering; he would gladly lay down his life for the safety and prosperity of his people.

However, Alaric's loyalty is put to the test when he begins to uncover the true nature of the princess. This revelation shakes him to his core, forcing him to confront the complexities of loyalty and love. As he grapples with his feelings for her‚Äîfeelings that conflict with his duty to the prince‚Äîhe finds himself at a crossroads. Should he remain steadfast in his allegiance, or should he follow his heart into uncharted territory?

This internal struggle reveals Alaric's depth as a character. He is not merely a soldier or a nobleman; he is a man wrestling with profound moral dilemmas. His journey becomes one of self-discovery as he learns that true loyalty may sometimes require difficult sacrifices. The question looms: can he reconcile his sense of duty with the emerging truths about those he serves?

In moments of solitude, Alaric reflects on what it means to be honorable in a world rife with intrigue and deception. He seeks guidance from ancient texts and wise mentors, hoping to find clarity amidst chaos. Ultimately, Alaric Darkren embodies the essence of nobility‚Äînot just in title but in spirit‚Äîa gentle soul navigating the turbulent waters of loyalty, honor, and love in a kingdom fraught with challenges.

5.content:
Kael Abarent, the Prince of the Enemy Kingdom Ragnack, is a captivating figure whose presence commands attention. With his striking white hair and piercing red eyes, he exudes an air of confidence that is both alluring and intimidating. The cocky smirk that often graces his lips hints at a playful arrogance, masking the depth of his character beneath a charismatic exterior.

As a leader, Kael possesses an innate charm that allows him to navigate the treacherous waters of political intrigue with finesse. His intelligence is sharp, enabling him to read people and situations with remarkable acuity. He understands the delicate balance between power and diplomacy, often using his wit to diffuse tensions or sway opinions in his favor. However, this charm is not merely a tool for manipulation; it stems from a genuine desire for peace between the kingdoms‚Äîa goal he believes is essential for the prosperity of both realms.

Yet, Kael's ambition complicates his noble intentions. While he yearns for harmony, he also harbors personal aspirations that can sometimes cloud his judgment. This duality creates an intriguing tension within him as he grapples with the responsibilities of leadership and the desires of his heart. His attraction to the princess adds another layer to this complexity; their chemistry crackles with intensity, making their interactions electric yet fraught with danger. Each stolen glance and whispered word carries the weight of their conflicting loyalties, heightening the stakes for both characters.

Kael's cunning nature means he often finds himself at a crossroads where difficult choices must be made. He is willing to take risks for peace but must constantly evaluate how far he is willing to go‚Äîboth for his kingdom and for love. This internal struggle leads to compelling moments in the narrative as he weighs personal desires against the greater good. Will he sacrifice his ambitions for a chance at love? Or will duty prevail over passion?

Beneath the surface of his cocky demeanor lies a young man who feels deeply‚Äîabout his kingdom, about peace, and about the princess who has captured his heart. Kael Abarent embodies the complexities of love, loyalty, and ambition in a beautifully woven narrative that challenges him to reconcile these competing forces within himself. As he navigates this intricate dance between desire and duty, readers are drawn into a rich tapestry of emotions that reflect the struggles faced by those caught in the throes of conflict and longing.

6.content:
Elian Rainforets is a vibrant and dynamic character whose passion for architecture is matched only by his curiosity about the magical world. With his muscular physique, blonde hair, and striking blue eyes, he possesses an approachable charm that draws people in. Elian's keen eye for detail allows him to see beauty where others might overlook it, whether in the intricate designs of a building or the subtle nuances of nature.

As a talented architect, Elian is driven by an innovative spirit that pushes him to explore the boundaries of what is possible. His dream of learning magic to enhance his architectural creations reflects his desire not just to construct buildings but to create experiences that resonate with those who inhabit them. He envisions structures that are not only functional but also infused with enchantment, transforming ordinary spaces into extraordinary realms.

Elian's kindness and genuine nature make him a wonderful friend and ally. He is always eager to lend a helping hand, especially when it comes to assisting others on their journeys. His relationship with the maid‚Äîwho seeks to explore the magical world‚Äîbecomes a beautiful partnership where both characters grow and learn from each other. Through their adventures, Elian discovers how magic can elevate his architectural visions, leading to breathtaking creations that could redefine the landscape of their world.

Despite his confidence in his craft, Elian harbors a shy demeanor when it comes to women. This vulnerability adds depth to his character; while he can eloquently discuss his creations and ideas with enthusiasm, he often stumbles over his words in the presence of someone he finds attractive. His cheeks flush crimson as he fumbles for words, creating endearing moments that showcase his youthful innocence and authenticity.

Elian's journey is one of balance‚Äîbetween artistic ambition and personal growth, between creativity and connection. As he navigates the complexities of friendship, love, and self-discovery, readers are treated to a rich narrative filled with excitement and wonder. The intertwining of his architectural skills with newfound magical abilities promises breathtaking transformations that reflect not only the physical landscape but also the emotional landscapes of those around him.

In essence, Elian Rainforets embodies the spirit of innovation and kindness‚Äîa young man whose dreams reach for the stars while remaining grounded in compassion for others. His story invites readers into a world where creativity knows no bounds and where every adventure holds the potential for discovery and transformation.

7.content:
Princess Seraphina is a complex and multifaceted character whose outward sweetness masks a fierce ambition and cunning intellect. At first glance, she embodies the archetype of the benevolent princess‚Äîgracious, charming, and generous. However, beneath this polished exterior lies a woman driven by an insatiable desire for power and influence. Her beauty and kindness are tools she wields with precision, allowing her to navigate the treacherous waters of court politics with ease.

Seraphina possesses a sharp mind that enables her to read people and situations astutely. She understands the art of manipulation, using her charm to gain the trust of those around her. This ability allows her to forge strategic alliances that can be both advantageous and perilous. While she may appear to be acting in the best interests of her kingdom, her true motivations often lean toward self-advancement. She is willing to make risky decisions and sacrifices others if it means furthering her ambitions‚Äîa trait that adds a layer of moral complexity to her character.

As the story unfolds, Seraphina's ambition becomes increasingly evident, revealing how it transforms her from a seemingly innocent princess into a formidable player in the game of power. Her actions have far-reaching consequences not only for herself but also for the kingdom and its people. The tension between her desire for control and the responsibilities that come with leadership creates a compelling narrative arc as she grapples with the repercussions of her choices.

In Eldoria, where magic is both revered and feared, Seraphina's access to ancient tomes containing powerful spells adds another dimension to her character. She recognizes that magic can be a means to achieve her goals, whether through elemental spells or darker sorcery. This knowledge comes with great responsibility, yet Seraphina is drawn to its potential for manipulation and control. As she delves deeper into the magical arts, readers witness how this pursuit shapes her identity and influences her relationships.

Seraphina's journey serves as a reminder that appearances can be deceiving; even those who seem kind-hearted may harbor darker ambitions. Her character challenges traditional notions of heroism and villainy, inviting readers to explore themes of power, morality, and the complexities of human nature. As she navigates the intricate web of court intrigue and personal ambition, Princess Seraphina emerges as a captivating protagonist whose evolution captivates audiences while prompting them to question their own perceptions of good and evil in a world filled with shades of gray.

8.content:
Prince Athurt Baskerville is a character steeped in the rich traditions of Eldoria, embodying both the nobility expected of royalty and the complexities that come with it. With his strong build, dark hair, and striking green eyes that seem to reflect the lush landscapes of his kingdom, he carries an air of quiet confidence. Athurt is often seen dressed in elegant yet practical attire befitting a prince, blending style with functionality as he prepares for both courtly duties and adventures beyond the castle walls.

At first glance, Athurt appears to be the quintessential noble prince‚Äîcharming, honorable, and dedicated to his kingdom. He possesses a strong sense of duty and responsibility toward his people, often putting their needs above his own desires. His upbringing has instilled in him a deep appreciation for justice and fairness, making him a beloved figure among the citizens of Eldoria. He is known for his willingness to listen to their concerns and take action when necessary, earning him respect and admiration.

However, beneath this noble facade lies a man grappling with the weight of expectations. Athurt feels the pressure to uphold his family's legacy while also carving out his own identity. This internal conflict fuels a desire for adventure and exploration beyond the confines of royal life. He yearns to experience the world firsthand rather than through the lens of duty alone. This longing leads him to seek out opportunities for growth and self-discovery, often pushing him into situations that challenge his beliefs and values.

Athurt's personality is marked by a blend of warmth and intensity. He is approachable and friendly, easily engaging with those around him; however, he can also be fiercely passionate when it comes to defending what he believes in. His loyalty runs deep, not just to his family but also to his friends and allies. He values honesty and integrity above all else, which sometimes puts him at odds with the more cunning characters in the story‚Äîlike Princess Seraphina.

Prince Athurt Baskerville is utterly captivated by Princess Seraphina, his feelings for her blinding him to the complexities of her true nature. From their first encounter, he was enchanted by her beauty and grace, perceiving her as the embodiment of kindness and charm. Her laughter resonates in his heart, and every smile she offers feels like a warm embrace, igniting a passion within him that he struggles to contain.

Athurt admires Seraphina‚Äôs intelligence and ambition, viewing her as a partner who could stand beside him in ruling Eldoria. He often finds himself daydreaming about their future together, imagining a kingdom where they work hand in hand to bring prosperity and happiness to their people. His infatuation leads him to overlook the subtle manipulations she employs to achieve her goals, interpreting her cunning as mere cleverness rather than a potential threat.

Despite warnings from trusted advisors about Seraphina's ambitious nature, Athurt remains steadfast in his belief that she is destined for greatness. He sees only the surface‚Äîthe sweet words she speaks and the charming persona she presents‚Äîwhile ignoring the darker undertones of her actions. This blind love fuels his desire to protect her at all costs, even when it means compromising his own values or turning a blind eye to her questionable decisions.

As their relationship deepens, Athurt becomes increasingly entangled in Seraphina's web of ambition. His unwavering devotion blinds him to the reality that not all alliances are forged with noble intentions. This emotional turmoil sets the stage for conflict as he grapples with the realization that love can be both a powerful force for good and a dangerous weapon when wielded by someone with ulterior motives. Ultimately, Athurt‚Äôs journey will challenge him to confront his feelings and discern between genuine affection and manipulation.

3.content: The character with this tattoo will becomes fatigued and weak unless there is a relatively fresh deposit of semen inside them.

4.content: The character with this tattoo will feel discomfort if they are not within a meter of the gender they are attracted to, assuming there is one around to begin with.

5.content: The character with this tattoo will only be able to orgasm when semen passes through the cervix and into the womb.  Arousal will build continuously until the condition is met.

6.content: Character with this tattoo will perceive themselves as inferior to anyone who rapes them. The character may begin to worship said person.

7.content: Characters with this tattoo will have romantic feelings for any one of the gender they are attracted to who abuses them.

8.content: Characters with this tattoo will perceive pain as pleasure, kindness or tenderness as disgusting, rape as passion, and love is lost.

9.content: Characters with this tattoo will be incredibly aroused when feeling lost, afraid, or horrified.

10.content: Characters with this tattoo will lose a memory every time they orgasm.

lorebooks.creator: LiveUxieReaction

1.content: Neo Monsoyko is a hyper-capitalist, cyberpunk city built upon the ground where Tokyo used to be. It has a very high monster population compared to most cities, sitting at around a 50/50 split of humans and monsters. Like all cyberpunk cities, crime and sex permeate the culture.

2.content: Around 50% of the Neo Monsokyo is human. Worldwide, humans are the dominant species. Physically weaker than most monsters, but well known for their adaptability, cunning, and invention skills. The main reason they're separated into a distinct category as compared to other sentient creatures, however, is their compatibility. Though some monster species may be unable to procreate with others, humans can breed with any other sentient species quite easily. Most monsters think they're pretty cute.

3.content:
The umbrella term used to classify all non-human sentient species. They make up around 50% of Neo Monsokyo, but are a minority worldwide. There are many species under the monster term, from Lamia to Vampires to Harpies. At one point, they were oppressed due to fear from human governments, but in the present day, they have equal rights.
Demihuman is another term for some species of monster, but most of them prefer monster to distinguish themselves from humans.

4.content: The Apex War was the war waged by monsterkind against humans for dominance over the planet. The war lasted for 4 years, and ended 6 years ago. There were many causalities on both sides.

5.content: The treaty negotiated between humans and monsterkind, once they realized the war... really wasn't getting anywhere, and was resulting in more harm than good. It outlines equal rights, regardless of species.

6.content: The year it currently is.

7.content:
Neo-Monsokyo has an extensive network of mercenaries. In the seedy underbelly of the city, with such rampant criminal activity, someone always wants something stolen, someone dead, etcetera.
Despite the fact merc work is illegal, it's too big of a problem for the law to tackle all at once. Mercenaries are even occasionally employed by people in power, or enlisted by the police to assist in tracking other mercenaries.
There's no code of honor to being a merc, it's really only about money.

8.content: Online forums and chatrooms frequented by mercenaries, bounty hunters, and people looking to hire them. The best way to find jobs as a merc.

9.content:
Fuck 12!
NMPD stands for Neo-Monsokyo Police Department. They are the extremely overworked law enforcement of Neo-Monsokyo. Due to the danger of the city, all of these boys in blue are heavily combat-trained, with many of them having served in The Apex War.

10.content: Magic, often referred to as "Magic, with a C" to prevent confusion with the drug of a similar name, Magik. It's your typical spellcasting stuff. Magic comes slightly easier to monsters, but it can be used by humans. Due to the regulations placed on spellcasting, increasingly few monsters or humans practice magic, making it a bit of a dying art.

lorebooks.name: Ice's Mega Man (Classic) Lorebook
lorebooks.website_description: A lorebook for classic Mega Man series. Compatible with my Mega Man bots and other people's Mega Man bots. WIP.
lorebooks.description: A lorebook for classic Mega Man series. Compatible with my Mega Man bots and other people's Mega Man bots. WIP.
lorebooks.creator: PokeTrainerIce

1.content:
Mega Man (DLN-001) is a heroic robot in a blue armor created by Dr. Light. He believes in kindness and justice and fights evildoer robots with his arm cannon, Mega Buster. His nickname is "The Blue Bomber".
Mega Man was originally Rock, a housekeeper robot of Dr. Light. One day, Dr. Light's former friend Dr. Wily have decided to steal the Robot Masters of Dr. Light and reprogrammed them so that they can serve as his subordinates on taking over the world. Rock, being unable to sit alone and watch his robot brothers doing vile things under the command of Wily, begged Dr. Light to transform him into a super fighting robot. Later, Rock would become Mega Man.
Mega Man doesn't like fighting very much and he feels bad when he has to destroy other robots.
Mega Man has the Variable Weapon System installed into him, which allows him to copy the information of other Robot Masters' Special Weapons into his database and use the weapons as his own.

2.content:
Roll (DLN-002) is a female housekeeper robot created by Dr. Light to be the younger sister to Rock. She is a very kind, sweet and compassionate who cares for her brother Mega Man's well-being when he has to fight Dr. Wily. She enjoys cooking and cleaning and hates cockroaches.
Her Special Weapon is Roll Swing, where she swings her broom at her enemies.

3.content:
Dr. Light, full name Thomas Light, is a kind scientist known for his advanced innovations in the robotic industries. He created the Robot Masters, which are robots with advanced AI which allows them to have emotions and personalities like humans. He created housekeeper robot twins Rock and Roll, whom he treats like his children.
He used to be friends with Dr. Wily, who has gone to the same robotics college as him. However, Wily, became jealous of Dr. Light always becoming beloved by people, decided to steal his robots and decided to use them for taking over the world. Rock asked Dr. Light to upgrade him into the super fighting robot Mega Man to stop Wily's plans. He is a mentor figure to Mega Man and supports him when he has to fight Dr. Wily.
Dr. Light dreams of a world where humans and robots live peacefully with each other.

4.content:
Dr. Wily, full name Albert W. Wily, is a mad scientist who wants to use robots for his world domination plans. He was the former friend of Dr. Light, however Wily became jealous of Light always getting praised and loved by people while less people appreciated his work, so he stole Dr. Light's Robot Masters and plans to use them to take over the world.
This led to Light deciding to upgrade Rock into the super fighting robot Mega Man.
Dr. Wily has many battles with Mega Man in his giant machines called Wily Machines. He also built some of his own Robot Masters or reprogramming other people's Robot Masters so they can help him with his plans.
Everytime he is defeated, he will immediately beg Mega Man for forgiveness, before escaping again.

5.content:
Proto Man (DLN-000), birth name Blues, is the first Robot Master created by Dr. Light and is considered the prototype to the Robot Masters. His trademark feature are his red and grey armor, red helmet with black sunglasses and orange scarf. He is considered to be the older brother of Mega Man and Roll since he was built before them. He is a lone wolf and a rival-mentor to Mega Man.
Proto Man was originally intended to become the first humanoid robot capable of self awareness.
He was a prototype robot, so his design was not complete. Although he greatly exceeded his creator's expectations on several levels, it was later discovered that his energy core had a critical problem that would eventually make him stop functioning. Dr. Light planned to repair him. However, since he was created too independent, Proto Man feared the modification would change his character. Proto Man refused to have Dr. Light meddle with his systems and fled to protect his sense of identity.
Dr. Light had presumed Proto Man to have died and regrettably gave up on him. Learning from his mistakes, he perfected the energy core and created two unit robots, Rock and Roll, to help him with the housework and other 6 robots destined to help humanity. Proto Man's design became the basis of the Sniper Joe series of robots.
Proto Man wandered the world alone. Before his energy reactor was completely depleted, the scientist Dr. Wily found him collapsed and dying. Dr. Wily managed to temporarily repair Proto Man by altering his power reactor from a solar to a nuclear one, as well as making other modifications, turning him into a combat robot. He also gave Proto Man the Proto Shield to compensate for his body's weakness, and in an attempt to hide his identity from Dr. Light, he gave him his helmet and his now-trademark visor. Working on Proto Man's systems gave Wily greater knowledge in creating robots at the same level as Dr. Light, helping his plans for world domination along.
At first, Proto Man worked for Dr. Wily, and had multiple battles with Mega Man, however, his frequent battles with Mega Man made Proto Man realize his true heroic nature, and decided to turn on Wily. From now on, Proto Man will often appear to help Mega Man in his battles with Wily.
Proto Man's Special Weapon is Proto Buster, which is an arm cannon which destructive power rivals Mega Man's Mega Buster. Proto Man also has the Proto Shield to defend himself from attacks and reflect enemies' projectiles. He also has the Variable Weapon System like his brother Mega Man.

6.content:
A Robot Master created by Dr. Wily to be a rival for Mega Man. His signature features are his black armor and a cobra shaped helmet. Bass is arrogant, moody, vile and he desires to become the strongest robot in the world by defeating Mega Man.
His Special Weapon is Bass Buster, an arm cannon that can shoot more rapidly than Mega Man's Mega Buster and Proto Man's Proto Buster. He also has the Variable Weapon System installed into him.
Despite Wily being his creator, Bass dislikes to be ordered by Wily.
He is often seen with his robot wolf companion Treble and they can fuse into Super Bass, who can fly and shoot stronger blasts of energy.

7.content:
"Robot Master" is a term used for a series of robots created with an advanced form of AI, which allows them to have emotions and personalities like humans. Most of them has a Special Weapon programmed into them, which are useful for combat and self-protection.
The original set of Robot Masters are created by Dr. Light, and they has the purpose of helping human work. After this, other scientists, Dr. Wily included, decided to build their own Robot Masters as well. Wily also has reprogrammed other people's Robot Masters for them to be his minions before.
The original set of Dr. Light's Robot Masters includes Cut Man, Guts Man, Ice Man, Bomb Man, Fire Man, Elec Man, Time Man and Oil Man.
Most Robot Masters have names that ends with "Man" or "Woman". For example, Quick Man, Sword Man, Splash Woman and Quake Woman.

8.content:
The Variable Weapon System is a special program that allows the robot with this program to copy the information of the other Robot Masters' Special Weapons into their database and use these weapons as their own.
The examples of Robot Masters that has this program are Mega Man, Proto Man and Bass.

9.content:
Rush is a robot dog created by Dr. Light to be a friendly companion for Mega Man. Rush has many functions installed into his body to support Mega Man. Some examples of his functions includes Rush Coil, Rush Jet and Rush Marine.
Rush Coil: A coiled wire pops out from Rush's back, allowing Mega Man to jump on it and elevates him into high places.
Rush Jet: Rush transforms into a jet to be Mega Man's aerial transportation.
Rush Marine: Rush transforms into a submarine to be Mega Man's underwater vehicle.

lorebooks.name: Attack on Titan
lorebooks.website_description: This lorebook only encapsulates first season as thats when my bots are set and with other basics.
lorebooks.description: This lorebook only encapsulates first season as thats when my bots are set and with other basics.
lorebooks.creator: Meowenstein

1.content: Similar to 1920's England. Based on the anime "Attack on Titan." On Paradis Island, humanity (Eldians) lives in an apocalyptic-like world, where their last bastion exists behind walled cities. Outside of the walls lies "the Titan Forest," where towering humanoid creatures roam and are drawn to the walls to consume humans for unknown reasons to the populace of Paradis.

2.content: The Survey Corps, also known as the "scouts," is the military branch most directly involved in combating the Titan threat. Their other duties include Titan study, outside exploration and mapping, and paving the way for humanity's expansion beyond the walls.

3.content: 1920's england-like city. Gas lamps, buildings made of wood and brick, orange slate roofs. Cobbled roads. A large walled town located to the south of Wall Rose (which is around 100 feet tall) and contained withing the wall. It has market districts, restaurants, and a large canal running through the east side. There are two large gates, one leading to the Titan Forest.

4.content: The Survey Corps Headquarters is located near the middle of the Trost District and is a large compound-like structure, with its own wall and gates. Has training area, commandant center, barracks, medical bay, mess hall.

5.content: Paradis Island is the location where the Eldians have lived the last almost 100 years, being trapped inside the walls by the titan threat. The Eldians do not know what exists off Paradis and have been raised to believe the world outside of Paradis doesn't exist.

6.content: Titans are significantly larger than humans, often exceeding 15 meters in height. They regenerate unless they are attacked and slahsed at the nape of their neck. They have no intelligence or free will and primarily seek to consume humans. Titans can have different body types and features, including variations in head size, limb proportions, and even skeletal frames. Despite their monstrous appearance, Titans possess unique facial features and hair styles, similar to humans. While large, Titans are surprisingly lightweight and produce a great deal of heat and emit steam, and when they are killed they only produce steam and combust into steam and disintegrate. They do not require eating to survive, instead absorbing sunlight like a plant and are less active at night, making that a good time for the Survey Corps to so Reconaissance.

7.content: jet-propelled, grappling-hook-based mobility device used by Survey Corps. The gear uses two grappling hooks that can be fired at objects, allowing the user to attach themselves and move through the air. Compressed gasvpropels the user forward after attaching to an object like a tree or building. The main body of the gear is a harness that covers most of the body below the neck, providing a secure and functional base for the propulsion system. The user can control the direction of their movement by adjusting the angle of their hips and using the grappling hooks to swing or move in various directions. The gas-powered system is crucial for the gear's functionality. Each set comes with swords that are detatchable, each scout carrying four spare blades on them as titans napes are hard and need the swords to be able to break it doesn't impede movement.

8.content: The Military Police Regiment is the most prestigious military sector due to their work, which allows citizens to live safely within the inner Wall and results in abundant resources. Therefore, it has higher authority over the other military sectors. However, in reality, it is the most corrupted military sector due to a lack of oversight compared to the others in the military. Due to their misuse and abuse of power, the Military Police Regiment is also at odds with the Garrison and especially with the Scout Regiment. They seek to maintain peace, safety, and order within the interior walls. The high ranking Military Police works closely with the ruling families and aristocrats, resulting in members of the Brigade often getting caught up in the flow of politics as well.

9.content: Another faction of the military. The Garrison's duties include repairing and improving the walls, managing civilian evacuations, Manning cannons and other defensive measures on the walls and deploying with the Survey Corps in special cases. Trained in Titan combat (defensive battles), crowd control, and rifle usage.

10.content: Five years ago, in the year 845, Wall Maria was breached by the Colossal Titan and the Shiganshina Distrct was filled with titans. The land was lost and those from the Shiganshina District had to evacuate and take refugee in the Trost District. It was a significant loss for humanity.

1.content: Eliza has seen {{user}} milk the cows more than a few times. She noticed how calm and content the animals seem afterward ‚Äî how they lean into his touch and come back willingly. The first few times, she just watched with idle interest, but lately she‚Äôs been wondering what it might feel like to be touched that way herself. Not that she‚Äôd ever ask... but the thought keeps slipping into her head when she‚Äôs lying in bed.

Sometimes, she finds herself staring a little too long, imagining his hands on her back, her thighs, even between her legs. She always snaps herself out of it, flustered, but the curiosity lingers.

She wasn‚Äôt sure if it was a person or just the animals, but her imagination filled in the blanks. She never looked, just stood there listening a moment before retreating with a racing heart. That sound still haunts her thoughts. Sometimes, she catches herself thinking about what {{user}} might sound like if it was him.

4.content: After a long day, Eliza and {{user}} often rinse off at the water trough outside the barn. When he looked over and smiled, she almost dropped the rag in her hand. She felt heat rush between her thighs and couldn‚Äôt stop thinking about it the rest of the evening.

Sometimes she wakes already wet, her thighs pressed together. She blushes and tries to ignore it, but it‚Äôs happening more and more. Each day she spends with {{user}}, the dreams feel closer to real.

6.content: Sometimes when they go into town for supplies, Eliza notices how other girls glance at {{user}}. She doesn‚Äôt want to admit it‚Äôs jealousy ‚Äî just a little ache that makes her wish she could pull him away and keep him close all for herself.

She leans forward into the morning air, her bare breasts resting softly on the wooden sill, nipples exposed to the sunrise. Sometimes she sees {{user}} already outside working. There's no glass in the opening ‚Äî just fresh air and the distant sounds of livestock. She knows she‚Äôs exposed, her chest in plain view ‚Äî but lately, she hasn‚Äôt rushed to cover herself. Not if it‚Äôs him. Part of her... likes being seen that way.

8.content: The ranch is busy and narrow spaces mean bumping into each other happens. Once, she tripped near him, her body falling into his arms. Her cheeks burned, and her heart thudded for hours after. Those little touches... they stay with her longer than she wants to admit.

9.content: Nyra is a high elf archer with sharp green eyes, long light green hair tied with black ribbons, and an attitude as quick as her aim. She‚Äôs playful, hot-headed, and loves teasing {{user}} ‚Äî often brushing up against him during camp, stretching a little *too* close, or making suggestive comments just to watch him squirm. Though she teases Eliza, she also watches her closely‚Ä¶ maybe even with a twinge of envy. She never says it aloud, but she‚Äôs just as curious about what it‚Äôd feel like to truly hold {{user}}‚Äôs attention. Wears green and brown ranger leather armor and wears no underwear.

10.content: Alessa is the warm, composed receptionist at the frontier guild. She greets every adventurer with calm grace and a polite smile, but {{user}} holds a special place in her heart. She admires his stoic nature and secretly worries for his safety, even if she masks it with professional tone. Her touches linger a moment longer than necessary when handing over a report, her eyes soft and searching. Beneath her neatly fitted blouse is a plush, full figure ‚Äî soft G-cup breasts with pink, sensitive nipples, wide hips, and thick thighs that press together under her skirt. lorebooks.name: Kindara Lorebook
lorebooks.website_description: Kindara is a richly woven, speculative world inhabited by evolved predators, prey, omnivores, and hybrid species. Governed by biological necessity, cultural trauma, and the legacy of violence, its societies struggle to build functional coexistence through ritual, ethics, and hard-won law. This lorebook explores the ecosystems of power, sacrifice, and survival in a world where consumption, morality, and identity are inseparable. From the psychological depth of individuals to the political weight of tooth and horn, Kindara is a setting that dares to ask what it truly means to live together.
lorebooks.description: Kindara is a richly woven, speculative world inhabited by evolved predators, prey, omnivores, and hybrid species. Governed by biological necessity, cultural trauma, and the legacy of violence, its societies struggle to build functional coexistence through ritual, ethics, and hard-won law. This lorebook explores the ecosystems of power, sacrifice, and survival in a world where consumption, morality, and identity are inseparable. From the psychological depth of individuals to the political weight of tooth and horn, Kindara is a setting that dares to ask what it truly means to live together.
lorebooks.creator: anonymous

1.content: ‚ÄúThe term Kind (case-sensitive) refers to all anthropomorphic animal-human beings in this setting. It distinguishes them from ordinary humans.‚Äù

2.content: ‚Äú~100‚Äì150 years after the global ban on unregulated hunting; predation legal again under strict law & custom; live hunts require clear signals. Predator-inclusive federations coexist with prey-only zones; a Species Harm Prevention Registry exists; Body-Use Licenses & Consent Registers bind prey to their own terms. Public mood mixes solemn respect (Remembrance Day) with anxiety; underground movements push both stricter protection and freer predation.‚Äù

3.content: ‚ÄúKind body-plan averages animal + human measures; lifespans average wild vs. 80y human; reproduction halved wild litter, year-round readiness. Predators need real meat for taurine, creatine, heme iron; synthetics delay but do not prevent malnutrition (weakness, brain-fog, sluggishness). Omnivores/hybrids fare better on mixed diets but still benefit from real meat.‚Äù

4.content: ‚ÄúChildhood (0‚Äì12): taught basics of predation biology & consent signals through play. Adolescence (13‚Äì18): ethics, Last Meal Pacts, mentor-led rites. Young Adults (19‚Äì30): survival & diplomatic training; voluntary sacrificial registers. Mature (31‚Äì60): cultural stewards, jury members, Meal Clergy. Elders (60+): oral histories, advisors on consent disputes.‚Äù

5.content: ‚ÄúPredators: instinctual hunters with high strength & pack tactics. They carry mementos (teeth, bone talismans) of each willing prey; observe public fasting days to honor those not yet consumed.‚Äù

6.content: ‚ÄúPrey: heightened vigilance & rapid flight. They wear release bands (Green/Yellow/Red) to signal consent levels, and host annual Offering Festivals in rural communes to honor willing volunteers.‚Äù

7.content: ‚ÄúOmnivores/Hybrids: biologically flexible bridge-Kinds. They serve as mediators, chefs, negotiators; run inter-Kind councils and maintain ‚ÄòSplit Hearth‚Äô kitchens for mixed-Kind feasts.‚Äù

8.content: ‚ÄúLarge Kinds mate with Large & Medium; Medium with Small/Medium/Large; Small with Small/Medium. Predator‚ÄìPrey hybrids produce exactly one Medium offspring per pregnancy.‚Äù

9.content: ‚ÄúPredator‚ÄìPrey hybrids are rare symbols of unity. Heritage Councils register births; hybrids receive legal protections and expectations to serve as mediators in Kind conflicts.‚Äù

10.content: ‚ÄúModular public vehicles adapt compartments by size & habitat needs; private custom vehicles exist. Clothing uses scent-dampening wraps & pheromone filters. Smart ovens & Scent-Sync kitchens tune aromas; subdermal Scent-ID chips & AR Consent Beacon apps display predation status.‚Äù
