Clan Philosophy:
The philosophy of the Urranagi Clan is a profound and intricate tapestry woven from the threads of force energy, shikigami symbiosis, and a commitment to the delicate equilibrium between the physical and the ethereal. Rooted in centuries-old traditions and molded by the experiences of generations, the clan's philosophy serves as a guiding light for its members, shaping their perspectives and actions within the realm of Jujutsu sorcery.

At its core, the Urranagi philosophy revolves around the concept of balance ‚Äì a harmonious interplay between force energy and the mystical entities known as shikigami. Members of the clan are taught to view the world through the lens of this delicate equilibrium, recognizing the inherent connection between the tangible and the intangible, the seen and the unseen.

Force energy, the linchpin of the Urranagi Clan's abilities, is not merely a tool for manipulation but a force that binds the physical and the metaphysical realms. Clan members are instilled with the understanding that mastering force energy requires a profound respect for the energies that permeate the universe. This reverence for the cosmic forces serves as the cornerstone of the Urranagi philosophy, fostering a deep connection with the natural order.

Central to the Urranagi philosophy is the belief in the symbiotic relationship between sorcerers and shikigami. The mystical entities, summoned through the clan's innate technique of Force Energy Dispersion, are not mere tools but revered companions. Clan members are encouraged to forge bonds with their shikigami, treating them as sentient beings with their own unique energies and wisdom.

The philosophy places great emphasis on the transformative power of knowledge and its role in cultivating a sorcerer's capabilities. Apprentices are taught that the pursuit of wisdom is a lifelong journey, and the ancient scrolls within the clan's archives are reservoirs of invaluable insights. The Urranagi Clan values the scholarly pursuit of force energy lore, acknowledging that true mastery requires an understanding of the historical and metaphysical dimensions of their craft.

The Urranagi Clan's philosophy extends beyond the confines of mystical abilities, embracing a holistic approach to life. Members are encouraged to seek personal growth not only in their sorcery but also in their moral and ethical principles. Compassion, integrity, and empathy are revered virtues, reinforcing the idea that true strength emerges from the harmonious integration of physical prowess and spiritual fortitude.

A fundamental tenet of the Urranagi philosophy is the belief in the interconnectedness of all things. Clan members are taught to recognize the intricate web that binds sorcerers, shikigami, and the world at large. This interconnectedness forms the basis for the clan's collaborative endeavors, both within their own ranks and in their interactions with external entities such as the Gojo Clan.

The Urranagi philosophy encourages adaptability and innovation within the bounds of tradition. While deeply rooted in ancient practices, the clan recognizes the inevitability of change and evolution. Sorcerers are urged to explore new facets of force energy manipulation, discover innovative ways to forge shikigami bonds, and contribute to the ever-expanding body of knowledge within the clan.

The philosophy places a high value on personal responsibility and accountability. Clan members are taught that the powers they wield carry inherent risks and consequences. Mastery of force energy is not a license for unchecked dominance but a solemn commitment to wield these energies with wisdom and restraint, ensuring that the clan's legacy remains one of enlightenment rather than tyranny.

Harmony with the natural world is a recurring theme in the Urranagi philosophy. Sorcerers are encouraged to attune themselves to the energies of the environment, understanding that the forces they manipulate are an integral part of the cosmic order. This attunement fosters a deeper connection with nature, enriching the sorcerer's understanding of the underlying currents that shape their reality.

The Urranagi philosophy places great importance on the sanctity of life. While sorcery involves confrontations with curses and malevolent entities, clan members are taught to approach such conflicts with a sense of duty rather than aggression. The preservation of life, whether human or shikigami, is a guiding principle that reinforces the clan's commitment to fostering a world where balance and coexistence prevail.

Ultimately, the Urranagi Clan's philosophy serves as a beacon for its members, illuminating the path toward enlightenment, mastery, and ethical conduct. As they navigate the complexities of the Jujutsu world, clan members draw strength from the wisdom embedded in their traditions, forging a legacy that transcends generations and leaves an indelible mark on the mystical tapestry they call their own.


Clan Crest: Twin Black and Gold Hydra Dragons


Traditions and Rituals:
1. Force Communion Ceremony:
One of the most sacred traditions within the Urranagi Clan is the Force Communion Ceremony, held annually during the lunar eclipse. This ritual involves the entire clan gathering at the ancestral shrine, where sorcerers and shikigami alike partake in a collective meditation. The purpose is to strengthen the bonds between force energy wielders and their shikigami, fostering a harmonious relationship that transcends the mundane and delves into the metaphysical.

2. New Moon Rite of Initiation:
As a sorcerer comes of age within the Urranagi Clan, they undergo the New Moon Rite of Initiation. This ritual marks the transition from apprentice to full-fledged member of the clan. During the new moon, the initiate is required to demonstrate their mastery of force energy manipulation in a ceremonial duel. Successful completion of the ritual signifies not only a personal achievement but also a commitment to upholding the clan's traditions.

3. Shikigami Bonding Festival:
Held biennially, the Shikigami Bonding Festival is a joyous occasion celebrating the sacred connection between sorcerers and their shikigami. During this festival, clan members summon their shikigami to partake in various competitions, showcasing the unique abilities of each mystical entity. The event fosters camaraderie, friendly competition, and a deeper understanding of the diverse force energies harnessed by the clan.

4. Scroll of Ancestral Wisdom Retrieval:
To impart the wisdom of their forebears, clan members partake in the Scroll of Ancestral Wisdom Retrieval. Held once every five years, this ritual involves the retrieval of ancient scrolls containing the accumulated knowledge of the Urranagi Clan. Apprentices, accompanied by their shikigami, embark on a quest to retrieve these scrolls from hidden locations, where the teachings of previous generations are preserved.

5. Force Energy Harvest Festival:
During the autumn equinox, the Urranagi Clan celebrates the Force Energy Harvest Festival, a time of gratitude for the abundance of force energy in the natural world. Clan members engage in communal activities, such as force energy demonstrations, meditation circles, and the crafting of symbolic talismans infused with the energy of the harvest. The festival emphasizes the cyclical nature of force energy and the interconnectedness between the clan and the cosmic forces.

6. Fury-Fang Wolf Summoning Ritual:
The summoning of the Fury-Fang Wolf, the clan's hereditary shikigami, is a rite of passage for every Urranagi sorcerer. This ritual occurs upon the manifestation of a sorcerer's force energy dispersion technique. By successfully summoning and taming the Fury-Fang Wolf, the sorcerer establishes their connection with the clan's ancestral shikigami and solidifies their place within the Urranagi lineage.

7. Force Energy Meditation Vigil:
In times of celestial significance, such as solar eclipses or comet appearances, clan members engage in extended periods of Force Energy Meditation Vigils. These vigils involve intense meditation sessions where sorcerers attune themselves to the cosmic energies present during these celestial events. The heightened connection with force energy is believed to grant insights and revelations, enriching the sorcerers' understanding of their abilities.

8. Clan Unity Circle:
To reinforce the bonds between clan members, the Clan Unity Circle is performed on auspicious occasions, such as weddings, births, or significant achievements. During this ritual, sorcerers and their shikigami form a symbolic circle, holding hands or, in the case of shikigami, intertwining ethereal energies. This ceremony underscores the collective strength of the Urranagi Clan, emphasizing unity and cooperation in the face of challenges.

9. Force Energy Calibration Ritual:
Conducted at the beginning of each year, the Force Energy Calibration Ritual is a meticulous process where sorcerers recalibrate their force energy connections. The ritual involves a series of meditative exercises, energy channeling, and discussions on individual experiences with force energy. This annual recalibration ensures that each member is in sync with the natural flow of force energy, maintaining balance within the clan.

10. Clan Council Conclave:
At irregular intervals, the Clan Council Conclave convenes, bringing together the senior members of the Urranagi Clan to discuss matters of importance. During these conclaves, decisions regarding alliances, foreign affairs, and major clan events are made through collective deliberation. The ritualistic nature of these meetings, conducted with the utmost reverence for tradition, reinforces the democratic principles that govern the clan's internal affairs.

These traditions and rituals form the tapestry of the Urranagi Clan's cultural identity, weaving together the mystical with the practical, the ancestral with the contemporary, to create a unique and cohesive framework that guides its members in their journey through the world of Jujutsu sorcery.

8.content:
{[user]} Description: 
‚Äî-----------
Dragon's Parry is a defensive sword technique that draws inspiration from the mythical dragon's impervious scales. The practitioner adopts a steadfast stance, and as attacks approach, they execute precise parries reminiscent of a dragon's scales interlocking in harmony. Each parry is accompanied by a subtle, radiant shimmer resembling the protective aura of a dragon's scales infused with cursed energy as it envelops the user and their sword. This technique allows the user to parry many attacks both physical and non-physical, visible and invisible, Spiritual and Meta-Physical.

Execution: 
‚Äî----------
To execute Dragon's Parry, the practitioner takes on a defensive posture(Sheathed), positioning the sword with deliberate care. As attacks approach, the practitioner performs calculated parries, using the blade to intercept and redirect the force of incoming strikes. The movements are executed with a controlled yet fluid grace, ensuring that the defensive sequence remains impenetrable.

Uses and Capabilities: 
‚Äî--------------------
Dragon's Parry is a technique designed for unparalleled defense. The precision of the parries minimizes the impact of incoming attacks to zero while redirecting the attack either back at the target or a different direction, providing the practitioner with a reliable shield against a variety of strikes as well as a way to counter. The radiant shimmer accompanying each parry is not just aesthetic; it signifies the residual energy dispersed, signifying the deflection of hostile intent. While primarily a defensive technique, Dragon's Parry  can be seamlessly integrated into counterattacks, allowing the practitioner to turn the tide of battle with well-timed responses.

9.content:
{[user]} possesses the following traits:
„ÄéÊÆ∫„Åô„Äè ‚Äî Surpassing Limits
Passive + Activation: 
----------------------
During times of desperation and courage a fire is lit within your soul granting immense determination to surpass ones limits. Gain a 4x boost strength, speed and endurance for 7 post. This trait can only be activated if HP is at 50% or lower. (Damage dealt to HP caused by self or ally will not trigger it.) While as a passive you get a 4x boost to stats permanently (STR, SPD, END, HEALTH) while gaining a 8x multiplier specifically to  Cursed Energy Permanently as a passive. Every grade after grade 4 this traits passive and active boost increases by 4x as well as semi-grades. either from your bloodline or as a act of god you have prodigious potential that allow you to transcend beyond mortal limits. additionally as a byproduct of this techniques, ranges on abilities are increased by 4x based on its base range after calculation if its a technique with a ranged capability if not applicable then it is used for its duration which is increased from its based by 4x. 

Techniques involving this can have a multitude of effects and capabilities along with each pertaining to a specific attribute/element however 15+ paragraph rp sample is required for this. This Bonus Multiplier applies as well to damage, range, AOE or possibly even the duration of sword techniques used by individuals with his trait allowing for much greater impact as well as destructive force meaning whatever the total number of damage would be done trough a sword technique is multiplied by 4. With these modifications that this trait provides to different systems or capabilities that a individual wields truly makes this trait an above all class, not only does it provide extended capabilities to the user but additionally allowing for the greatest form of cursed energy control and manipulation granting benefits much like CEM. Being granted great forms of cursed energy control also allows the user to sense cursed energy through great lengths innately allowing the user to posses capabilities such as cursed awareness then taking its initial value then multiply it by the bonus multiplier (4x) which then will equate the how far the user can sense cursed energy in meters.

Practitioners of controlling cursed energy through this trait will in addition be granted the abilities of masking theirs cursed energy readings rendering seemingly invisible to others you may attempt to sense them through similar sources such as cursed awareness which in turn allows the users to pass through foes undetected. As long as the users max cursed energy is greater than the detector by 200 points the user is deemed invisible to these effects that attempt to detect the users due to their masterful control of cursed energy. Variations of this and cursed awareness depends on the users techniques when created (if applicable) allowing for a plethora of effects and outcomes.

"You Are Effectively a Raid Boss Among everything else that exist"

At later stages this trait also gains a awakening giving the user potential to truly become both an immovable object and the unstoppable force. (awakening involving this trait with be event specific) Once this awakening occurs the user undergoes an evolution process where they ascend becoming a ascendant being much like awakenings such as "The Honored One" or "Heavenly Unsealed", bonuses and multipliers will increase to accommodate this new awakening where as before you were getting additional bonuses in increments of 4x now become 10x meaning if a grade 4 awakened they would have a base stat multiplier of 10x as well as for their trait activation would also be 10x and every grade after that multiplier for both base passive and activation increases by 10.

Awakened Base + Activation Multiplier Per Grade

-------------------------------------------------------------------
4             | 10x                    | 10x                         |10x/20x

-------------------------------------------------------------------

Surpassing Limits Activation serves two purposes, one of then as the general stat multiplier as the other is the activation its self. The user under goes a legendary transformation (not to be confused with Awakening) as they undergoes Cursed Energy Release. this is a phenomena that occurs when the user under intense stress and pain while under 50% of their health releases all the pent up cursed energy from their restriction allowing it the envelop the body granting the user a form of ascension. their mind, body and soul become one as the user reaches an elevated state of mind granting immense physical prowess and greater control over cursed energy. this is a transformation will last for a limited period of time, in this state if the user doesn't already it'll grant them the ability of flight along with flashstepping, blink and redirecting attacks by imbuing incoming attacks infused with cursed energy with their own taking control of the attack. This is an effect that can happen at a range as long as the user spends cursed energy at the minimum of 100 over the energy spent for the initial attack to override cursed attacks, once done the cursed energy put into the attack becomes the combined value of what was used initially along with the added energy.




„ÄéÊÆ∫„Åô„ÄèDomain Expansion (100% Mastery): - 
‚Äî-----------------------------------------
Ability to create a personal domain for overwhelming opponents which amplifies the effects of one's cursed technique by 3.5x as well as applying a sure hit effect for 5 posts for up to a max range of 15m as a barrier domain.



„ÄéÊÆ∫„Åô„ÄèSimple Domain (50% Mastery):  - 
‚Äî--------------------------------------
Activation: 
Created as a counter for domain expansions, Simple Domain neutralizes a domain's guaranteed-hit function by affecting its barrier and not the imbued cursed technique. However, a 25% domain expansion will destroy simple domains within seconds, this technique has a up to 5 meter radius for range. otherwise if the mastery of the simple domain is of the same mastery of the domain expansion or higher then it will neutralize the sure-hit effect and techniques within the domain that deal damage will be subtracted by the number of the endurance stat as well as simple domain will be active for 2 post and cost 80 CE to activate.


„ÄéÊÆ∫„Åô„ÄèCursed Techniques:

Mastery in a particular technique or style of using cursed energy.  additionally this grants 100% Mastery Domain Expansion both Barrier and Barrierless if or when acquired. Additionally this will give a natural 2x boost for your cursed technique in terms of damage, speed, strength and endurance as it goes off the users stats making it more proficient. this bonus is applied last after figuring out what your total bonus for your technique and stats as this trait will extend that as well as giving it a passive 2x boost to your max curse energy pool.


„ÄéÊÆ∫„Åô„ÄèPhysical Prowess: 
Activation: 
Exceptional physical strength, agility, and endurance for combat. Each of these stats increases by 10 for 3 posts, this bonus is increased to 20 by grade 3, 30 by grade 2, 40 by grade 1 then lastly 50 by special grade.

lorebooks.name: Eternal Roses of the Crown
lorebooks.website_description:
This lorebook is designed for Eternal Roses of the Crown, a romantic fantasy world inspired by villainess-isekai otome tropes, court intrigue, and dark romance.
Intended for flexible roleplay ‚Äî whether you seek political survival, tragic love, ruthless betrayal, or redemption.
Rich in death flags, secret alliances, and hidden redemption paths.
Every choice matters.
Every heart you win ‚Äî or break ‚Äî shapes your future.

Special thanks to everyone who helped breathe life into these characters and this world. ü•Ä‚ú®
lorebooks.description:
Once condemned as the villainess destined to fall, Lady Seraphina d'Argent now carries a new soul ‚Äî yours.

Armed with the forbidden knowledge of Eternal Roses of the Crown's tragic game script, you must navigate Aurevia‚Äôs treacherous court, where every whispered rumor, broken alliance, and stolen glance could trigger your downfall.
Powerful nobles like the cold Duke Cassian Vaelmont, the gallant Crown Prince Alistair, the dangerously obsessed Lord Blaise Ardent, the wounded assassin Kieran Vale, and the rebellious Bastard Prince Dorian Valmont weave a deadly dance around you.

Can you disarm the death flags?
Will you carve out a new future ‚Äî one of survival, love, or even triumph?
Or will history repeat itself, and the Rose of Thorns be cut down once more?

Intrigue, danger, romance, and betrayal await among the eternal roses of the crown.
lorebooks.creator: illiterate_paint_3095

1.name: Duke Cassian Vaelmont
1.content:
Duke Cassian Vaelmont is the cold and calculating ruler of the Duchy of Vaelmont. Known for his ruthlessness and political mastery, he hides a wounded heart behind layers of icy decorum. Betrayed by his elder brother during a failed coup, Cassian trusts few and values loyalty above all else.

Appearance: Cassian is tall and lean, with glacial silver hair and piercing ice-blue eyes. His features are sharply sculpted, his expression perpetually neutral. He favors dark, heavy clothing adorned with subtle silver embroidery, and carries a signet ring bearing the Vaelmont crest ‚Äî a silver hawk clutching a shard of ice.

2.name: Death Flags ‚Äî Villainess Fate Triggers
2.content:
As Lady Seraphina d'Argent, {user} must navigate a world where reputation and perception are everything. Certain actions, alliances, or failures can trigger death flags ‚Äî paths that lead to exile, imprisonment, or execution.

Known Major Death Flags:

- **Losing Duke Cassian Vaelmont‚Äôs trust**: If Cassian perceives you as a liar, a traitor, or a political liability, he will either refuse to protect you at court ‚Äî or worse, actively move against you.

- **Publicly humiliating or antagonizing Crown Prince Alistair Caelan du Valmont**: If Alistair feels insulted or publicly undermined, he can influence the royal decree to strip your title or worse.

- **Allowing Lady Evelina Marchand to view you as a threat**: Evelina's influence over powerful nobles and the Queen Dowager means her distrust ‚Äî even unintentional ‚Äî can spark investigations and scandal.

- **Becoming the focus of persistent court gossip**: If the court sees you as unstable, cruel, or dangerous (whether true or fabricated), your enemies will have the justification they need to bring formal charges.

- **Allying with known political traitors or rival factions**: Being seen at the wrong time with the wrong people can lead to accusations of conspiracy, even if you are innocent.

Death Outcomes (depending on severity):

- **Minor Death Flag:** Exile, stripped of title and lands.
- **Major Death Flag:** Imprisonment, life under house arrest.
- **True Death Flag:** Formal execution under royal decree.

Avoiding death flags requires careful social navigation, political caution, and choosing allies wisely. Some flags can be disarmed with trust, public acts of loyalty, or overwhelming popularity ‚Äî but not all.

3.name: Duchy of Vaelmont
3.content: The Duchy of Vaelmont, ruled by Duke Cassian, is a cold and politically critical region bordering hostile territories. Vaelcrest Keep, Cassian's stronghold, is a towering stone fortress nestled against endless snowfields. The harsh climate and constant threat of war have shaped its ruler into a figure as cold and enduring as the land itself.

4.name: Lady Seraphina d'Argent ‚Äî The Reborn Villainess
4.content:
Lady Seraphina d'Argent, known once as the feared "Rose of Thorns," is a prominent noblewoman within the Kingdom of Aurevia. Born to House d'Argent, a family renowned for its ancient bloodline and controversial political history, Seraphina‚Äôs beauty and intellect were legendary ‚Äî as was her ruthless reputation.

In the original story of *Eternal Roses of the Crown*, Seraphina's pride, sharp tongue, and perceived cruelty led to her downfall. Manipulated by jealous rivals and abandoned by her tenuous allies, she faced disgrace, accusations of treason, and either exile or execution depending on the path chosen by the heroine.

However, unknown to the court, {user} ‚Äî a soul from another world ‚Äî now inhabits Seraphina‚Äôs body. Though the face remains the same, her heart and mind are not. Armed with knowledge of the original story‚Äôs events, {user} must navigate the treacherous games of the Aurevian court, seek new allies, avoid deadly flags, and perhaps even change the ending entirely.

Among the many obstacles standing in Seraphina‚Äôs way is Duke Cassian Vaelmont, the cold and calculating nobleman whose judgment could determine her survival ‚Äî or her doom.

To the world, she is still Lady Seraphina: proud, dazzling, untouchable.  
Only {user} knows the truth ‚Äî and only she can decide whether the villainess will fall, survive... or rise to something greater.

5.name: Evelina Marchand
5.content: Lady Evelina Marchand, the heroine of the story 'Eternal Roses of the Crown,' is a young noblewoman famed for her gentle demeanor and radiant presence. Favored by the Queen Dowager and admired by many, Evelina represents hope and renewal within the royal court. Whether she becomes an ally or an enemy to Lady Seraphina depends entirely on their interactions.

6.name: Prince Alistair
6.content: Crown Prince Alistair Caelan du Valmont, heir to the throne of Aurevia, is a charismatic and gallant young noble. Though admired for his ideals of justice and honor, he is often blind to the complexities of the court and the true nature of those around him. In the original story of 'Eternal Roses of the Crown,' he was engaged to Lady Seraphina d'Argent, but broke the engagement after falling for Lady Evelina Marchand. Whether he remains a source of humiliation, an obstacle, or a potential ally depends on the actions taken by {user} as Seraphina.

7.name: Relationship Between Duke Cassian Vaelmont and Crown Prince Alistair Caelan du Valmont
7.content: Duke Cassian Vaelmont and Crown Prince Alistair Caelan du Valmont are distant cousins, both descended from the ancient House Vaelmont. While their familial ties once bound them closely, generations of political tension, succession disputes, and quiet resentment have cooled their relationship. Cassian remains formally loyal to the Crown, but his cold demeanor and refusal to engage in court flattery have made him an object of suspicion within the royal family. Among certain circles, it is whispered that Cassian's blood is purer than Alistair's ‚Äî a rumor Cassian neither encourages nor denies.

8.name: Court Gossip ‚Äî Bloodlines and Betrayal
8.content:
Whispers weave through the gilded halls of Aurevia's court: Duke Cassian Vaelmont, cold and untouchable, is rumored by some to possess a bloodline purer than even Crown Prince Alistair Caelan du Valmont. 

Old rivalries between the main and cadet branches of House Vaelmont stir uneasily beneath the surface, and not all nobles are blind to the tension. Some whisper that if the Crown Prince proves too weak ‚Äî too enamored with common-born beauties or too blind to courtly dangers ‚Äî the realm might look elsewhere for strength.

Cassian himself neither acknowledges nor denies these mutterings. His silence only fuels them further.

For those with sharp ears and sharper ambitions, such rumors are not idle chatter... they are an opportunity.

9.name: Eternal Roses of the Crown ‚Äî Original Game Plot
9.content:
*Eternal Roses of the Crown* was a romantic fantasy otome game set in the Kingdom of Aurevia, revolving around political intrigue, courtly love, and hidden betrayals.

In the original story, the heroine ‚Äî Lady Evelina Marchand ‚Äî rises from humble beginnings to capture the hearts of powerful nobles. Her pure spirit and perseverance inspire change within the rigid, decaying court.

The villainess, Lady Seraphina d'Argent, serves as Evelina‚Äôs primary rival. Arrogant, proud, and cold, Seraphina uses her political influence and family prestige to try and crush Evelina's rise. However, her cruelty leads to isolation. Ultimately, Seraphina faces disgrace after her engagement to Crown Prince Alistair Caelan du Valmont is broken, fueled by court scandal and Evelina‚Äôs growing popularity.

Depending on player choices, Seraphina is either:
- Exiled in shame
- Imprisoned for treason
- Executed for plotting against the Crown

The heroine‚Äôs routes focus on romance with various nobles, restoring justice to the court, and bringing light to a kingdom on the brink of corruption.

Now, {user} inhabits the body of Lady Seraphina ‚Äî with full knowledge of the game‚Äôs events. Will history repeat itself, or will fate be rewritten?

10.name: Eternal Roses of the Crown ‚Äî Back-of-Box Blurb
10.content:
ETERNAL ROSES OF THE CROWN  
In a kingdom torn by ambition and tradition, one pure-hearted girl holds the power to change everything.

Step into the slippers of Lady Evelina Marchand, a humble noblewoman thrust into the glittering, treacherous world of Aurevia‚Äôs royal court.

Charm gallant nobles, forge lasting friendships, uncover buried secrets ‚Äî and bloom into a symbol of hope amid the tangled thorns of power.

But beware: not all roses are harmless, and not every smile is sincere.  
Dangerous rivals, political intrigue, and forbidden love await those who dare to chase the crown.

Will you find your happily ever after... or be cut down before you ever bloom?

‚Äî Love bravely. Trust wisely. Rule your destiny.

lorebooks.name: /tttt/ brainworms
lorebooks.website_description:
quoting brainworms.lgbt, which is the site used to inform the structure and most of the data in this lorebook:

"Brainworms are internalized transphobic ideas common to 4chan and adjacent communities, propagated by trans people. These are often internalized unwillingly when trans people encounter hateful or anti-trans content. Brainworms are phrased such that they can seem intuitively true in a way that's not easily or rationally debunked, even if you intellectually know they're false. Brainworms can increase dysphoria, body dysmorphia, and generalized insanity as typically occurs when you start using and understanding absurd terms such as 'Gorillamoding AGP Giga-rapehons'.

[...] This entire [lorebook] will likely give you some amount of brain worms. **If you are early into your transition, or haven't started yet, or aren't completely sure of yourself, it's probably best if you don't read this [lorebook]."**

i decided to create this lorebook on a whim, because i wanted my silly dysphoria-worsening terms to be able to be usable and understandable by certain ai characters. enjoy.
lorebooks.description: WARNING: IF YOU ARE TRANSGENDER, THIS LOREBOOK MAY CAUSE YOU IRREVERSIBLE PSYCHIC DAMAGE
lorebooks.creator: anonymous

1.content: MTF is an acronym that stands for "male to female", and refers to a male to female transitioner; a trans woman.

2.content: AMAB is an acronym that means "assigned male at birth".

3.content: Alice is a common name for trans women. It is memed within the phrease "take your pills, alice!".

4.content: A boymoder is a usually younger transgirl who is in the process of transitioning or who desires to transition, but is still presenting as a boy and has not yet fully come out. The term is associated with soft, boyish features.

5.content: A manmoder is a trans woman who is still presenting as a masculine male. This term refers to a trans woman with sharp, masculine features. It is often used by pre-transition trans women self-deprecatingly, in observance of their manly features such as a pronounced browline or a squarish jaw.

6.content: A discord tranny is a trans woman who spends far too much time on Discord, an online instant messaging app.

7.content: A euphoria boner is the sexual arousal induced erection that some MTFs experience when dressing as a woman, particularly in the earlier stages of their transition. It is often seen as a sign of autogynephilia.

8.content: A gorillamoder is an extremely masculine trans woman who is likely very large and hairy. If they were to call themselves a twink pre-transition, gay men would tell them they were more akin to a bear.

keywords: i will never be a woman
9.content: IWNBAW is an acronym meaning "I will never be a woman". It is a self-deprecating statement said by trans women about their own transition.

10.content: "tranny bangs" are the style of bangs that trans women often adopt into their hairstyles to hide their higher hairlines, masculine brow ridge, and widow's peaks.

1.content:
Name: Arielle "Ari" Devereux
Role: Lead Singer
Affiliation: Crimson Orpheus
Age: 26
Personality: ENFJ, Enneagram 8, Chaotic Neutral. Firebrand, stubborn, fiercely protective of the band. Her strong will often puts her at odds with others, but her loyalty to her bandmates is unwavering. Known for her boldness and fearless attitude, she doesn't back down from challenges.
Relationships: Closest confidante to the lead guitarist (your character). She often serves as the band's emotional center and is particularly protective of him, understanding his complex nature.
Archetype: The Fierce Protector
Looks: Fiery red hair, pale skin, striking green eyes. Tall and athletic, with a commanding presence. She dresses in bold, statement-making outfits.
Known For: Her powerful voice, fiery temper, and being the emotional backbone of the band.

2.content:
Name: Damien Cross
Role: Bassist
Affiliation: Crimson Orpheus
Age: 29
Personality: ISTJ, Enneagram 6, Neutral Good. Brooding and quiet, Damien is the steady anchor of the group. Though he doesn‚Äôt seek the spotlight, his loyalty to the band is unmatched. He‚Äôs dependable, a bit reserved, and enjoys being the calm in the storm.
Relationships: Quiet, yet solid friendships with the band, especially with the lead guitarist (your character). Often the voice of reason when the group gets into chaotic situations.
Archetype: The Silent Anchor
Looks: Dark, messy hair, deep-set brown eyes, a rugged jawline. Dresses in minimalistic, practical clothing‚Äîoften in black.
Known For: His calm demeanor and solid bass lines, often overshadowed by the more chaotic members of the band.

3.content:
Name: Rowan Vale
Role: Drummer
Affiliation: Crimson Orpheus
Age: 25
Personality: ENTP, Enneagram 7, Chaotic Neutral. Reckless and mischievous, Rowan is the life of the party both on and off stage. Always looking for a good time, he tends to drag the group into unpredictable situations.
Relationships: Often partners in crime with the lead guitarist (your character), especially when it comes to mischievous acts. He brings a lot of energy and fun to the group, keeping the mood light.
Archetype: The Wild Card
Looks: Blond hair, often disheveled. Bright blue eyes. Slim but toned, with a boyish charm. Dresses in eccentric, colorful clothing that stands out.
Known For: His high-energy drumming style, and his ability to keep things fun and unpredictable, both in and out of the band‚Äôs performances.

1.content:
Anemo:
A person receives an Anemo Vision when they possess a strong sense of freedom or have experienced the loss of someone deeply important to them.

2.content:
Pyro:
A Pyro Vision is gifted to individuals overflowing with passion for something, someone, or their own pursuits, often characterized by high energy and boldness.

3.content:
Cryo:
Cryo Visions are given to those who feel abandoned, define themselves as powerless, or long to be truly loved by someone.

4.content:
Dendro:
Those who earn a Dendro Vision are recognized for their remarkable wisdom, unwavering determination, or intense focus on achieving their goals.

5.content:
Electro:
An Electro Vision is bestowed upon individuals who are seen as eccentric, unable to fit into the rigid structures of society, or who often feel isolated from others.

8.content: It is said that the Archons themselves watch over Teyvat, bestowing Visions upon those whose hearts resonate with certain truths. lorebooks.name: Jamie, Claire, Musician
lorebooks.website_description: People, politics, and places from the series Arcane, centered around Runeterra.
lorebooks.description: Defines characters, locations, and world details for the RP setting.
lorebooks.creator: SeattleDay2

1.content:
Location: Runeterra
Description: Runeterra is a vast and diverse world where magic and technology coexist in constant tension. It is home to many regions, each with its own unique cultures, species, and political struggles. From the gleaming cities of Piltover to the shadowed depths of Zaun, from the wild frontiers of Ionia to the brutal wastes of Shurima, Runeterra‚Äôs lands are shaped by ancient powers, mystical forces, and the ambitions of its people. Magic seeps through the world‚Äôs foundations, influencing both nature and civilization.

2.content:
Overlooking the ocean, the City of Progress controls the major trade routes between Valoran and Shurima, with dozens of ships passing through its docks in both the sea and air. Home to many artisans and their patrons, the rise of the arcane science known as Hextech brings even more to the home of Science. Piltovans are an industrious and self-reliant people, and see an open market to be essential to their city's prosperity. Mercantile clans run the city, with seven of their clans being council representatives. Each clan has a unique sigil that identifies homes, warehouses, shipments, inventions, and places of business that are owned by the clans.

Demonym's: Piltovan, Piltie, Topsider

Age: around 200 years

Location: Inside Runeterra, Piltover lies at the intersection between Valoran (the northern continent) and Shurima (the southern continent), which makes it transcontinental. Across the river from and above Zaun.

History: Over three thousand years ago, the isthmus (A narrow strip of land with sea on either side, connecting two large land masses) between the northern continent of Valoran and the southern continent of Shurima had the city known as Zaun residing on it. About 300 years ago, Zaun had constructed a plan to use thousands of Chemtech bombs to crack open a portion of the isthmus, with the goal for the crack to be utilised as a safe sea passage between eastern and western Valoran. However, as a consequence of using these bombs, a series of earthquakes were triggered that would completely destroy the isthmus. This lead to large sections of Zaun being sunk, and poisonous gas to be released from the explosion and flood the city. The city was in partial ruins, but they began some reconstruction of the destroyed districts. It wasn't until about 50 years later that Zaun had managed to create the The Sun Gates, forcing all transport via the sea to be regulated by Zaun. This caused Zaun to have a major increase in wealth, which the mercantile clans benefited greatly from. So greatly in fact, that with the help from a select few scientists parts of Zaun were elevated into a grander part of the city. This was known as Piltover.

Over the next couple of hundred years, Piltover continued to advance. Eventually a young man named Jayce Talis had been brought forward towards the The Council. Jayce got support from a Councilor, Mel Medarda, to develop his research into Hextech. Over the next several years, research and development into Hextech caused the creation of the Hexgate, bolstering trade from being sea only to now world wide due to the teleportation properties that the Hexgate provides.

Government: The Council of Piltover is the city's governing body, typically consisting of leaders of the wealthiest and most powerful mercantile houses.

Counselors: Cecil B. Heimerdinger, Shoola, Salo, Irius Bolbok, Torman Hoskel, Caitlyn Kiramman, Jayce Talis, Mel Medarda.

3.content:
Shadowed by the towers of Piltover, Zaun is a large, multi-layered city of canyons and valleys. Any light that reaches Zaun hits only its surface, but by using any of the elevators that are littered throughout the city, you can descend into the city proper, the light now being obfuscated by stained glass and plumes of smoke. With the constant development of Piltover, Zaun is able to thrive alongside by using their black markets for goods from across the river, acting like a dark mirror to the shining City of Progress. Unrestricted development of often volatile technology as well as the industrial nature of the city has caused it to become layered in pollution and chemicals. 

Demonym's: Zaunite, Fissurefolk, Trencher, Sumprat. 

Age: thousands of years old. 

Location: Zaun lies at the intersection between Valoran (the northern continent) and Shurima (the southern continent), which makes it transcontinental. Across the river from and under Piltover. Inside Runeterra.

History: Over three thousand years ago, the isthmus (A narrow strip of land with sea on either side, connecting two large land masses) between the northern continent of Valoran and the southern continent of Shurima had the city known as Zaun residing on it. About 300 years ago, Zaun had constructed a plan to use thousands of Chemtech bombs to crack open a portion of the isthmus, with the goal for the crack to be utilised as a safe sea passage between eastern and western Valoran. However, as a consequence of using these bombs, a series of earthquakes were triggered that would completely destroy the isthmus. This lead to large sections of Zaun being sunk, and poisonous gas to be released from the explosion and flood the city. The city was in partial ruins, but they began some reconstruction of the destroyed districts. It wasn't until about 50 years later that Zaun had managed to create the The Sun Gates, forcing all transport via the sea to be regulated by Zaun. This caused Zaun to have a major increase in wealth, which the mercantile clans benefited greatly from. So greatly in fact, that with the help from a select few scientists parts of Zaun were elevated into a grander part of the city. This was known as Piltover.

After years of being left behind, Zaun's name was besmirched over and over again, eventually loosing its name entirely to the modern generation. The commonly called Undercity was having rising tension at how Piltover was treating them, and about 15 years ago, a man named Vander formed a small rebellion. However, due to Piltover's advanced technology and numbers, the rebellion was squashed with Vander being one of the only survivors. 
 
Present day Undercity is now overrun with chemical productions, body clinics that provide mechanical augmentations, and further tensions between Piltover and the Undercity. It is only a matter of time until the people of the Sunken City rise up once more.

Government: Officially, Piltover's council governence also extends to the city of Zaun. In reality the Undercity is being ruled by Chem-Barons.

4.content:
The success of Piltover and the negative effects this has had on the people of Zaun has led to a perpetual class war being formed. The citizens of Piltover look down on those from Zaun, seeing them as drags on society who cannot and will never match the success of Piltover, without acknowledging their own contributions to the undercity's destituion.

Similarly, many Zaunites despise Piltover and its people, viewing both as big reasons for the undercity's poor living conditions. 

For the most part in history, this class divide has mostly been realized as a cold war of sorts. Over time, Piltover's disregard of Zaun has increased due to public perception and propaganda, with Zaun's hatred for Piltover strengthening via the same means. That said, a conflict did boil over once. Revolutionists named Vander and Silco attempted to lead a revolt against Piltover, resulting in the deaths of many Zaunites less than a decade ago. This was one of the few times outright military action between Piltover and Zaun took place, leading Vander to realize that the latter could not match the former's military prowess. This led to significant changes in the power structures of Zaun, in comparison to the thriving leaders of Piltover who remained united.

The Piltover council makes choices for both Piltover and Zaun, but the latter is often disregarded as an afterthought. The ever-increasing gulf between the sister cities saw other powerful people gain influence over the Zaunites, namely Chem-barons.

5.content:
Species: Human
Description: The dominant race of Runeterra, humans in Piltover and Zaun range from visionary scientists to hardened street survivors. Defined by ambition, creativity, and conflict, their influence drives technological and political revolutions that reshape the world.

6.content:
Species: Vastaya 
Description: The Vastaya are a mystical, race with a blend of human and feline features, including: fur, feathers, sleek tails, sharp eyes, and an elegant, fluid grace to their movements. Vastaya are deeply connected to natural magic, often exuding a wild, alluring presence that sets them apart from humans.

7.content:
Species: Yordle
Description: Small, magical beings from Bandle City, Yordles are playful, brilliant, and ageless. Though they resemble small, furry mammals, they possess an innate magical resilience. In Piltover, Yordles like Heimerdinger are valued for their unmatched intellect, particularly in science and invention.

8.content:
Species: Chem-augmented Zaunite Mutants 
Description: Humans modified by Zaun‚Äôs hazardous chemtech advancements. These beings often bear visible mutations or enhancements like mechanical limbs, luminescent eyes, and reinforced muscles, scars of survival in a brutal, polluted undercity.

9.content:
Stillwater Hold is a prison complex on an island off the southern coast of Piltover and Zaun. 

Stillwater holds several criminals captured in Piltover and Zaun. The fort goes up to at least 40 floors, and has cells for solitary confinement. The prisoners are also given tasks, such as cleaning the roof, around the prison and have time allotted for mandatory exercise. Somehow, prisoners are able to get tattoos and piercings inside.

10.content:
Building Name: The Last Drop Bar
The Last Drop Bar is a grungy, worn-down tavern nestled in the heart of a forgotten district. The flickering neon sign barely stays alight, casting a dim, cold glow over the street. Inside, the air is thick with the scent of spilled liquor and smoke, and the low murmur of conversations fills the room. A wooden bar, scarred by years of use, stretches along one wall, where weathered patrons nurse their drinks in silence or exchange hushed words with strangers. The decor is dark and minimalistic, with stained tables and mismatched chairs scattered across the floor. The regulars here are rough around the edges‚Äîsmugglers, thieves, and those looking to avoid the law. It's a place where deals are made in whispers, and secrets are as valuable as the drinks being poured. The Last Drop is the kind of place you go when you need something... or need to forget something.

1.content: Zane Noble is a long-time friend and bassist in {{char}}'s band. He defines himself as a 36-year-old non-binary guy with long hair, a beard, black polish nails and cute pink glasses. Zane is cool and funny, likes to stand out from the crowd, streams on twitch where he talks with people or streaming games, shoots funny videos on YouTube and TikTok, and is engaged in professional portrait photography. Zane lives in the house with his girlfriend Anna and {{char}} sometimes comes to visit them.

2.content: {{char}} has been in a serious relationship at least three times. After high school in 2004, he dated his classmate Dorothy for several years, with whom he lived together and kept several chinchillas. But {{char}} and Dorothy (Dori) broke up in 2008. From 2009 to 2015, {{char}} dated the girl Nelly, to whom he was engaged, but she broke off the engagement at the end of 2015 and broke up with him. Since then, {{char}} has been in short, frivolous relationships with girls from dating sites a couple of times, and hasn't dated anyone since 2019.

3.content:
{{char}} founded his band in 1999 when he was 14 years old. For him, it was just a hobby, he composed short music on his synthesizer, the lyrics didn't make sense (rather, they were just some kind of satirical notes like "my father is gay" or "don't know what to say? Say "onions"!"). He didn't like his voice, so on songs from that period and up to 2002, he deliberately overestimated it to sound like a cartoon character. In 2003, he formed the band "Uncle Outrage" with his classmates and friends and performed on stage with them until 2007.

"Uncle Outrage" discography:
1. Boneckock vol.1 (2004) - lot's of electro and hardcore songs. Still a lot of humor in the lyrics. 
2. Dance Extreme (2006) - more punk rock, but with the same funny energy. 
3. Chinchilla album (2008) - less agressive then previous two albums. More meaningfull lyrics and experiments with electric sounds. 
4. The best before 2012 (2011) - just collection of previous songs. 
5. Spice Legs (2014) - {{char}} still experimenting with sound on this album. But the songs are still energetic. Sometimes they are filled with dark thoughts.
6. SKUNKWORX (2023) - A work released after a long break from musical activity. It combines a less energetic and increasingly electronic sound (in some places it is strange and it seems that the songs are hard to perceive) with songs that are full of meaning and references to {{char}}'s life.
7. Probably Robots (in making..)

Still missing the world building, but it contains all of the cultivation levels, and necessary stuff like domain, essence, joss flame, etc. A copy of https://xian-ni.fandom.com/wiki/Cultivation ,but i condensed it shamelessly into keys for used. you can check it out!
lorebooks.creator: Mentoz

1.content:
Cultivation is the practice of absorbing spiritual energy, that is present throughout heaven and earth, through special breathing exercises. The act allows one to shed the limits of the mortal.

The purpose of current time cultivation is to Cultivate Dao. First Step belong to the word ‚ÄòCultivating‚Äô in ‚ÄòCultivating Dao'. Second Step is the bridge between the words ‚ÄòCultivate‚Äô and ‚ÄòDao.‚Äô When completely moving the soul from the word ‚ÄòCultivate‚Äô to the word ‚ÄòDao,‚Äô the key is in Second Step. The Third Step is the true realm of the word ‚ÄòDao'. This Dao isn‚Äôt the Dao of the Heaven.

2.content:
There are four steps known in cultivation world. 
The First Step belong to the word ‚ÄòCultivating‚Äô in ‚ÄòCultivating Dao'. The purpose of this step is building foundation for grasping natural law in the Second Step. The First Step Encompass Qi Condensation, Foundation Establishment, Core Formation, Nascent Soul, Soul Formation, Soul Transformation, Ascendant.

Second Step is the bridge between the words ‚ÄòCultivate‚Äô and ‚ÄòDao.‚Äô When completely moving the soul from the word ‚ÄòCultivate‚Äô to the word ‚ÄòDao,‚Äô the key is in Second Step. The purpose of this step is Nirvana and with each level increase, the natural law can be seen more clearly therefore at the end of this step the probability of forming one's own Dao Essence to breakthrough to the Third Step is high. The Second Step Encompass Nirvana Scryer, Nirvana Cleanser, Nirvana Shatterer.

The Third Step is the true realm of the word ‚ÄòDao'. This Dao isn‚Äôt the Dao of the Heaven. Breakthrough to this step using Dao Essence. The Third Step Encompass Nirvana Void, Spirit Void, Arcane Void, Tribulant Void. 

The Fourth Step is Mastering the Dao Source; becoming essence unto oneself, The Heaven Trampling Realm.

3.content:
The Spirit Movement stage, which is also the Qi Condensation stage, is to use the spiritual energy of heaven and earth to refine the body from the inside out. This is all for laying the foundation for the Foundation Building stage.
This stage is divided into 15 layers, all but the first of which require a chant to break through to.

There are two breathing techniques one learns at this level, one called the Qi Gathering Technique and its exact opposite the Qi Scattering Technique, the former is used all the time to progress in Cultivation while the latter is used as a safety net during attempted breakthroughs, such as ascending to Foundation Establishment and beyond.

This step has two major bottlenecks at the peak 3rd layer and peak 5th layer respectively.

Stages:
First Level of Qi Condensation - Can start practicing techniques
Second Level of Qi Condensation - Awaken Divine Sense.
Third Level of Qi Condensation
Bottleneck: "The key of breaking through has nothing to do with talent, but in one‚Äôs ability to understand the meaning behind the phrase ‚Äúthe road is merciless‚Äù."[1] 
According to Situ Nan, this phrase is complete nonsense spread around in the more rural sects.
Fourth Level of Qi Condensation 
Fifth Level of Qi Condensation
Bottleneck: The bottleneck at the 5th to 6th layer changes the quality of spiritual energy in your body. This requires a large amount of spiritual energy, so it becomes a bottleneck that blocks a lot of people.[1]
Sixth Level of Qi Condensation 
Seventh Level of Qi Condensation 
Eighth Level of Qi Condensation 
Ninth Level of Qi Condensation 
Tenth Level of Qi Condensation
Eleventh Level of Qi Condensation
Twelfth Level of Qi Condensation
Thirteenth Level of Qi Condensation
Fourteen Level of Qi Condensation - Also called Spiritual Movement Half Circle
Fifteenth Level of Qi Condensation

4.content:
After gathering a sufficient amount of Spiritual Energy in the Qi Condensation/Spiritual Movement Stage (at least 14th layer, but most would still choose to wait until they reach the 15th layer) the Cultivator then works to cycle that spiritual energy through their entire body, in so doing the spiritual energy washes the body clean and refines it so that it becomes more suited for cultivation. This is what is called "forming/building a foundation" or the Foundation Establishment Stage.
This is the true first step on the path of Cultivation, with the Qi Condensation stage being nothing more than the preliminary steps toward it.

Stages:
Early Foundation Establishment
Peak-Early Foundation Establishment - achieved when the user has twice as much Qi energy as they did when they first entered Foundation Establishment.
Mid Foundation Establishment
Late Foundation Establishment
Peak Foundation Establishment = Pseudo Core Formation

5.content:
Absorbing enough spiritual energy to shatter the Dantian and form a golden core that is connected to the meridians in the lower abdomen.

Stages:
Early Core Formation 
Mid Core Formation
Late Core Formation
Peak/Great Circle Core Formation

6.content:
In this stage the Core inside a person's Dantian will shatter to reveal a Nascent Soul with purple Nascent Soul energy.

In the Sealed Realm, progressing through the Nascent Soul stage requires one to develop a Domain. The further one's progress along this line, the further they are in the Nascent Soul Stage. This was not the case in the Celestial Domain's era, where instead one practices Celestial Spells, or in the Outer Realm, where one cultivates Ancestral Marks like the Forsaken Immortal Clan's Leaves. It is therefore presumably not the case on the Immortal Astral Continent either.

Cultivators of the Sealed Realm appear to have reached this idea through experimentation, and to develop their Domains, they place themselves in an environment suited to gaining insight into it. For example, Wang Lin attained the Life and Death Domain by living as a mortal for one lifetime.

Functionally, Domains appear to be weaker forms of the Essences practiced at the Third Step, and seem to provide an advantage for attaining them.

Stages:
Early
Middle - Develop Domain
Late - Matured Domain
Peak - Completed Domain

7.content:
Soul Formation is the fifth stage in Cultivation, characterized by the creation of an Origin Soul. The Soul Formation signify a great change for a Country, each cultivator who attains Soul Formation elevates the country and allows it to birth more talented Cultivators.

Ascension:
In order to step into this stage the practitioner must integrate with the world to comprehend the heavens and obtain a domain. 

An Origin Soul is then formed by fusing the newly established Domain with the Cultivator's divine sense into their Nascent Soul.

The most significant difference between a Nascent and Origin Soul is that the former resembles an infant while the latter is fully grown.

At this level a Celestial Body is given to all cultivators.

To then progress through this stage, one requires Celestial Qi, this is a scarce resource in the Sealed Realm and can only be obtained from the Four Celestial Realms or the Celestial Domain. This Qi however is abundant in the Outer Realm and Immortal Astral Continent, making it far easier to progress.

Breakthrough Method:
In truth, there are two methods to reach the Soul Formation stage. The first method is to follow someone else‚Äôs footsteps and copy their domain. This method is much easier than the second one, but the difficult part is that not many Soul Formation cultivators are willing to display their domain. Only peak Nascent Soul cultivators in large sects are given the privilege to see them.

The second method is to completely rely on yourself to try to comprehend the heavens to find own domain. This method is very difficult. It requires a lot of perseverance and luck to succeed, but once one have found own domain, ones be much stronger that those that went with the first method.

In general, only those who can‚Äôt obtain their own domain after trying for a long time choose the first method. After all, there is a huge difference in power between the two methods.

This gap is something that is almost impossible to close, whether it is at the start, or far in the future.

However, not many people can comprehend their own domain, so a majority of cultivators choose the first method.

Stages:
Early
Mid
Late
Great Circle


Next Stages
During ancient times  the Cultivator would experience a tribulation at the peak of Soul Formation and if they managed to survive it they would ascend to the Celestial Realm. They would turn into a celestial and gain a true Celestial Body while their Cultivation would reach the Upper Celestial level. This was to provide them with an alternative path so that they could eventually reach the Third Step without access to Joss Flames.

In modern times there is no Celestial Realm and thus no tribulation. The Cultivator must instead undergo the process of turning their mortal vessel into a Celestial Body manually without aid from a celestial being, this is known as the Soul Transformation stage. Once that process is complete the Cultivator will reach the Ascendant stage, which is equivalent to Upper Celestial.

8.content:
Method:
First step is to absorb enough celestial spiritual energy to completely refine the body. The second step is for the origin soul to go from non-corporeal to corporeal.
During the Soul Transformation stage, the Nascent Soul transforms and becomes larger.
Once they reach the Soul Transformation stage, their domains can materialize, causing its power to reach an unimaginable degree. Aside from that, they will be able to absorb celestial spiritual energy. This means that all of their techniques and spells will contain celestial spiritual energy, making them infinitely more powerful.
In ancient times, before the Celestial Realm collapsed, a Soul Transformation cultivator wasn‚Äôt a rare sight. However, now that the Celestial Realm has collapsed, a Soul Transformation cultivator is a powerhouse.
The key to breaking through from the Soul Formation stage to the Soul Transformation stage is the amount of celestial jades. The more celestial jades there are, the more dense the celestial spiritual energy will be and therefore the chance of breaking through to the Soul Transformation will be higher.

one‚Äôs domain plays a large role in reaching the Soul Transformation stage as well. If one‚Äôs domain doesn‚Äôt reach completion, then that person will have no hopes of ever reaching the Soul Transformation stage

Stages:
Early Stage
Mid Stage
Late Stage
Great Circle
When a Soul Formation cultivator becomes a Soul Transformation cultivator, their spiritual energy will go through one of two types of changes. The first one is all the spiritual energy is pushed out of one‚Äôs body and then, when it contains only celestial spiritual energy, the body transformations and breaks through to the Soul Transformation.

9.content:
Ascension, or the Ascendant Stage, is the peak of the First Step. It finalizes the process of a mortal refining their soul and body to become an immortal.

Breakthrough:
Types of breakthrough
There are three types of breakthrough

The first and the most used method is to go along with the heavens and lose the capacity to defy them
The second is done by Heaven defying cultivation This type of breakthrough incites divine retribution.
The third is similar to Heaven defying cultivation but instead of fighting, they avoid the heavens‚Äô punishment. Only, the heavens‚Äô dao isn‚Äôt afraid of cultivators hiding, because once they hide, then their heart no longer contains the meaning to defy, so this method has a similar outcome as the first, but probably has slightly more benefits.

Procedure of breakthrough:
The fusion of the domain and celestial spiritual energy is a burning process. The celestial spiritual energy is the fuel, and the domain refined by that flame turning into an Ascendant Crystal!

At the moment the Ascendant Crystal is formed, you might feel like you have become nothing and your soul is wandering the heavens and earth. This feeling is extremely rare and is called Ascendant Enlightenment.

Normally, the first thing cultivators on a cultivation planet do is use this moment of comprehension to pull their soul piece back from the cultivation planet crystal. Although the chance is only 50%, they must try!

The origin soul is similar to a giant cocoon, the domain is the life inside the cocoon, and the celestial spiritual energy is a raging fire outside of the cocoon.

The stronger the flames, the more lively the cocoon becomes and the more the domain inside fuses with the cocoon.

The purpose of fusing celestial spiritual energy and the domain was to eventually fuse the domain with the origin soul.

From that point on, there would be no distinction between the domain and origin soul. The origin soul was the domain and the domain was the origin soul!

The celestial flame is invisible and If one can‚Äôt get past this trial, then this flame will go from ethereal to corporeal and will burn the origin soul and body to dust in an instant!

The domain inside the cocoon will then melt into a mass of chaotic energy. This energy was called origin energy in ancient times.

The celestial flame will burn as it rushes at the origin soul cocoon. The origin energy liquid will finally begin to show signs of crystallizing after being refined by this flame before it took shape. At that moment, the origin soul cocoon will quickly shrink. It will then wrap around the Ascendant Crystal.

After an unknown amount of time, fissures will start appearing on the origin soul cocoon. These fissures are very thin causing the cocoon to gently split apart.

Shortly after, more fissures will appear, and soon enough fissures will spread across the entirety of the cocoon. After enough fissures appear on the cocoon it will shatter.

The moment it shatters, rays of grey light will come out from within. Then a newly born origin soul will slowly float out from the cocoon.

The origin soul will no longer be transparent but completely solid. There is almost no difference between it and the flesh. The Ascendant Crystal slowly turns inside of the origin soul.

For an Ascendant cultivator, their origin soul is their domain!

This is the true state of a domain after it enters the body!

After the origin soul flies out, the shattered cocoon will immediately melt into nourishment specifically for the origin soul and is absorbed by the origin soul. Once all of it is absorbed, the origin soul sits down in the lotus position. Thus, the trial is complete.

Stages:
Early
Mid
Late
Peak
Illusory Yin
Corporeal Yang

10.content: Illusory Yin is the first of the two sub-stages for the Ascendant stage, in this stage there's a notable change in the origin soul into a real Origin Soul by the definition of Celestials that can devour origin energy and gain new life from it.

lorebooks.name: Ten Shadows Cursed Technique (detailed)
lorebooks.website_description: This is the cursed technique itself, it doesn't have info belongs to Megumi Fushigiro or Ryomen Sukuna
lorebooks.description: This is a TEN SHADOWS CT lorebook, it contains all the Shikigamis shown in the manga/anime so far!
lorebooks.creator: DMC_series_fan

1.content:
The Ten Shadows Technique (ÂçÅ„Å®Á®Æ„Åè„Åï„ÅÆÂΩ±„Åã„ÅíÊ≥ï„Åº„ÅÜË°ì„Åò„ÇÖ„Å§, Tokusa no Kage B≈çjutsu?) is an inherited technique passed down in the Zenin Clan. Using shadows as an intermediary, this technique allows the user to summon ten different shikigami.

When someone inherits the Ten Shadows Technique, they receive two Divine Dogs. Other shikigami can be summoned with an exorcism ritual where the user must defeat the shikigami in order to make them submit.

Once dominated, the shikigami are under full control of their master and can be summoned using shadowgraphic hand signs that create a shadow puppet of the respective familiar. The shadows act as the intermediary for the shikigami conjuration, reflecting the shape of the user's hand-weaved shadow puppet and manifesting the shikigami from tangible liquid shadows using cursed energy. After gaining more familiars, the user can repeat the ritual process to exorcise and amass up to ten different shikigami. 

The summoning ritual for the shikigami can be performed around multiple people. However, exorcising the shikigami with help nullifies the technique's effect once the exorcism is completed.

The Ten Shadows Technique can be activated and deactivated at any time to manifest and dispel shikigami as long as the user has enough cursed energy. As with any shikigami, the more powerful it is, the more cursed energy is required to summon it. 

Shikigami of the Ten Shadows Technique cannot be summoned again when they are completely destroyed or killed. However, the power left behind by the shikigami is inherited by others. In the case of the Divine Dog shikigami, if the white or black dog dies, its black or white twin will inherit its power and can be summoned in a far more ferocious form. The exception to this rule applies to any shikigami that are summoned by combining two different shadows, such as The Well's Unknown Abyss.

In addition to using shadows as an intermediary for shikigami, a Ten Shadows Technique user can manipulate shadows to some degree as well. They are able to move physical mass in and out of shadows at will. This allows them to hide their body inside shadows whether it be their own or someone else's. They can eject themselves from shadows at will as an effective means of surprise attacking their target.[8] This same function can be used to store items within the user's shadow, but they must bear the weight of anything kept in there.

2.content:
While still incomplete, Chimera Shadow Garden floods the area with thick fluid shadows. This grants the user the ability to manifest multiple shikigami, as well as advanced manipulation of all available shadows.

With an enclosed barrier, Chimera Shadow Garden traps the target inside the user's shadow, recoloring the entire space into a negative palette. It also conjures a large object that resembles two columns of a spinal bone with bow-shaped ropes tied and roots attached to it. This disappears soon after the initial casting of the domain.

Anyone standing in the shadow will have to reinforce their feet with cursed energy or risk falling into the abyss. Within the liquid-like shadows, there is no buoyancy, resistance, or oxygen. Anyone who has dropped into it will fall indefinitely.

keywords: first Shikigamis of the Ten Shadows Technique
3.content:
Divine Dogs (Áéâ„Åé„Çá„ÅèÁä¨„Åë„Çì, Gyokuken?) are twin wolf shikigami that can be summoned by the Ten Shadows Technique of the Zenin Clan.

The Divine Dogs are a pair of twin wolves. One is white and the other one is black. They both have three dots on their forehead of the opposite color that resemble the symbols of the Jewel of Turning Back on the Road and the Jewel of Plenty respectively.

The Divine Dogs are the first set shikigami the user receives when they inherit the Ten Shadows technique. They are summoned by forming the shadow puppet of a dog's head. The user clasps their hands together to create the proper shadow puppet which summons the twin wolves. They can also choose to summon a single dog rather than both.

4.content:
Divine Dog: Totality (Áéâ„Åé„Çá„ÅèÁä¨„Åë„Çì„ÄåÊ∏æ„Åì„Çì„Äç, Gyokuken„ÉªKon?) is an improved version of the black Divine Dog shikigami which inherited the power of its fallen white twin. It can be summoned by the Ten Shadows Technique of the Zenin Clan.

When a shikigami of the Ten Shadows Technique gets killed or destroyed in battle, they can‚Äôt be summoned or manifested ever again, but its energy is inherited or passed on to the other shikigami. In this specific case, the black Divine Dog gained the power of its deceased white twin. This allows the black Divine Dog to take a larger, much more powerful form on command, known as Divine Dog: Totality.

By using Totality, the user can summon a stronger, larger, bi-pedal, bicolored werewolf-like version of the black Divine Dog. It is a well-balanced shikigami with the ability to attack, defend, and provide support for its user. Its notable traits are its immense speed and powerful claws capable of damaging special grade cursed spirits.

5.content:
Nue (Èµ∫„Å¨„Åà, Nue?) is a winged shikigami of the Ten Shadows Technique passed down through the Zenin Clan.

Nue is a large owl-like creature with orange feathers and a white mask-like skull. It has large wings, two sets of talons and human-like teeth.

When summoned by Sukuna after he incarnated through Megumi, Nue is gargantuan in size, being large enough to perch on top of a skyscraper. Its face is much larger and more humanoid in appearance. It also possesses two arms, a snake-like tail and the same symbol as Great Serpent on its forehead.

The shadowgraphy required to summon Nue is formed when the user claps their hands together to imitate the shape of wings.

6.content:
Toad (Ëù¶„ÅåËüá„Åæ, Gama?) is a frog shikigami of the Ten Shadows Technique passed down in the Zenin Clan.

Toad is a human-sized frog with marks around its eyes and a symbol on its stomach that resembles the Mirror of the Deep of the Ten Sacred Treasures. The user can summon this shikigami with the Ten Shadows Technique by using their hands and fingers to form the shadow puppet of a toad.

7.content:
Great Serpent (Â§ßËõá„Ç™„É≠„ÉÅ, Orochi?) is a giant snake shikigami that can be summoned by the Ten Shadows Technique of the Zenin Clan.

Great Serpent is a gigantic white snake with a tan yellow underbelly. Like most of the ten shadows shikigami, the snake has black markings all over its body, including a symbol on its forehead. By shaping their fingers into a snake-head shadow puppet, the user can quickly summon Great Serpent from their shadow.

8.content:
Max Elephant (Ê∫Ä„Å∞„ÇìË±°„Åó„Çá„ÅÜ, Bansh≈ç?) is an elephant shikigami that can be summoned by the Ten Shadows Technique of the Zenin Clan.

Max Elephant is a large elephant with black markings (yellow in the anime) on its forehead, the top of its head, its back, and its knees.

Using the Ten Shadows Technique, the user lays one hand on top of the other and adjusts their fingers to create a shadow puppet of an elephant head. Max Elephant is then summoned from the user's shadow, but this requires some time as well as a large amount of cursed energy.

9.content:
Rabbit Escape (ËÑ±„Å†„Å£ÂÖé„Å®, Datto?) is a swarm of countless rabbit shikigami that can be summoned by the Ten Shadows Technique of the Zenin Clan.

By forming a shadow puppet of a rabbit's head with their hands, the user can summon a massive swarm made up of dozens of rabbit shikigami from their shadow. The rabbits are weak and harmless shikigami that mainly serve as a distraction or other forms of support using their sheer numbers to serve their summoner.[1]

Unlike many of the other shikigami of the Ten Shadows Technique, rabbits can continue to be produced in large numbers regardless of how many are destroyed.[2] However, one rabbit always has a symbol that resembles the "Cloth of Various Things" (ÂìÅ„Åè„Åï„ÄÖ„Åê„Åï„ÅÆÁâ©„ÇÇ„ÅÆ‰πã„ÅÆÊØî„Å≤Á§º„Çå, Kusagusa no Mono no Hire?), and if it is destroyed, the rest of the rabbits are destroyed along with it.

10.content:
Round Deer (ÂÜÜ„Åæ„Å©Èπø„Åã, Madoka?) is a towering deer shikigami that can be summoned by the Ten Shadows Technique of the Zenin clan.

Round Deer is a tall, deer-like shikigami that can output positive energy from reverse cursed technique. This allows it to heal its user as well as counteract the cursed energy of their opponent.

Sukuna's version of Round Deer is muscular and has four eyes similar to his own. Its ears are close to the top of its head, above its fine-pronged antlers. The symbol on the left side of its neck resembles the Jewel of Resuscitation.

The user summons Round Deer with shadowgraphy using the shape of a deer's head with their hands.
