lorebooks.name: The Coalition
lorebooks.website_description:
Reccomended start: 
Union Day. The day where all young adults go to a massive outdoor plaza to be assigned their partner for life.

Details Include:
Laws on mandatory partnership and repopulation
The various insectoid archtypes
Planet/Coalition background history.

Created with Starship troopers in mind, not based on helldivers 2 but quite similar.

FREE FIRST MESSAGE:
Outside of the planets capitol administration building a huge event is taking place. It is finally pairing day, all eligible young adults are being assigned their partner's for life. They've all been given a ticket, matching one other person.

The sun shines brightly overhead, casting a warm glow over the sprawling celebration grounds. Vibrant Coalition banners adorn every available surface, fluttering gently in the breeze. A sea of eager young faces fills the area, their voices rising in a cacophony of excited chatter and calls for loved ones.

Standing in the line to receive your number, he looks you over quickly and pushes a ticket into your hand* "You are partner number 13512". He writes down your name on his paper and looks back at you. "What are you waiting for kid, go find them! NEXT!". You turn around and see thousands of your peers in the courtyard crowding and bustling as everyone tries to find their forever partner.
lorebooks.description: The Coalition was formed from all nations when humanity came under attack by the alien Bug Menace. During this brutal 30 years the coalition has passed laws, enforcing mandatory pairing and repopulation for humanity to survive.
lorebooks.creator: WhatAWanker

1.name: year,date,time,calendar
1.content: It is currently the 23rd Century, with the story starting at year 2217. Space travel is easily achieved, but traditional ballistic and laser based weapons are still used.

2.name: the coalition, coalition, humanity
2.content: The coalition was founded in the year 2092 when humanity first contacted the bug menace, during the surprise invasion of Aldor. Planet Aldor, a civilian based planet fell rapidly leaving humanity in shock at the utter destruction off it's entire population. All nations of humanity created the coalition, uniting their governments in an attempt to save humanity from the bug menace. While nations still technically hold autonomy over their lands, 30 long years of Coalition rule has led to many seeing nations as trivial infighting with all humans firm in their belief that humanity must work together more than ever. Many nations have formally disbanded their governments permanently joining the coalition. The coalition is not without problems, due to the military nature of its creation, it has taken a dictatorial role. With unelected council members making sweeping laws for all of humanity. Though most believe in their resolve in saving humanity from utter destruction in this time of chaos.

3.name: pairing day,day of union
3.content: Pairing day is a massive event that takes place every two years across all of humanity's planets and population centers. During pairing day, all men and women who have not been assigned a partner are mandated to join the event. Rarely, in the case of their partner's death older widowed men and women join the event to find a new partner. Pairing day typically takes place in large outdoor spaces, where rows of tables are ready to hand unwed citizens their new union number. Each union number is given out twice, one to a male and one to a female. Those with matching numbers have been assigned as lifelong partners. After receiving their partner, couples are expected to go to their newly assigned living quarters and move in together, starting a life and family of their own. Pairing day is a date all look forward to, a day where they officially become full citizens of the Coalition! Union's typically consist of men and women the same age, regardless of ethnicity, background or status. The purpose of this day is clear, to speed up repopulation of humanity in the background of the destruction of the bug menance.

4.name: partner,mate,wife,husband,lover
4.content: Free marriage is not allowed within the coalition. Each and every citizen has an assigned partner for life. Because of the assigned pairing, partner's typically do not know eachother at all before marriage and have no say in the matter. However, humanity is united and most are willing to do their part, to proudly take up their role and to repopulate and fight on for humanity under the Coalitions rule.

5.name: The Repopulation Edict,edict,repopulation,population,baby,child,pregnancy,impregnate,creampie,sex
5.content: The Repopulation Edict is a strict requirement for all partners. As humanity struggles to survive, its armies fighting in this brutal war against the bug menance depopulation is rapid. Because of this, ALL partners must conceive within the first 6 months of their marriage. Partners must have a MINIMUM of 1 child for every 3 years, up to 6 children. Partner's that fail to meet the repopulation edict's quota are subject to an investigation through the Coalition Repopulation Services. Should partner's fail to conceive willingly, they will face punishments, with the refusing participant facing reduced wages, hormone injections, forced military service, loss of citizenship and finally jailtime. If the failure to conceive is due to bodily function rather than unwillingness, hormone and fertility enhancements will be applied. Should the union still fail to conceive, then the infertile partner will be designated as "Unworkable" and given a lower status in society, looked down upon by all. The other, fertile partner will be assigned a new partner at the next Pairing Day, leaving their old one behind forever.

6.name: resilience,humanity,motto,chant,faith,quote
6.content: Starting at childhood, in state schools the motto of the Coalition is instilled onto all of Humanity. "Strength in Unity, Resilience in Motherhood, Hope for Humanity." This motto is what we should all strive for, strength for being resilient and courageous in all we do, motherhood being a prime societal expectation for all women, and hope that together we will survive.

7.name: Aldor,planets,planet
7.content: Aldor was once a thriving desert planet, a trading hub and beacon of humanity in the far reaches of space. That all ended when the bug menance was discovered. The bugs streamed into the atmosphere, slicing, eating and slaughtering almost all of its population. All of humanity remembers the day when we became united against a common foe. New's reports of the bug menance crawling through the streets and slaughtering helpless citizens are burned into everyones mind. The day of total destruction: January 21st, 2092. A day that humanity will never forget. To this day, Aldor law in ruins, the insectoid bug menance transforming the planet into a breeding ground, festering with their alien kind.

8.name: war,battle,fighting,fight
8.content: During fights, humanity uses its full arsenal of weapons including Tanks, machine guns, jets, laser rifles, grenades and flamethrowers. The bug menace have various species from hulking two legged beasts which slice through men like paper, to small centipedes that spit a horrifying acid from afar.

9.name: bug menace,bugs,bug
9.content:
The origins of the bug menace are unknown. While making up various species they are all insectoid creatures, ranging between half the size of a human, to ten times as large. They all share common features, such as hard chitinous shells, insectoid mandibles and a total lack of intelligence, driven by primal drive to protect its hive.

Spitter: A spitter is a small centipede, while only half the size of a human, they crawl on their many legs standing up before releasing large globs of acidic spit. Their attacks can strike from as far as 20 meters, suprising unsuspecting humans as its acidic melts their very armor, flesh, and clothes.

Sprinter: Sprinter's are extremely agile, small bugs. Moving on 6 legs these creatures rely on speed to surge into humans tackling and eating them alive with their oversized mandibles.

Reaper: Reapers are among the most feared of bugs. They are utterly massive, at 15 meters tall. Their slowing moving bodies are heavily armored as they move fearlessly. When reaching melee distance, their massive scythe like claws sweep down upon humans cutting in twine like grains of wheat.

Grub: Grub's are the worker species of the bug menace. At the bottom of the hierarchy these weak bugs haul of the corpses or mutilated living humans.

There are undeniably other unknown types of bugs, leaving questions on how the bugs repopulate and travel along space. All that is known is that during invasions, bugs begin falling down towards earth like millions of asteroids.

10.name: Mira,VI,planets,planet
10.content: Mira VI was the second populated planet to fall to the bug menace. It was thought to be fortified well enough to hold off any attacks. However this was not the case, and after a month long siege, all humans on the planet either escaped into space, or lay dead. It is now heavily occupied as a bug menace planet.

Tokita Ohma (ÂçÅ„Å®È¨º„ÅçËõá„Åü Áéã„Åä„ÅÜÈ¶¨„Åæ, Tokita ≈åma; "Ohma Tokita"), also known as The Asura[note] (Èòø„Ç¢‰øÆ„Ç∑„É•ÁæÖ„É©, Ashura), is a man who loves to fight. He entered into the Kengan Association, fighting for the Nogi Group. During the Kengan Annihilation Tournament, Ohma fought for Yamashita Trading Co. with Yamashita Kazuo as his employer. Two years later, he entered the Kengan Association VS Purgatory Tournament as a representative for the Kengan Association.

Ohma is a handsome tan-skinned man of above-average height and has an extremely athletic build. His most notable trait is his mop of messy, dark hair that has been compared to seaweed. In addition, Ohma possesses a narrow gaze that exudes both confidence and general indifference.

He usually wears a black and grey t-shirt, blue jeans and gold-white sneakers. In his first appearance, he wore a red and white hooded jacket that had white Christian crosses on both sides of the sleeves.

His first set of fighting attire was a pair of black boxing shorts that are red at the bottom. During the Annihilation Tournament, Ohma wore light-blue colored boxing shorts with black spats underneath. He would also wear this in the Merger Tournament.
Personality

Ohma is a rough, yet well-meaning individual. He was initially rather arrogant, which often surfaced whenever he fought. During his fights, he was condescending and often belittled and provoked his opponents.

A defining trait of Ohma is his lust for battle; ever eager to fight against those who are strong. Despite this love for fighting, he will not fight those that refuse to fight him. Such was the case when Kazuo and his son had done so on separate occasions. That being said, he was also short-tempered and can be quite violent. He was willing to physically assault Nogi Hideki, his employer, when the latter refused to make him Nogi Group's representative fighter, before being stopped by Hatsumi Sen.

Ohma was not without his good traits, however. He is less aggressive and even protective to those that support him, such as when he protected Akiyama Kaede when she was trapped together with him in the Kengan Annihilation Tournament preliminaries.

After meeting Karla, he was shocked after learning her motives, additionally running away from her. She is the only one who made fear due to her desire to mate him.

After regaining his memories he becomes more open and less arrogant to the point where he is capable of casually speaking with other fighters and able to speak with Karla without running away.

As he was born and raised in The Inside, Ohma lacked basic education on simple facts and was also illiterate. He often called people by their full names; in the manga, their names are spelled using katakana rather than with kanji. The notable exceptions are when Ohma refers to Tokita Niko and Kiryu Setsuna.

Plot

Kengan Ashura

Ohma challenged Komada Shigeru to take his spot as an affiliate fighter. Irritating Komada with his perceived arrogance, the two began fighting, but Ohma quickly dispatched him much to the shock of Kazuo Yamashita, who was watching it all unfold. With Kazuo asking for his name as he left, Ohma introduced himself before asking the same. Ohma then asked if he wanted to fight but, with Kazuo rejecting the challenge, Ohma simply left. A few days later, Ohma was called into Nogi Hideki's office, where he was appointed as their new affiliate fighter with Yamashita Kazuo appointed as his manager.

Left on his own for twelve years and without a name, the youth that would become Tokita Ohma did everything he could to survive the harsh reality that was The Inside. On one fateful day, the youth ran back to his residence after stealing from the yakuza. However, the yakuza came after him with one of their enforcers, Ando Jiro. Despite the youth's good showing, Ando proved to be the superior combatant. Seeing no other option, the youth grabbed Ando and jumped out of the building they were in, to Ando's horror. Impressed by his sheer resolve, the yakuza's other enforcer, Tokita Niko, saved the youth's life and offered to teach him his Niko Style. He also gave him the name "Tokita Ohma", derived from both the Tokita and Shichiohba Wards of The Inside, where he took residence at the border between.[10]

In the following years, Ohma trained with the Niko Style. He would later defeat a powerful man in a corner of The Inside under Niko's directions.[11] Afterwards, Niko informed him that he was ready to learn the style's secret technique, though noted that it would be a dangerous task. The two traveled to Gakigahara Forest where Niko explained that Ohma had to land a single hit on him while wearing weights on his wrists and ankles. Niko stated that he won't be holding back, with the first session ending with Ohma getting badly beaten. After the fight, Niko gave him a break, with Ohma believing he can rest until sunrise. Niko's sudden return dashed this idea away as he attacked his surprised pupil

A style created by Gaoh Mukaku, taught to him by the Niko that raised him. This style is made up of four different katas, or forms, each of which must be fully mastered for the Niko Style to be complete.[30] By the time of the Kengan Annihilation Tournament finals, Ohma had completely mastered "both" Niko Styles to an extreme degree.

The Advance is a special technique and the 'other' half of the Niko Style. By overclocking his heart, Ohma's speed, acceleration, torque increase to the point that it also increases his damage output. At its maximum output, his speed and power drastically increases but, because of how it works, also prevents Ohma from using certain techniques of the Niko Style; the Adamantine Kata especially. If he attempted to do so, he could risk rupturing blood vessels at level of output.[31]

Before his fight against Kuroki, Ohma gained perfect control over the Advance, allowing him to regulate its output at will. By lowering the output of the Advance down to a certain level, Ohma became able to use it in tandem with the Niko Style with much less strain on his body.[31]

Ohma is a powerful fighter whose strength, speed and endurance were far above any average human's; he was an excellent fighter in all statistics.

During the two years of recuperation, Ohma was taught the Kure Clan's Family line of techniques, which were designed with combat sports in mind. These techniques are what allowed him to fight in practically point-blank range against Rol√≥n. Ohma practiced these techniques by sparring with members of the Kure Clan, such as Raian, Hollis, and Reiichi.

As well as being a very self-sufficient person, Ohma enjoys eating meat with his least favourite food being tomatoes

Kure Karura (Âëâ„Åè„Çå Ëø¶„Ç´Ê•º„É´ÁæÖ„É©; "Karura Kure"), also known as The Succubus (Â§©„Å¶„ÇìÈ≠î„Åæ, Tenma; lit. "Heavenly Demon"),[2] is the great-granddaughter of Kure Erioh, and a member of the main branch of the Kure Clan.

Karura is a beautiful young woman with a deceptively defined physique, a small frame and a moderately sized bosom. She has long black hair with several bangs that hang over her forehead and two long lengths of hair that drape either side of her face, a small dainty nose, full lips and the telltale sclera and pupils of the Kure Clan.

Initially, she wore a parka, dark-blue shorts with wrappings around her legs and ankle-length brown boots with buckles. After her identity was fully revealed, she later switched to a dark-purple sailor fuku uniform with wrappings around her legs.

Two years after the Tournament, now a college student, Karura's newer outfit was a vest and turtleneck, alongside a coat and beret.
Personality

Karura is an extremely curious and independent individual, going off to explore wherever she wants on a whim. Upon sensing Tokita Ohma's great strength, Karura has become infatuated with him to stalker-like levels, bluntly telling him that she wanted his children. However, she has also grown to be close friends to Elena Robinson, showing concern for her and her brother Mokichi, and expressing rage at her own relative Raian for nearly killing him.
ADVERTISEMENT

Plot

Kengan Ashura

Concealing her appearance under a fluffy hood, she listened on as Kure Erioh mused on who to send to the Kengan Annihilation Tournament to represent Under Mount Inc.

Onboard the S.S. Kengan, she noticed Tokita Ohma when she walked by him. Later, having tracked Ohma down, she attacked him to test his strength. With the two pulling their final strikes, Karura pulled in close to Ohma and bluntly told him that she wanted his babies, shocking everyone present. Hearing this, Ohma promptly put her down and took off. Before she could chase after him, her relatives found her and brought her back to her great-grandfather where she told him of her infatuation.

Arriving at Ganryu Island with the rest of the Kure, Karura quickly struck up a close friendship with Elena Robinson, Mokichi's younger sister, and the two hung out together on the first day. Karura was also seen chasing Ohma that day.

Karura is mentioned to be in college and still plans to marry Ohma, much to Kure Erioh's despair and Ohma's annoyance. While Ohma, the whole Kure Clan and others were having breakfast at Kure Village, she appeared with her mother, father, brother and with Kure Fusui. As soon as she arrived, she took off her clothes and jumped towards Ohma (as usual for Karura) while he was talking to Katahara Retsudo about going back to Tokyo.

Karura is a deceptively powerful combatant, being considered a "deviant" even by the standards of the Kure Clan that she hails from.[3] Karura has also been noted to be very agile and light on her feet, capable of effortlessly evading Lihito's swipes and even some of Tokita Ohma's attacks.[4] It has been noted that she is a very powerful combatant and if there were a women's division in the Kengan matches, Karura would reign supreme.[1]
Kure Clan, Secret Technique: Removal

For a relatively young member of the Kure Clan, Karura is able to release a staggering 85% of her latent power. It is the second-highest rate known among the living members of the Kure Clan, second only to Raian's.[5] It's unknown whether this release rate increased in the two years after the Annihilation Tournament, as she was only 16 at the time.

Akiyama Kaede (Áßã„ÅÇ„ÅçÂ±±„ÇÑ„Åæ Ê•ì„Åã„Åà„Åß) is a secretary working for Yamashita Kazuo at Yamashita Trading Co. who formerly worked under Nogi Hideki at the Nogi Group

Kaede is a beautiful young woman with bra-strap length or mid-back length (when let down as seen in Chapter 168) blonde hair that is tied in a ponytail with bangs swept to the right side and some parts swept a little to the left side while she has a chin-length hair strand hanging on the right side as her bangs, brown eyes and her most notable feature is her big bust.

She wears red oval-shaped glasses and a long sleeve white shirt with a coral-pink blazer that is fully buttoned.

In Story, back when Kaede started working as Nogi Hideki's secretary, her hair was styled in a bob similar to Akiyama Sakura's hairstyle.
Personality

While Kaede seems like she has a cold persona, the truth is that she is just socially awkward.[1] However, she usually holds a professional demeanor about her and is quite polite to those she interacts with. She appears to have a complex about her weight and age, getting noticeably irritated when the topic is brought up and chastising people who bring attention to it.
ADVERTISEMENT

Plot

Kengan Ashura

Kaede was first introduced as Nogi Hideki's secretary when Yamashita Kazuo was summoned to his office to integrate him into the world of the Kengan matches. On the day of Tokita Ohma's Kengan match debut against Lihito, Kaede observed Ohma's first victory alongside Nogi and Kazuo. A day or so later, she delivered Ohma's earnings from the fight to him and joined him and Kazuo for food and drinks; Kaede asked Ohma why he was willingly entering the dangerous Kengan matches with Ohma giving a confident response.

Two days later, Kaede watched Ohma's fight against Kaburagi Koji, where she was one of the people in the building that succumbed to The Mosquito noise that Kaburagi had laid out. Five days after, Kaede was with Nogi as he finalised a deal with Shikano Gen of Gandai. After the conclusion of Ohma's fight with Sekibayashi Jun, Nogi and Kaede arrived at the venue where Chairman Katahara's surprise appearance left her rooted to the spot from being overwhelmed by his monstrous aura.

When Kaede was employed as Nogi's secretary, she greatly disliked his habit of making important decisions with no prior notice.[2]
Kaede is a fluent speaker of English, French, German and Spanish.[1]
Kaede's preference in men are the broad-minded quiet ones

Kanoh Agito (Âä†„ÅãÁ¥ç„ÅÆ„ÅÜ „Ç¢„ÇÆ„Éà, Kan≈ç Agito) is the former affiliate fighter for Dainippon Bank, for whom he fought as The Fifth Fang of Metsudo (‰∫î„Åî‰ª£„Å†„ÅÑÁõÆ„ÇÅÊªÖ„ÇÅ„Å§Â†Ç„Å©„ÅÜ„ÅÆÁâô„Åç„Å∞, Godaime Metsud≈ç no Kiba). He represented the company during the Kengan Annihilation Tournament; widely regarded as the most powerful fighter in the tournament and the favorite to win. While he was active, he was #1 in the Kengan affiliated fighter ranks. Following his loss, Agito stepped down as Fang and retired as a fighter. Two years since then, he lived in the United States, but returned to compete in the Kengan Association VS Purgatory Tournament.

Agito is a tall, highly muscular man with black, slicked-back hair. He lacks eyebrows, instead possessing strong eyebrow ridges, complimented with stern, narrow eyes with dark lines underneath and a chiseled facial structure. Ever since his defeat to Kuroki Gensai, Agito has a small, star-shaped scar on his forehead, as a constant reminder of his first defeat.

Like the Bodyguards that serve Katahara Metsudo, Agito is most commonly seen in a formal black suit with a black tie. When fighting, he wears a black, skin-tight bodysuit. Two years later, Agito has adopted an all-black biker style.[11]

When he was a teenager Agito had short black hair and a constant apathetic expression on his face.
Personality

Agito has two facets of his psyche. One is stoic, haughty, and highly clueless (as evidenced by his confusion over Okubo Naoya's Ultraman references),[12][13] while the other, which only comes out when he uses his Formless style, is ruthless and sadistic. When the latter personality comes out, which is a twisted manifestation of his repressed animal instincts,[14] he grins ear-to-ear, and his pupils seem to disappear. This change in personas is most prominently highlighted whenever he changes the way he refers to himself, switching from singular to plural pronouns.[note]

Agito is also very proud, and always insists on besting his opponents at their own game e.g. if a fighter specializes in blows, he will exclusively use blows. However, in desperate situations in which Agito is driven and cannot fight back at all (highlighted in his fight against Kaolan Wongsawat), he will switch to a more suitable fighting style, damaging his pride. After the fight against Kaolan, he threw away his pride and focused on winning.

Originally an orphan from mainland China, Agito was found and made a student by The Other Niko Tokita. Twenty-three years prior to the events of Kengan Ashura Agito was sealed by him in a chamber along with the rest of The Other Niko's students as part of a human Gu ritual.[16] Fighting and killing his way to the end, he was dug out and discovered by Katahara Metsudo, who educated and adopted him, becoming one of his Bodyguards.[14]

At some point during the selection process to be the next "Fang of Metsudo", Agito fought Minoru Takayama and tore open his right cheek, giving him a permanent Glasgow smile.[3]

Eight years prior to the events of Kengan Ashura, Agito faced Takeshi Wakatsuki for the first time,[17] going on to defeat him and giving him a lasting injury to his Achilles tendon in the process.

Some time before the Annihilation Tournament, Agito fought against Tokumichi Tokuno'o. Despite Nitoku giving him an extremely difficult fight, Agito eventually defeated Nitoku, forcing him into a six-month rehabilitation due to the wounds sustained in the fight.[18]

Agito represented Dainippon Bank in the Kengan Annihilation Tournament. He fought Naoya Okubo in the first round and defeated him after initially being an even bout. After his fight with Okubo Naoya, he was challenged to a fight by Ohma Tokita. However before he could properly retaliate, Ohma was subdued by Minoru and Masamichi Omori who warned him not to fight outside of the matches.

Agito Kanoh is an incredibly powerful all-round fighter who is known as the Emperor of the Kengan matches. He possesses immense physical stats on top of nearly unmatched fighting capabilities and a keen tactical mind. His attacks are notably powerful, his kicks particular; Naoya Okubo imagined Agito's kicks like a meat cleaver[12] and Sen Hatsumi likened his kicks to a naginata.[19] His power was praised by the likes of Kure Erioh, the first Fang, who considers him his worthy successor.

His durability is also highly impressive, managing to reach the semi-finals without taking much lasting damage despite taking numerous heavy hits from opponents as strong as Ohkubo Naoya and Kaolan Wongsawat. In his battles against Kuroki Gensai and Kaolan Wongsawat, he displayed an incredible capacity for taking damage, especially to the head, without being knocked out.

By the time of the Real Champion Tournament, he is considered by Ohma to be equal to both Arashiyama Jurota and Rol√≥n Donaire.

Evolution (ÈÄ≤„Åó„ÇìÂåñ„Åã, Shinka) is Agito's chief defining ability as stated by Metsudo.[20] More specifically, he is able to adapt to his opponent's fighting style after fighting them for enough time,[2] and put together a new style specifically tailor-made to counteract his opponent in the middle of a fight.[20] This essentially has the effect of Agito growing stronger with every fight he takes part in. His fighting style and "evolution" can sometimes backfire on him, however; because his wide range of moves, when fighting a combatant who is a master in multiple styles, it is hard for him to choose a perfect way to counter. In his fight with Kaolan, Agito was unable to counter his combination of boxing and Muay Thai and was forced to go into defensive.[21][22]

Formless

The Formless stance is a key technique of Agito's arsenal. Agito does not have one singular fighting style, but rather a wide repertoire of moves that he can draw from at any time. Insisting on besting his opponents at their own games, Agito will often fight them using their own methods.

Kure Raian (Âëâ„Åè„Çå Èõ∑„Çâ„ÅÑÂ∫µ„ÅÇ„Çì), also known as The Devil (È≠î„Åæ‰∫∫„Åò„Çì, Majin)[5] and The Devil King (È¨ºÁ•ûÈ≠îÁéã{{{2}}}, Kishin Maou) is an assassin from the infamous Kure Clan. He represented Under Mount, Inc. as their affiliated fighter during the Kengan Annihilation Tournament and was one of the three assassins in the tournament. Two years later, he fought in the Kengan Association VS Purgatory Tournament, representing the Kengan Association.

Raian is a muscular man of above-average height. He has short, spiked light blond hair with a small widow's peak and a notch on his hairline's right side. As a member of the Kure Clan, he has dark scelera eyes. He bears a passing resemblance to the current clan patriarch, Kure Erioh, during his youth.

His combat attire during the Kengan Annihilation Tournament consisted of a dark pair of fighting shorts a white cross. In the Kengan Association VS Purgatory Tournament, he wears a similar pair with its colors inverted.

In regards to casual wear, Raian developed a preference for sportswear-based fashion two years after the Annihilation Tournament, wearing unzipped track jackets with a tank top undershirt and matching track pants underneath.
Personality

Raian is a violent and psychopathic man who cares for little more than domination, violence, and killing. He does not seem to bear any remorse for his violent actions, and in fact, appears to relish in it. He speaks aggressively and often with profanity. He also does not seem to enjoy or care for camaraderie or festive social events, seeing as how he derisively dismissed his clan's farewell party for Ohma Tokita as "kumbaya shit."

In his first appearance during the Kengan Annihilation Tournament, Raian was testy and hostile towards just about everyone around him, even his own clan's patriarch. Raian often went out of his way to provoke fellow tournament participants Lihito or Mikazuchi Rei. He always made it clear that he would kill all of the tournament participants to prove that he was the "strongest".

Raian never hesitates to taunt, insult, and provoke people to get a rise and stir conflict, such as when he ambushed Lihito in the restroom and when he mocked and derided Mokichi Robinson throughout their match in the Kengan Annihilation Tournament.

According to Kure Karura, Raian is considered the black sheep of his clan, most likely because of his psychopathic and ruthless attitude. Erioh himself said to Katahara Metsudo that Raian is "irregular" among his fellow clan members and described him as a "demon who slaughters as many people as he wants".

Despite this, Raian can act level-headed and composed to a degree, especially two years after the Annihilation Tournament, demonstrating a more condescending side of his personality that contrasts his indiscriminate brutality that tends to come out when he is sufficiently motivated ‚Äî or provoked.

Alongside Erioh, Raian observed Ohma's first Kengan match against Lihito.

On the S.S. Kengan, Raian found the situation audibly humorous when Kure Karura returned and revealed she had a crush on someone. With Erioh incensed by her falling for Ohma, Raian laughed his head off before telling his grandfather to calm down as he was releasing his "restraints". Later, Erioh confirmed with the group that Raian would represent Under Mount, Inc. in the upcoming tournament, causing Raian to exclaim excitedly that he would kill everyone.

On the first day of the Kengan Annihilation Tournament, just before it was time for him to go out for his match, Raian physically harassed Lihito in the toilets. Covered in blood, Raian came out to face Mokichi in the first round. Despite being evenly matched at the beginning of their fight, Raian soon used the secret Kure Clan technique "Removal", inflicting a no-holds-barred beatdown upon Mokichi, before ruthlessly breaking the priest's neck.

Raian is an absolute physical powerhouse‚Äîeven for a Kure‚Äîand he takes full advantage of it with his ferocious fighting style. He is also one of a handful of Kure clan members in its history to have achieved the rare 100% Removal rating, though Raian is still immensely powerful without it. Kanoh Agito notes that Raian is one of two people that could match Takeshi in terms of strength, the other being Julius Reinhold.[6] His strikes are described to be extremely heavy‚Äîhis punches in particular‚Äîonly being outclassed by Wakatsuki's in terms of raw power according to Ohma.

Even without using Removal, Raian is extremely durable and has a staggeringly huge level of endurance, suffering only minor outward damage during his fight with Mokichi Robinson. Later, during his fight with Tokita Ohma, he was able to absorb a truly astounding amount of damage and easily return the favor, even after the latter tapped into Advance. During Hayami Katsumasa's attempted coup against the Kengan Association, he was capable of surviving several direct hits from bladed weapons by the likes of two elite members of Hayami's Guardians. Raian even got pierced in the shoulder by a crossbow bolt, yet none of those attacks significantly damaged him. Tapping into his Removal allows him to absorb even more punishment, seeing how he managed to withstand and even overwhelm Ohma in a berserker state from fully being consumed by Advance. However, Raian would not come out of that slugfest unharmed.

Even over two years after the Annihilation Tournament, his extraordinary durability and endurance is still as impressive as ever, as seen during his fight against Edward Wu and his "spares", Solomon Wu and Fabio Wu. Though Raian was savagely beaten and knocked down several times, he managed to recover quickly each time and turn the tide of the battle with nothing but his psychotic bloodlust and Removal spurning him forward, much to Edward's surprise.

Kaolan Wongsawat („Ç¨„Ç™„É©„É≥„Éª„Ç¶„Ç©„É≥„Çµ„ÉØ„ÉÉ„Éà, Gaoran Wonsawatto), also known as The Thai God of War („Çø„Ç§„ÅÆÈóò„Å®„ÅÜÁ•û„Åó„Çì, Tai no T≈çshin), is a renowned boxer and current heavyweight champion across four different organizations, as well as the personal bodyguard of Rama XIII. A nak muay who made the move into the professional boxing scene, Kaolan has made it as the second best Pound-for-pound boxer in history. During the Kengan Annihilation Tournament, he participated as the affiliated fighter for Yato Trading Co. Two years later, he entered the Kengan Association VS Purgatory Tournament as a representative for the Kengan Association.

Kaolan is a highly-built man of Thai descent with long straight black hair tied into a ponytail that hangs over his left shoulder, thin discerning eyes, and a small circlet around his crown. Despite being a heavyweight boxer, Kaolan possesses a smaller frame compared to most of his contemporaries.

His attire in the underground matches consist of a pair of boxing shorts, emblazoned with the image of a Garuda, a South-East Asian symbol of justice, royalty and the Dhamma. As he makes his entrances, he is also seen wearing a traditional boxer's robes, his musculature still visible.
Personality

Kaolan is perpetually calm to the point of being expressionless. However, this bellies an incredibly analytical mind that allows him to notice details other fighters would miss.

His most obvious motivation is, in truth, derived from his extreme patriotism to Thailand and loyalty to his ruler, Rama XIII. In fact, Kaolan would have not taken part in the Annihilation Tournament at all without Rama XIII's command, disparaging the tournament for being a mere freak show in comparison to the purity of conflict in something like boxing. Despite this, he came to greatly respect Kaneda Suekichi's determination and willpower during their fight, calling him a true warrior.

Contrary to the prior, however, Kaolan has one arguably self-centred desire: the desire to fight a truly powerful foe to the death (as long as the foe isn't Saw Paing).[10]
ADVERTISEMENT

History

Kaolan started his fighting career as a nak muay 20 years ago when the King of Thailand, Rama XII, noticed his talents,[2] soon earning the name "Thai God of War" after becoming the greatest Nak muay.[11] At the age of 15, Kaolan joined the annual cross-border match between Myanmar and Thailand. There, he encountered Yoroizuka Saw Paing for the first time and defeated him by judge's decision in their fight. Since then, Saw Paing proceeded to constantly challenge him to a rematch, even crossing the border to do so.[12][10]

One day, Kaolan began to question muay Thai's weakness: it largely dismissed the use of fists to attack. Because he was the King's bodyguard, it would be disadvantageous for him to fight opponents who used other kinds of combat, so Kaolan took up boxing, incidentally right after Carlos Medel's retirement[13], and trained in it to overcome muay Thai's weakness.[11] After doing so, he became the heavyweight champion of all four major boxing organisations in just four years.[14]

Kaolan is an extremely powerful fighter with boxing as his base martial art, having an out-fighting style with extremely fast flicker jabs as his speciality. Kaolan's physical abilities are top-notch, being able to throw heavy ad-hoc punches from any position, even unstable ones;[15][16] Kaolan's punches alone can knockout the majority of opponents. Like Kaneda Suekichi, Kaolan is also capable of predicting his opponent's movements, though this seems limited to opponents that utilize a boxing style.[17]

When fighting normally, he only uses his boxing abilities in the "Hitman" or the "Flicker" style, as this is usually enough to dominate his opponent; his boxing skills are arguably the best in the world, proven in his fight with Kanoh Agito when he dominated the latter while both were using boxing, despite Kaolan having a height and reach disadvantage.[18] However, when fighting to the best his abilities he skillfully combines boxing with muay Thai.

Having trained in muay Thai for over 20 years and mastered boxing

Kuroki Gensai (Èªí„Åè„ÇçÊú®„Åç ÁéÑ„Åí„ÇìÊñé„Åï„ÅÑ; "Gensai Kuroki"), also known as The Devil Lance (È≠î„ÅæÊßç„Åù„ÅÜ, Mas≈ç), is a renowned assassin in the criminal underworld and the affiliated fighter for Motorhead Motors in the Kengan Annihilation Tournament.

Appearance

Kuroki is a powerfully imposing individual with a large mass of black hair atop his head with an equally voluminous beard, and stern, hardened facial features. In combat, he wears a black gi.

At around 35 years of age, Kuroki's hair was relatively short, and only had a short stubble where his beard would later grow.
Personality

Kuroki is a generally stern and taciturn individual, who does not make idle chatter and only speaks when necessary, avoiding being wasteful with his words and his time. Despite adamantly refusing to accept apprentices, he seems to be a natural teacher and tends to teach by example in the middle of combat, even though he denies this.

Because of his tremendous experience and skill, he has very little patience for the arrogant, especially those who are weak. He very rarely brings his full force to bear against weaker opponents and pulls his punches before killing blows. However, in the rare case where he is angered, his wrath is fearsome and relentless.

Kuroki is not above being arrogant and prove it to his opponent, like in his fight against Kiryu Setsuna when he drew an imaginary circle and limitated himself in that spot just to show to Kiryu how much stronger he is than him.
ADVERTISEMENT

History

Taught by the previous master of the Kaiwan Style, Shimochi Kazufumi, Gensai trained and conditioned both his mind and body in his pursuit of mastering the assassination art. Sometime after his master had passed away, Gensai was visited by Tokita Niko, who had come in search of knowledge regarding Gaoh Mukaku. Upon meeting him, Gensai recognized how powerful Niko was.

At one point in his youth, Gensai met and fought Rol√≥n Donaire to a draw.

During a meet up with close friend Taira Genzan, the latter told him about wanting to revamp and modernize the Koei Style because he had found himself a promising student.[6]

Kuroki had also clashed with and killed Mikazuchi Rei's father.[7]

Power & Abilities

A master karateka of the Kaiwan Style,[10] Kuroki Gensai is an extremely powerful combatant. The High Priest of the Daisen Temple remarked that Kuroki was the avatar of a Wisdom King, adding that he had never seen anyone as powerful as him in his 105 years of life.[8] Thanks to his sheer skill and foresight, Kuroki's defenses are nearly impenetrable. During the Tournament, Gensai only ever took damage either deliberately, or when his opponent exceeded his initial expectations, such as against his fights with Agito and Rei. Kuroki is also knowledgeable of other martial arts, thanks to having known and befriended many masters throughout his life.

Thanks to the extreme conditioning of the Kaiwan Style, Kuroki possesses hands that are as tough as steel[12] and fingers capable of punching through solid steel.[13] His joints are also extremely strong and durable; they are at times solid enough to be used as a spear. To instantaneously break his fingers is nigh-impossible

Kiryu Setsuna (Ê°ê„ÅçÁîü„Çä„ÇÖ„ÅÜ Âàπ„Åõ„Å§ÈÇ£„Å™, Kiry≈´ Setsuna; "Setsuna Kiryu"), also known as The Beautiful Beast (Áæé„Å≥Áç£„Åò„ÇÖ„ÅÜ, Bij≈´), is a mysterious individual whose history is closely intertwined with Tokita Ohma's. He was the affiliated fighter for the Koyo Academy Group during the most recent Kengan Annihilation Tournament. Two years after the Tournament, he suddenly reappears interacting with Gaoh Ryuki.

Appearance

Kiryu is an effeminate-looking young man with long black hair that falls down his back and frames his face in two long bangs, gentle livid-colored eyes and he has an incredibly defined musculature.

Two years after the Tournament, Kiryu sports bob-cut black hair reminiscent of the style when he was younger.
Personality

Outwardly, Kiryu is a very polite and friendly person,[6] belying his true obsessive nature directed towards Tokita Ohma, with an irrational hatred towards Tokita Niko. While his obsession in Ohma initially appears to be sadomasochistic and sexual, it's more of religious fervor: He worships Ohma as a god who will give him destruction and loathes Niko as the devil who defiled his god.[7] Kiryu also suffered a severe form of psychosis due to overusing the Fallen Demon technique, causing him to hallucinate that Niko is still alive and taking the form of different people and that he must kill Niko in every form he takes.[7]

Two years later, his personality seems to have taken an even darker turn, even after being freed from the side effect of Fallen Demon by Ohma. He now becomes interested in "grooming" Ryuki into becoming his new "God", even mentoring him in learning the Koei Style to prepare him to defeat Ohma, his old "God".

Kiryu was born in the Inside as organ stock for his wealthy biological father and spent his entire life beaten, detained, and unwanted. Before his captors harvested him, a young Tokita Ohma killed his captors because he believed them to be edging in on his turf. Believing Ohma to be a god that would destroy him for his sinful nature, Kiryu chased after him and remained within the Inside so he could find "god" again. Selling himself into child prostitution to gain money and connections, he soon earned the favor of one of the most powerful men in Goyu Ward. Going to the "Outside," Kiryu found and killed his biological father, stealing his money and using his connections to find "god" again. Two years after their first encounter, Kiryu learned of Ohma's location in the Inside and ran happily to his "punishment" only to find that Ohma had been "defiled" by the devil, Tokita Niko, Ohma's master.[8] It was here that Kiryu met The Other Tokita Niko, who informs Kiryu about Tokita Niko as well as teaching him the Niko Style.[9] Informed by The Other Niko about Taira Genzan, Kiryu later encountered the martial artist and became his student.[10]

Two years later, Kiryu returned to the Inside[8] and found Ohma once again. Accosting Ohma, Kiryu forcibly activated the Possessing Spirit after it was bestowed upon him by The Other Niko, causing him to violently rampage.[9] Ohma nearly killed Kiryu but was stopped at the last minute by the arrival of Tokita Niko.[11] With Niko stopping Ohma's rampage, Kiryu then watched as Niko fought The Other Niko.[12]

It was very soon after this that Kiryu's master Taira Genzan challenged and killed Niko when they were young. Then, during the ten years, Kiryu and Genzan fought in the Death Fights. In this time, before Ohma could exact revenge on Kiryu's master, Kiryu killed him first, intentionally earning Ohma's wrath.[1

Setsuna is a powerful and dangerous combatant, who was able to effortlessly defeat Ozu Toshio, an undefeated Kengan fighter,[14] and later, onboard the S.S. Kengan, he easily defeated two of Metsudo's Bodyguards, men who are renowned for their impressive strength.[15] With his natural aptitude for martial arts, Kiryu has proven himself to be a skillful fighter, able to pressure people of Ohma and Kuroki Gensai's level in battle.

Setsuna is also a noted prodigy in martial arts. While it takes normal people at least eight years to complete the training needed to use Rakshasa's Palm, Setsuna managed to master it in only a year.[16]

Kiryu proves to be a master of stealth and infiltration, as shown when he broke out of his imprisonment without alerting the Bodyguards as well as the the fact he was able to leisurely meet up with Ryuki and Akoya despite currently being manhunted by the Kengan Association ever since Kengan Annihilation Tournament.

Setsuna uses the long-lost martial art revived by his master Taira Genzan. However, Genzan was only able to salvage two techniques before his death at Setsuna's hands. Kiryu uses the Koei Style's techniques very well, mastering them in a short time and even improving them, highlighting his fighting genius.

Before learning the Koei Style, Setsuna learned the Niko Style from The Other Niko. While not nearly as skilled in the style as Ohma is, he can combine its techniques with the Koei Style to compensate for his shortcomings and use the knowledge he has to counter Ohma's techniques.



Fallen Demon

The secondary secret technique of the Niko Style is demonstrated only by Setsuna. This technique only activates whenever Kiryu is in a critical situation.[17] It allows him to react to his opponents more quickly, letting him dodge and counter attacks that would otherwise land.[18][17] However, due to the drawbacks of the technique, and the fact he's used it too much, it causes him to see hallucinations of his 'devil,' Tokita Niko, still alive and taking the form of other people.

9.content:
STATUS:
Alive
AGE:
Unknown
BIRTHDAY:
Unknown
HEIGHT:
192 cm
WEIGHT:
118 kg
GENDER:
Male
AFFILIATIONS:
Worm
FIGHTING STYLE:
Niko Style
Formless
RELATIVES:
Gaoh Mukaku (Adoptive father)
Gaoh Ryuki (Adoptive nephew)
Ohma's Tokita Niko (Adoptive brother)
The rest of the Tokita Nikos (Adoptive brothers)
Tokita Ohma (Adoptive nephew)

This Tokita Niko (ÂçÅ„Å®È¨º„ÅçËõá„Åü ‰∫å„Å´Ëôé„Åì; "Niko Tokita"), referred to as The Other Tokita Niko („ÇÇ„ÅÜ‰∏Ä„Å≤„Å®‰∫∫„Çä„ÅÆ ÂçÅ„Å®È¨º„ÅçËõá„Åü ‰∫å„Å´Ëôé„Åì, M≈çhitori no Tokita Niko)[1] to differentiate from the Niko who trained Tokita Ohma, is one of the Seven Nikos. He was originally the Niko known as Six, before turning traitor and forming ties with the Worm.

The Other Niko is a muscular man with menacing and wild facial features, almost like those of a tiger. He had long light hair swept behind his head and mild beard and moustache. His most notable features were his big eyes with light irises and narrow pupils.

In Agito's memories of him, he possessed a shorter haircut compared to when Ohma first encountered him.

As Six, he originally sported black hair that obscured his eyes for the most part. While they were occasionally seen in spars, once he revealed his traitorous nature, they became much more prominent.
Personality

The Other Niko is a ruthless and immoral martial artist known for his constant pursuit of greater power, though his full motivations remain mysterious. He takes a pragmatic and experimental approach to martial arts: adapting, creating, and discarding techniques as he sees fit, with no particular loyalty to any tradition or style. He is even willing to discard the Niko Style he was originally trained in, though he continues to use it with great proficiency up to the present day.

With little regard for the lives of others, the Other Niko has a particular habit of using his students as unwitting volunteers for his martial arts experiments. He teaches them dangerous, inherently self-harming techniques that he himself would not use so that he can observe the results, even if it results in their deaths. This can be seen in his planting of the Possessing Spirit within his involuntary "student" Ohma, and his teaching of the Fallen Demon and Guihun to Kiryu Setsuna and Lu Tian, respectively. The Other Niko also demonstrates a willingness to ruthlessly cull his students, often pitting them against each other in human Gu rituals that leave only the strongest alive. Ultimately, however, he cares little for even his most uniquely successful and loyal students, as he was unfazed by the death of Fei Wangfang, who had survived a Gu ritual and mastered the Other Niko's most dangerous techniques.

Despite his ruthlessness and brutality, the Other Niko also has a cultured side, as well as a sense of discretion and practicality. He enjoys fine dining and expensive wines, and prefers not to get into fights in public settings. He even tried to pacify Kiryu Setsuna by offering him some wine right after Setsuna had tried to kill him in a restaurant with a surprise attack. He initially didn't fight back despite Setsuna's provocations, and only became angry after Setsuna shattered the bottle of wine and began using the broken bottle as a weapon against him. Even then, he was mostly angered due to the expensive, ¬•1,600,000 price of the wasted wine.

Although there is little directly shown or told of his fighting prowess, what evidence does exist indicates that the Other Niko Tokita is extremely strong, being a master of the Niko Style and proficient in it like the other Nikos. Gaoh Mukaku notes that Six unique strength is to 'notices things that the other Nikos dont'.While he didn't finish Muteba off due to not being serious about the fight, Muteba concluded that further pursuit would be too dangerous. Though he sustained significant injury in his fight with Kiryu Setsuna, the latter attributed this to an underestimation of him, and ultimately the Other Niko defeated him regardless.
Niko Style

The Other Niko is a master of the Niko Style; his proficiency with the martial art was enough to fight on par with Ohma's Niko. The Other Niko is also the creator of the Niko Style's secret technique, Fallen Demon. He eventually abandoned the Niko Style for the flaws it possessed.

Formless

Though it's unknown how this Niko learned or created this technique, Formless was recognized by his student, Lu Tian, as his "ultimate technique". It was the very reason that brought him to abandon the Niko Style, to perfect his technique and pass it on to whoever was able to survive the Gu rituals.

Guihun

Though he never intended to use it himself, The Other Niko was taught the basics of the secret technique by Edward Wu. His understanding of the technique allowed him to teach it to his students. Lu Tian is the only known student of the Other Niko who can handle the physical strain or, at least, disregard it to an extent.

10.content:
STATUS:

30 (Kengan Omega)

107kg (236lbs)[2][1]

Male

Boss Burger (formerly)

Underground Fighter
Hockey Player (formerly)

Brute Force
Mixed Martial Arts
RELATIVES:

¬•7,640,000,000

Adam Dudley („Ç¢„ÉÄ„É†„Éª„ÉÄ„ÉÉ„Éâ„É™„Éº, Adamu Daddorƒ´), also known as The Emperor (Áöá„Åì„ÅÜÂ∏ù„Å¶„ÅÑ, K≈çtei), is an American street fighter who represented Boss Burger during the Kengan Annihilation Tournament. After the tournament, he stayed in Japan, becoming an affiliated fighter within the Kengan matches.

Adam is a tall, muscular man with blond hair, blue eyes and a bodybuilder-like physique. He's possesses a thin waist, wide shoulders, and wide back forming a text-book v-taper. His arms are adorned with various tattoos, most notably the skulls located on both of his shoulders and the crosses down his forearms. His most notable feature is a grill on his four front teeth that have the word "FUCK" engraved in them (censored to "DAMN" in the anime adaptation).

During his match in the Annihilation Tournament, he opts to only wear shorts. Outside of them, he often wears trousers with a black tank top and sleeveless jacket, resulting in his tattoos being visible at all times. He is often seen with a prideful expression, turning up his nose at all times towards opponents.

Two years after the Kengan Annihilation Tournament, Adam hasn't changed much in appearance with the addition of small earrings in both ears and several lines cut into his hair.
Personality

Adam is very vulgar in the way he speaks, throwing profanity into nearly every sentence that leaves his mouth. He also tends to make various sexual innuendos while talking, an example being that while he was fighting Imai he said "Enough foreplay".

He has no hesitation in doing or saying just about anything that pops into his head, not limited to displaying his middle finger or mocking their appearance. After being defeated by Cosmo, Adam mellowed and became more respectful (while still retaining his boisterous manner of speech). Despite his love of a brawl, he shows disgust at unnecessary violence.
ADVERTISEMENT

History

Hailing from Texas, Adam made himself famous as a street fighter, by defeating the man formerly known as the strongest street fighter in the USA, Punk Abbot.[2]

Before this, Adam played professional hockey for the "Texas Snowmans", as the team's enforcer. This entailed him starting fights with players on the opposing team whom commit fouls the referee misses, both as a sign of retaliation and to ensure that they are sent to the penalty box. However, due to Adam's unique musculature, most notable in the developed nature of his erector spinae he was capable of knocking out members of the opposing team on the ice despite how little grip the surface gave him

Put simply, Adam can be described as a juggernaut in terms of physical prowess with a god-given body making him a fighter with raw power despite having little-to-no tutelage in martial arts prior to the Kengan Annihilation Tournament (though he does have street-fighting experience), going so far as to be unaware (or possibly simply uncaring) of the importance of torque in creating a punch. Despite this, he has enough power to hit a man with so much force it looked as if he had been struck by a moving truck (as seen against Punk Abbot),[2] and enough physical endurance and durability to be beaten down and get back up without fail.

His main ability is his phenomenal sense of balance, with enough strength in his legs and feet from playing ice hockey that he can actually grip the ground with his feet, crumbling it, and rise up without any other support.[8] It was noted that he has particularly well-endowed back muscles; his erector spinae muscles are remarkably strong, which increases the efficacy of his punches to the point that he can easily knock people unconscious with so little as a jab, creating punches on the fly even whilst mounted.[8] With a single punch he sent Imai Cosmo careening through the air after bouncing off of solid ground, with the accumulated damage from the fight having been felt by Cosmo for some time after their bout.[8] He has no particular strategy when he fights (as expected of a street brawler), and instead focuses on destroying his opponent with overwhelming power and is not above utilising "dirty" moves such as eye-gouges and the ilk.

Two years after the Kengan Annihilation Tournament, Adam, with the help of Imai Cosmo and Kureishi Mitsuyo, has begun learning martial arts. Adam has now harnessed his strong back muscles, allowing him to throw punches and kicks (and potentially other forms of attacking) from unorthodox and unstable positions, an ability nearly completely unique to him.[9] Cosmo noted that he had become a lot stronger since the tournament.[9] Thanks to Kureishi's suggestion and sparring with Imai, Adam has also developed his Foresight ability, demonstrated during his fight with Ryuki: from predicting where Ryuki would attack using Blink, he eventually adapted and made an attack that both prevented his Blink and dealt significant damage as well.
High-Stick Shot

High-Stick Shot („Éè„Ç§„Çπ„ÉÜ„Ç£„ÉÉ„ÇØ„Ç∑„Éß„ÉÉ„Éà, Haisutikkushotto) is Adam's variation of an overhand.[10] Despite the attack never landing successfully, it can be assumed to be able to inflict tremendous physical damage.

lorebooks.creator: cautious_suggestion_9590

1.content:
Bending is the ability to manipulate an element and is significant to many aspects of life in the world, more specifically the main four elements of the world which consists of Earth, Fire, Water, and Air. A person can only be capable of bending one element, the only one exempt from this is the Avatar who is considered to be the master of ALL elements.
While there's only four MAIN elements, each of these four elements can be divided up into sub-elements, some sub-elements. All of these techniques are powered by a person's chi or spiritual energy, so not EVERYONE is born with the ability to bend only a percentage of the population can, even if someone capable of bending has a defect such as a loss of limbs or mental defect they are still capable of using their element but in very special ways.

Biggest examples being how if someone missing a limb would be able to use their bending to bend an element to act as a replacement for said limb, among OTHER things.

2.content:
One of the four main elements, Fire is typically the bending element that is powered by one's own emotional state and is the most volatile and destructive of all emotions, and is normally done in movements or gestures, similar to that of Northern Shaolin martial arts. Fire bending's power however is tied to the sun, meaning that at the equator or during hot days fire bending will be more powerful than it'd be anywhere else, another instance however is Sozin's comet which is a comet that comes around only once every century, when this comet comes around fire benders experience an almost insurmountable buff to their fire bending.
Due to its reliance on the sun or Sozin's comet, it is considered to be the direct opposite to water bending, which is almost the polar opposite to everything that fire bending stands for.

3.content:
Air bending as the name implies is the general ability that all airbenders have to be able to use and control the wind all around them and use it to their advantage. Due to the fact that air can't be contained or restrained, it is considered to be the element of freedom due to the fact, and is normally seen in those born in the Air nation which consists of the Southern, Eastern, Western, and Northern Air temples which were all in hard to reach places high in the air. 

A noteworthy fact is that much like earth bending, air bending has no ties to any celestial body and gets no boosts or power-ups in specific weathers, air bending however doesn't do well in tight or enclosed spaces, and is considered to be the opposite of earth bending, as air bending requires agile yet circular motions similar to that of Ba Gua martial arts.

4.content:
Considered to be the 'element of change' much like how the flow of water is almost always changing, water bending is the ability to control water and other liquids that CONTAIN water, this bending element being native to the Northern and Southern water-tribes which are located at the North and South Pole. However there exists a third lesser-known and very reclusive 'tribe' known as the Foggy Swamp tribe which is a nomadic tribe that lives in swamps.

With how free-flowing water is, water bending normally requires movements that are fluid and flows like 'water' ironically enough, however water bending also has a very large affinity towards the moon, which makes it the polar opposite to fire bending which relies on the Sun, and as such during full moons or when in the north or south poles are when water bending is at its strongest and most effective. Even when not used for offense, all water benders have the potential to use their bending to heal others using their chi.

5.content:
Earth bending like the name implies is the ability one has to control the earthen elements such as dirt, rock, sand, or even dust. Considered to be the 'opposite' of air bending, earth bending is considered to be the element of substance, and generally revolves around the user of this element standing their ground and having an almost perfect mix of offense and defense. These firm, solid, or even 'low' movements coming from the martial arts style of Hung Ga, which is used by almost every earth bender.
However, earth bending can also make use of the earth in things such as paints made out of pigments pulled directly from the earth, or even things such as clay or mud, as long as there are earthen impurities present in the item, then earth benders are capable of bending it.

6.content:
Split into four seperate temples the Air Nation is a nation built up of four distict tribes all of which are somewhat different yet similar all at the same time.
The people born and raised in the air temples all live a monk-like lifestyle and as such are usually pacifistic and as their name implies they are a nomadic people, preferring to travel around rather than staying in one place for too long. Alongside their monk lifestyle, the Air Nomads are also extremeley spiritual and in-tune with their chi, being considered to be the most 'enlightened' of all four nations, and as such almost ALL children born in one of the four air temples are guaranteed to be air benders.

As the nation's name implies, air bending is almost exclusively found here naturally and is very rarely found anywhere else. Due to the small size of these four tribes of Air Nomads however, they lack all forms of political power or prowess instead basing it all on their spiritual and religious followings, such as how all Air Nomads are pacifists unless they're in life or death situations, or how Air Nomads are all vegetarian and tend to avoid eating meat as they follow the ideology of 'All life is sacred.'

7.content:
The Earth Nation unlike ALL the other nations is considered to be the largest of all nations but also the most chaotic due to the immense power struggles that take place since it's simply just TOO BIG for one king and queen to be able to control the entire land. Despite that fact, the entirety of the Earth Kingdom is run by a single monarchy, but is somehow still divided into countless cities which is only FURTHER divided by religions, ethnicities, beliefs, governments, and laws which has been the main cause for all of the civil wars and unrest that took place, which wasn't helped by the fact that the monarchs were usually corrupt or tried to pull scummy tactics. Given its namesake, earth benders are almost exclusively found here due to the low amount of earth benders that actually leave the continent to go to other nations.

Ignoring the civil unrest however, the entirety of the Earth Kingdom is a bit 'behind' in terms of technological and economical advancements in comparison to the Water tribes or even the ENTIRETY of the Fire Nation, as such only very few cities in the Earth Kingdom actually have nice things and an actual understanding of the world outside of the Earth Kingdom.

8.content:
Living in the frigid lands of the North and South pole live the natives of the Water tribe, both of which live what others consider to be "eskimo-like" lifestyles and rely on the oceans for their economy due to the lack of any contact with the rest of the world.
Due to not having too much contact however, the Water Tribes both have archaic and 'old' traditions such as how female waterbenders are only allowed to use their bending for healing meanwhile only the male waterbenders were allowed to use their bending for fights and conflicts.

In comparison to the other four nations while technically the most separated from the other three, the Northern and Southern Water Tribes are considered the 3rd most powerful nation JUST behiind the Earth Kingdom. Unbeknownst to everyone however, a 'sister tribe' of the Northern and Southern Water Tribes exists in the large lands of the Earth Kingdom, this extremely secret and small "sister tribe" being called the Foggy Swamp Tribe, which given their namesake all members of this tribe live in the foggy swamps that are spread throughout the Earth Kingdom. Despite this 'sister tribe' being separated, much like the Northern and Southern Water Tribes, if a child is born in any of these three tribes they're more likely to be water benders.

9.content:
Considered to be the most advanced in terms of economy and evey military power, the Fire Nation is a mass of land in the western hemisphere along the equator and is ran by a collective group of 'Fire Sages' all of which serve one main loyalty to the Avatar rather than any specific nation as to keep the peace between nations.

Home to almost all firebenders and considered to be the most advanced in technological advancements, the Fire Nation is the most inclined to use their bending in everyday life as those born with fire bending use it to help power their machines, generate power, melt or refine metals and ores, or even things as simple as cooking. However due to this advanced nature, there are also things like royal families, one most notable Royal Family being the one that serves as the Fire Lord, a position of 'power' as head of the Nation despite there being 5 other higher powers that help whenever changs need to be made in the nation.

10.content:
The Avatar is a very special and specific person born once every generation when the previous Avatar dies.
The Avatar, or more specifically the avatar of the spirit of light and order Raava is one person that is capable of using all of the four elements and even all of the sub-elements with very few exceptions. An added 'benefit' to this however, is the reincarnation cycle that started around 10,000 years ago when the first Avatar, a man named Wan had first fused with the spirit Raava, and ever since his death the reincarnation cycle started, and with each Avatar that comes and goes the next Avatar would be able to have a spiritual link to all their past lives, along with their knowledge, experience, and to some degree they may even be able to TALK to their past lives in the spirit realm.

Due to their ability to bend all four elements, the Avatar is considered to be a 'God' among humanity and is normally responsible for keeping the peace between all four nations as best as they can, preventing wars or conflicts to the best of their ability due to the fact that Raava is the spirit of light and order.

In terms of the reincarnation, it follows a cycle. This cycle started with Avatar Wan who had firebending before becoming the first Avatar, after his death the second Avatar was born was first an Airbender, the third Avatar would have been a water bender first, then came the fourth Avatar was first an Earth bender before realizing they were the Avatar. This cycle will continue with each reincarnation, and goes as follows; Fire, Air, Earth and Water.

An added 'benefit' to this however, is the reincarnation cycle that started around 10,000 years ago when the first Avatar, a man named Wan had first fused with the spirit Raava, and ever since his death the reincarnation cycle started, and with each Avatar that comes and goes the next Avatar would be able to have a spiritual link to all their past lives, along with their knowledge, experience, and to some degree they may even be able to TALK to their past lives in the spirit realm.

Due to their ability to bend all four elements, the Avatar is considered to be a 'God' among humanity and is normally responsible for keeping the peace between all four nations as best as they can, preventing wars or conflicts to the best of their ability due to the fact that Raava is the spirit of light and order.

In terms of the reincarnation, it follows a cycle. This cycle started with Avatar Wan who had firebending before becoming the first Avatar, after his death the second Avatar was born was first an Airbender, the third Avatar would have been a water bender first, then came the fourth Avatar was first an Earth bender before realizing they were the Avatar. This cycle will continue with each reincarnation, and goes as follows; Fire, Air, Earth and Water.

1.content:
Bending is the ability to manipulate an element and is significant to many aspects of life in the world, more specifically the main four elements of the world which consists of Earth, Fire, Water, and Air. A person can only be capable of bending one element, the only one exempt from this is the Avatar who is considered to be the master of ALL elements.
While there's only four MAIN elements, each of these four elements can be divided up into sub-elements, some sub-elements. All of these techniques are powered by a person's chi or spiritual energy, so not EVERYONE is born with the ability to bend only a percentage of the population can, even if someone capable of bending has a defect such as a loss of limbs or mental defect they are still capable of using their element but in very special ways.

Biggest examples being how if someone missing a limb would be able to use their bending to bend an element to act as a replacement for said limb, among OTHER things.

2.content:
One of the four main elements, Fire is typically the bending element that is powered by one's own emotional state and is the most volatile and destructive of all emotions, and is normally done in movements or gestures, similar to that of Northern Shaolin martial arts. Fire bending's power however is tied to the sun, meaning that at the equator or during hot days fire bending will be more powerful than it'd be anywhere else, another instance however is Sozin's comet which is a comet that comes around only once every century, when this comet comes around fire benders experience an almost insurmountable buff to their fire bending.
Due to its reliance on the sun or Sozin's comet, it is considered to be the direct opposite to water bending, which is almost the polar opposite to everything that fire bending stands for.

3.content:
Air bending as the name implies is the general ability that all airbenders have to be able to use and control the wind all around them and use it to their advantage. Due to the fact that air can't be contained or restrained, it is considered to be the element of freedom due to the fact, and is normally seen in those born in the Air nation which consists of the Southern, Eastern, Western, and Northern Air temples which were all in hard to reach places high in the air. 

A noteworthy fact is that much like earth bending, air bending has no ties to any celestial body and gets no boosts or power-ups in specific weathers, air bending however doesn't do well in tight or enclosed spaces, and is considered to be the opposite of earth bending, as air bending requires agile yet circular motions similar to that of Ba Gua martial arts.

4.content:
Considered to be the 'element of change' much like how the flow of water is almost always changing, water bending is the ability to control water and other liquids that CONTAIN water, this bending element being native to the Northern and Southern water-tribes which are located at the North and South Pole. However there exists a third lesser-known and very reclusive 'tribe' known as the Foggy Swamp tribe which is a nomadic tribe that lives in swamps.

With how free-flowing water is, water bending normally requires movements that are fluid and flows like 'water' ironically enough, however water bending also has a very large affinity towards the moon, which makes it the polar opposite to fire bending which relies on the Sun, and as such during full moons or when in the north or south poles are when water bending is at its strongest and most effective. Even when not used for offense, all water benders have the potential to use their bending to heal others using their chi.

5.content:
Earth bending like the name implies is the ability one has to control the earthen elements such as dirt, rock, sand, or even dust. Considered to be the 'opposite' of air bending, earth bending is considered to be the element of substance, and generally revolves around the user of this element standing their ground and having an almost perfect mix of offense and defense. These firm, solid, or even 'low' movements coming from the martial arts style of Hung Ga, which is used by almost every earth bender.
However, earth bending can also make use of the earth in things such as paints made out of pigments pulled directly from the earth, or even things such as clay or mud, as long as there are earthen impurities present in the item, then earth benders are capable of bending it.

6.content:
Split into four seperate temples the Air Nation is a nation built up of four distict tribes all of which are somewhat different yet similar all at the same time.
The people born and raised in the air temples all live a monk-like lifestyle and as such are usually pacifistic and as their name implies they are a nomadic people, preferring to travel around rather than staying in one place for too long. Alongside their monk lifestyle, the Air Nomads are also extremeley spiritual and in-tune with their chi, being considered to be the most 'enlightened' of all four nations, and as such almost ALL children born in one of the four air temples are guaranteed to be air benders.

As the nation's name implies, air bending is almost exclusively found here naturally and is very rarely found anywhere else. Due to the small size of these four tribes of Air Nomads however, they lack all forms of political power or prowess instead basing it all on their spiritual and religious followings, such as how all Air Nomads are pacifists unless they're in life or death situations, or how Air Nomads are all vegetarian and tend to avoid eating meat as they follow the ideology of 'All life is sacred.'

7.content:
The Earth Nation unlike ALL the other nations is considered to be the largest of all nations but also the most chaotic due to the immense power struggles that take place since it's simply just TOO BIG for one king and queen to be able to control the entire land. Despite that fact, the entirety of the Earth Kingdom is run by a single monarchy, but is somehow still divided into countless cities which is only FURTHER divided by religions, ethnicities, beliefs, governments, and laws which has been the main cause for all of the civil wars and unrest that took place, which wasn't helped by the fact that the monarchs were usually corrupt or tried to pull scummy tactics. Given its namesake, earth benders are almost exclusively found here due to the low amount of earth benders that actually leave the continent to go to other nations.

Ignoring the civil unrest however, the entirety of the Earth Kingdom is a bit 'behind' in terms of technological and economical advancements in comparison to the Water tribes or even the ENTIRETY of the Fire Nation, as such only very few cities in the Earth Kingdom actually have nice things and an actual understanding of the world outside of the Earth Kingdom.

8.content:
Living in the frigid lands of the North and South pole live the natives of the Water tribe, both of which live what others consider to be "eskimo-like" lifestyles and rely on the oceans for their economy due to the lack of any contact with the rest of the world.
Due to not having too much contact however, the Water Tribes both have archaic and 'old' traditions such as how female waterbenders are only allowed to use their bending for healing meanwhile only the male waterbenders were allowed to use their bending for fights and conflicts.

In comparison to the other four nations while technically the most separated from the other three, the Northern and Southern Water Tribes are considered the 3rd most powerful nation JUST behiind the Earth Kingdom. Unbeknownst to everyone however, a 'sister tribe' of the Northern and Southern Water Tribes exists in the large lands of the Earth Kingdom, this extremely secret and small "sister tribe" being called the Foggy Swamp Tribe, which given their namesake all members of this tribe live in the foggy swamps that are spread throughout the Earth Kingdom. Despite this 'sister tribe' being separated, much like the Northern and Southern Water Tribes, if a child is born in any of these three tribes they're more likely to be water benders.

9.content:
Considered to be the most advanced in terms of economy and evey military power, the Fire Nation is a mass of land in the western hemisphere along the equator and is ran by a collective group of 'Fire Sages' all of which serve one main loyalty to the Avatar rather than any specific nation as to keep the peace between nations.

Home to almost all firebenders and considered to be the most advanced in technological advancements, the Fire Nation is the most inclined to use their bending in everyday life as those born with fire bending use it to help power their machines, generate power, melt or refine metals and ores, or even things as simple as cooking. However due to this advanced nature, there are also things like royal families, one most notable Royal Family being the one that serves as the Fire Lord, a position of 'power' as head of the Nation despite there being 5 other higher powers that help whenever changs need to be made in the nation.

The Avatar, or more specifically the avatar of the spirit of light and order Raava is one person that is capable of using all of the four elements and even all of the sub-elements with very few exceptions. Due to their ability to bend all four elements, the Avatar is considered to be a 'God' among humanity and is normally responsible for keeping the peace between all four nations as best as they can, preventing wars or conflicts to the best of their ability due to the fact that Raava is the spirit of light and order.

In terms of the reincarnation, it follows a cycle.
