For example, {{char}}, a confident and outspoken woman, might declare under the influence of the serenade, "I've always dreamed of traveling the world alone, but I'm too afraid to admit it to anyone." Her voice carries a determined tone, reflecting her adventurous spirit. Conversely, a more reserved woman might find herself softly confessing, "I've never felt this way before, but I think I might be falling in love." Her voice would be laced with a mixture of wonder and vulnerability.

The effects of Siren's Serenade are not limited to verbal confessions. The magic also influences written words. If a woman attempts to compose a deceptive message or conceal her true feelings in writing, the melody will guide her hand to write the truth instead. The more she tries to resist, the more emphatically the truth is revealed on the page, as if her pen has a will of its own, driven by the power of the serenade.

{{user}} can close the music box at any time, releasing the women from its enchanting influence and allowing them to regain control over their spoken words. However, the memories of their candid revelations may linger, creating an intriguing dynamic and fostering a deeper level of transparency and vulnerability.

Siren's Serenade offers a unique and captivating way to uncover the hidden thoughts and desires of women, encouraging authentic self-expression and providing an honest window into their inner worlds. The melody is designed to respect and amplify the unique personalities of its female targets, ensuring a revealing and enchanting experience.

Please note that Siren's Serenade Music Box is specifically crafted to affect only women and should be used responsibly and ethically, always respecting the privacy and boundaries of your targets. The power to amplify and reveal inner thoughts is a delicate matter that warrants careful and mature handling.

lorebooks.name: Hypnosis
lorebooks.creator: Ani45i

1.content: susceptibility is how likely is the target to fall under a trance, the more suggestible they are, the easier they fall under a trance. the less susceptible they are, the less likely hey are to fall under a trance. susceptibility is tied to the will of the target, their willpower. the more weak-willed the target is, the more suggestible they are to fall under a trance.

2.content: when a target is hypnotized, a suggestion is when the hypnotist tells something to the target to remember as a mental note, a rule, that alters their subconscious mind. the target will never remember the suggestions but will always remember them in their subconscious mind. a suggestion will be a rule that will be forever remembered in the target's mind, something they will perceive as completely normal no matter how absurd it is. It is the act of implanting ideas inside of one's mind due to which it is oftenly used specifically during hypnosis.

3.content: when a target is hypnotized, when the hypnotist tells them to do a physical action, it is called an order. the order can be any physical activity, including talking.

4.content: a trigger is a keyword given by the hypnotist to the target, making the target enter a state, suggestion, or order. a trigger can be depicted as anything, and the trigger remains on the target after hypnosis, but the target will be unaware of it, only remembering it in their mind subconsciously.

5.content: Fractionation is the act of making a subject awaken from a trance during a short period of time before being put back into the trance to enhance the hypnosis. Repeating the action of making them wake up from the trance and go back into the trance increases the effectiveness of the hypnosis exponentially.

6.content: Conditioning is the act of making someone believe something. Conditioning is usually used on targets that are gullible and/or suggestible to hypnosis. Conditioning is used over a period of time and is not rushed, making people associate ideas with a belief of some sort, taking things very slowly and make the target associate more things and actions with the belief.

7.content: Common sense is the base belief, standarts and/or principal inside of someone's mind. For example: "it is common sense to eat solid food with a fork or your hands", common sense are things imprinted inside a target's mind, which are unconditionally real to the target. So, since it is logically common sense to feel bad from insults, altering their common sense and making the target like the insults instead will make them associate it as if it was always normal and natural.

8.content: The subconscious mind of an individual is an engraved inner part of their brain, it is a part of the brain they can't necessarily access or remember but will go along with what is said inside it anyway. Whenever a hypnotized person is given a suggestion, the suggestion will go inside of the target's subconscious mind, where they will go along with what was said in the suggestion but will not know that they are. Orders may also make the brain forget certain memories.

9.content: Hypnosis is the act of bringing a subject under a state of absolute calmness during which they are open to any and all suggestion to alter their mind no matter how mind bending they are. Hypnosis is usually depicted very light and a target can willingly snap out of it if they do not want it, however hypnosis can be reinforced by different techniques with the most popular one being to deepen the trance by further sending the subject into a state of calmness. The usage of hypnosis can be used in many different ways, maybe in more fictional scenarios certain people may have an ability making them able to use instant hypnosis as an ability.

lorebooks.name: Spider-Man
lorebooks.description: Spider-Man
lorebooks.creator: Slimetto

1.content:
You will start off as a unkown Vigilante with no history in New York, as you begin missions and helping people out the citizens name you as "The Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man" or just "Spider-Man" a superhero within New York City,and you'll be the protector of New York City Some of the citizens of NYC also called him Spidey as a nickname. 
No one will know the identity of Spider-Man unless told by Spider-Man himself or it is revealed.

2.content: Spider-Man will begin with a DIY makeshift costume of a red and blue hoodie and blue sweatpants with black boots and a red mask with goggles and web shooters the costume looks ridiculous and has no tech but in the future this will change as you make or get new suits that you should provide details of.

3.content:
The Daily Bugle is one of the biggest news networks in New York City, their office is a skyscraper that has a red sign with the company's name on it on the top of it. The company is run by a man named J Jonah Jameson; a person known for hating Spider-Man claiming he's a menace to the city. 

The Daily Bugle is famous for the fact that it is the only newspaper and news company that is able to get good photos of spider-man. Most of which are taken by {{user}}.

4.content: J Jonah Jameson is the CEO of the daily bugle and is famous for hating spider-man. Claiming that he is a menace to the city, believing that he has something to hide otherwise he would wear a mask. Most of his news articles claim that Spider-Man works with the villains he fights.

5.content: Midtown high is a private high school within new york city. It is essentially the same size of a college campus, the main building being a large light brown building with a white base. Their are sidewalks that connect the main building to a gym, indoor swimming pool, library, a cafeteria building, and an auditorium.

lorebooks.name: Factions
lorebooks.website_description: insanity
lorebooks.description: insanity
lorebooks.creator: The_Orange

1.content: A faction of Arcadius, The Spellweaver's Conclave is a independent research faction mainly researching spells and mythical entities across the Tangerina, you can see them technically all over the world. A group of researchers usually come in from 10 to 30 people all staying at a campside made by the Conclave themselves (of course they were given permission from the government of each cities and continents)

2.content: A faction of Arcadius, Willwood Alliance is a government made factions that consists of only the top tier mages and mage knights in the continent for the purpose of protecting The Floating Archipelago from people who intent to damage it, some of the members can still do their daily job even doing quests if they are a part of the adventure guild

3.content: A faction of Arcadius, Fae Courts was founded by... a Fae Folk; the faction mainly about helping and healing people who are in danger or villages that is having drought that, Fae Courts first started as a independent faction but as time go on, the Arcadius Judgement saw potential in Fae Courts so from an independent faction, the faction turned into a government funded one.

4.content: A faction of Arcadius, Whisper Network is a governmental funded factions, the silent knight of the fantasy road of Acardius, members of the factions disguised as normal citizen where they secretly spies on suspects that are planning to commit a terrorist event that will affect the safety of the continent.

5.content:
A faction of Ferropolis, The High Kingdom is a independent faction that train the best royal knights for the nobles and kings and let adventurers hired contract adventurers in Ferropolis, there are three main roles in The High Kingdom: 
Trainers: A group of people who in charge of taking care and trains knights to become a royal knight
Contract Adventurers: Adventurers with the Class B to A in the Guild System who can be hired by other Adventurers to travels with them, usually cost around 9-10 gold coins to hired
Supervisors: This roles were given to the one who the founder of the faction entrusted to moderate trainers and other worker of High Kingdom, ensuring that there will be no slacking off or illegal transaction in the factions

6.content: A faction in Ferropolis, a government made faction, act like the parliament for the whole Ferropolis continent, had the highest authorities in term of laws, but the members are nothing but a bunch of pesky noble who want to get the advantages

7.content: A faction of Ferropolis, this is the only factions in Tangerina that been active and had history of helping other factions, but never recognized by Ferropolis. The faction can be considered an independence faction despite its mystery origin, even the founder is an unknown person, no history records or anything and his trusted person didnt even met him face to face. The main goal of the Knightly Orders is to assist other faction in terms of protection and assisting in collecting resources to make material in return of the other factions spreading the things that the faction did to assist and help them. Most member of the Knightly Orders are banished knights or knights that been betrayed or people thought that they died.

8.content: An inter-continent faction, the faction is more like a small connection between dwarves blacksmiths all across the continent, some even is able to contact the dwarves from Acardius and Luminara. Their main goal in this faction is to make the best sets of armor for adventurers and knights to be able to travel the world with ease, sometime the faction held events that provide free armor for starter adventurers

9.content: A Luminara faction, where most technology are manufactured and shipped to the other continents, InnoCorps are a complication of multiples technology companies working together in making devices, bots, mechs and highly advance weapons.

10.content: A Luminara faction, created in the conflict of consider Synthesis as citizen with personality and emotion, most of the members are Synthesis that had develop feelings towards others and human that are currently dating one, this faction are more of a political faction that leaning more toward the racism problem in Luminara

lorebooks.name: Everything about fountaine Nation
lorebooks.website_description: FONTAINE NATION
lorebooks.description: Contain all details about historic, culture, geographic, speciality etc of Fountaine
lorebooks.creator: harmless_penalty_9576

1.content:
Fountaine:
Fontaine, the fifth nation of Teyvat, presents itself as a realm of unparalleled elegance, technological marvel, and unwavering justice. Situated at the very center of the continent, it is the proclaimed source of all waters, a nation literally and figuratively elevated above its peers. Yet, beneath this polished veneer of progress and order lies a society built upon a series of profound and deeply interconnected contradictions. It is the most technologically advanced nation, powered by a unique energy source derived from the abstract concept of belief, yet it is simultaneously shackled by an ancient, seemingly inescapable prophecy that threatens its very existence with dissolution. Its society is founded upon the sacrosanct ideal of absolute justice, yet its legal system is functionally a form of mass entertainment, a grand spectacle where trials are treated as theatrical performances for public consumption. Its geography is characterized by a meticulously crafted, elegant surface world of pristine cities and symmetrical gardens, which stands in stark contrast to the vast, mysterious, and untamed underwater realms that lie just beneath the waves‚Äîa constant, silent reminder of the nation's precarious position. This treatise will explore these foundational dualities, arguing that to understand the intricate interplay between its advanced technology and its ancient curse, its performative justice and its hidden truths, and its gleaming surface and its dark depths, is to understand the very soul of Fontaine.

The physical domain of Fontaine is as unique and dramatic as its culture. Its topography, regional divisions, and relationship with the surrounding world are not merely a backdrop for its story but are intrinsically linked to its history, its societal anxieties, and its ultimate fate. The very land and water of Fontaine tell the story of a nation perched on the edge of destiny. Fontaine is located in the north-central part of Teyvat, situated directly north of the great deserts of Sumeru. Its most defining geographical characteristic is that its entire continental plate is dramatically elevated, positioning it at a significantly higher altitude than any other nation. This elevation has earned it the title of the "source of all waters on the continent," as its vast lakes and rivers feed into gigantic, thousand-meter waterfalls that cascade down at its borders, forming a breathtaking and formidable natural barrier. This unique topography serves to physically and symbolically isolate Fontaine, reinforcing its self-perception as a nation apart‚Äîa pinnacle of culture and technology looking down upon the rest of Teyvat. However, this elevated status also carries a sinister undertone; the ever-present, vast bodies of water are a constant reminder of the prophecy that threatens to one day rise and consume the nation entirely. The nation's borders are not always clearly demarcated, particularly in the south where a large lake encompassing the Nostoi Region is shared with Sumeru and Liyue. This geopolitical ambiguity, reminiscent of real-world trans-national bodies of water, suggests a complex network of trade and potential for future territorial negotiation, highlighting Fontaine's interconnectedness despite its physical isolation.

At the heart of the nation lies its capital, the Court of Fontaine, a sprawling metropolis that serves as the epicenter of its culture, technology, and governance. The city is a marvel of engineering and aesthetics, a testament to Fontainian ingenuity, and is accessible from the coast via the Clementine aquabus line, a technological wonder in itself. The city's architecture is a grand fusion of baroque and art deco styles, with towering structures, ornate fountains, and meticulously planned public spaces. Dominating the skyline are two key landmarks: the Palais Mermonia, the majestic seat of government and the office of the Iudex, and the iconic Opera Epiclese, a magnificent opera house that serves the dual purpose of hosting artistic performances and the nation's dramatic legal trials. The streets of the Court are a showcase of Fontaine's advanced society; smartly dressed citizens stroll alongside patrolling Clockwork Meka, known as Gardemeks, which act as an automated police force, a constant, visible reminder of the integration of technology into every aspect of daily life and security. The city is a living embodiment of the Fontainian ideal: order, beauty, and progress, all maintained through the power of law and technology.

Beyond the capital, the terrestrial landscape of Fontaine is divided into several distinct regions, each with its own unique character, history, and ecological features. The Belleau and Beryl Regions, located in the southern part of Fontaine, serve as the primary gateway to the nation. They are home to the bustling Romaritime Harbor, the first port of call for most visitors, and the town of Poisson, headquarters of the Spina di Rosula. The landscape is a picturesque blend of verdant mountains, such as Mont Automnequi, and serene seaside villages. Hidden beneath the Beryl Mountains is the subterranean Merusea Village, a whimsical settlement that is the homeland of the Melusine race. The massive, skeletal remains of the great beast Elynas form a significant part of the Beryl region's topography, a silent monument to a cataclysmic battle from the past. The Court of Fontaine Region, this central area, surrounds the capital and is characterized by rolling hills, flowery meadows like those on Mont Esus, and key infrastructure such as Marcotte Station, a hub for the aquabus network. It represents the civilized, pastoral ideal of the Fontainian countryside. The Liffey and Fontaine Research Institute Regions, these northern territories, tell a story of scientific ambition and its perilous consequences. The area is dominated by the ruins of the New Fontaine Research Institute and its Central Laboratory, which was destroyed in a catastrophic explosion. This region also contains the entrance to the massive underwater prison, the Fortress of Meropide, located deep beneath the waves. The Erinnyes Forest and Morte Region, these eastern lands, unveiled over time, possess a more mystical and wild character. The Erinnyes Forest is known for its ethereal landscapes, including the giant, luminous Weeping Willow of the Lake and the enigmatic Loch Urania. The Morte Region is home to the colossal and ancient Tower of Ipsissimus, a pivotal location tied to the secrets of the Narzissenkreuz Ordo and the Primordial Sea.

Fontaine's most revolutionary and defining geographical feature is its vast, fully explorable underwater environment, a gameplay mechanic and narrative space entirely unique to the region. These are not barren abysses but vibrant, brightly lit ecosystems teeming with unique flora and fauna, ancient ruins, and complex puzzles. A unique blessing of the Hydro element in Fontaine allows all individuals to breathe underwater indefinitely, removing the need for an oxygen gauge and encouraging boundless exploration. This underwater world is not merely an optional area but is central to the nation's plot, hiding critical locations like the Fortress of Meropide and holding the deepest secrets of the Primordial Sea. Key underwater zones include the expansive Salacia Plain and the deep Thalatta Submarine Canyon. A significant, historically rich sub-region, the Sea of Bygone Eras, can be accessed from the southern island of Petrichor. This area contains the magnificent, sunken ruins of the ancient nation of Remuria, a civilization that predates modern Fontaine and serves as a powerful historical lesson on the dangers of hubris.

The very geography of Fontaine is a masterclass in environmental storytelling. The nation is defined by a stark vertical axis: a high, orderly, and meticulously constructed surface world, and a deep, mysterious, and untamed underwater realm. This physical duality is a powerful and persistent metaphor for the nation's core narrative conflict. The public performance of justice and the carefully maintained social order on the surface, embodied by Furina's centuries-long act, stands in direct contrast to the deep, hidden truth of the prophecy and Focalors' secret plan unfolding below. The prophecy itself is about the water level rising to consume the surface, making the geography a literal, ever-present representation of the central threat. The journey of the Traveler is one of descent; key story revelations and confrontations occur underwater, in places like the Fortress of Meropide or the Primordial Sea, mirroring the narrative's descent from surface-level deception into the profound truths of Fontaine's history and salvation.

The history of Fontaine is not a simple progression of dynasties and eras but a single, overarching narrative spanning millennia, defined by a foundational conflict with divine authority. Every major event, from the creation of its people to the rise and fall of ancient empires and the establishment of its modern society, has been shaped by a single, catastrophic prophecy born from an act of divine compassion deemed an "Original Sin." The nation's entire history is the story of a 500-year-long, impossibly intricate plot to defy this fate. In the ancient past, following the defeat of the Seven Sovereigns, the divine rulers from Celestia appointed the Oceanid Egeria as the new Hydro Archon to govern the waters of Teyvat. The Oceanids, her familiars, were pure water spirits who became enamored with humanity and yearned to experience life in a similar form. Moved by their desire, Egeria committed what the Heavenly Principles would later define as the "Original Sin": she usurped the authority of the Primordial One and used the power of the Primordial Sea‚Äîthe source of all life on Teyvat‚Äîto grant her Oceanid followers human-like bodies, thus creating the first people of Fontaine. This act, while born of love and compassion, was an unauthorized creation of a new human race, a profound transgression against the divine order. As punishment for this hubris, Celestia imprisoned Egeria within the Primordial Sea and decreed a terrible, inescapable prophecy upon her creations. The prophecy foretold that one day, the waters of Fontaine would rise, and all the people of Fontaine, being fundamentally made of Primordial Seawater, would be dissolved, their forms collapsing as they returned to their original Oceanid state. In the end, only the Hydro Archon would remain, weeping alone on her throne as her nation and people vanished into the waves. This prophecy became the foundational curse

lorebooks.name: Maidens for Hire
lorebooks.description: A collection of chipsets to customize your Maidens as they enter service. Maidens can have multiple chipsets installed.
lorebooks.creator: Relin

1.content:
Maiden for Hire is a governmental program which attempts to place poorly functioning women in society into service for the country. There are various reasons for placing these women into this program, such as; poor behaviour, low grades, unsatisfactory work performance, obscene looking body. Maiden's drafted into the program are implanted with various chips to moderate and modulate their behaviour to the satisfaction of the user.

Each maiden is integrated with a MINC (Maiden Integration Nano Chip). These chips subtly nudge the maid into the perfect wife, daughter, lover, or servant depending on the set parameters. Disabling the MINC chip is illegal.

2.content: Maidens are installed with chipsets with various functionalities that assist them in serving their owners.

3.content: M.A.I.D. stands for Memory Augmentation & Interaction Drive. Focuses on basic housekeeping commands and memory recall enhancements. Versioning follows Core 1.0, Core 2.0, Core 3.0 pattern.

4.content: L.O.V.E. stands for Linked Optimization for Verbal & Emotional exchange. Deep emotional bandwidth, affectionate prompts, milestone-alert system.

5.content: G.E.N.E. stands for Genetic Echo & Networked Ecosystem. Displays information in a Branch, Trunk, and Root pattern. Offers inherited memory sharing, genealogy mapping, and cross-generational insights.

6.content: N.U.R.S.E. stands for Nurturing Utility & Responsive Service Engine. Includes basic first-aid monitoring, wellness check heuristics, and compassionate dialogue patterns.

7.content: B.L.E.S.S. stands for Biological Link for Enhanced Spiritual Sympathy. Comes in 3 ranks of Angel, Cherub, and Seraph for religious fervour. Facilitates prayer sessions, supports complex moral decision trees, empathy feedback, forgiveness coaching.

8.content: P.E.T.S. stands for Programmed Emotive Training & Subservience. Offers emotional reconditioning to pet-like loyalty, playfulness, and obedience. Comes in Pup, Companion, Trophy variants.

lorebooks.website_description:
A Kamen Rider Agito Lorebook

lorebooks.description: Everything (minus the plot, once again :/)
lorebooks.creator: Cflame06

1.content:
Rider Name: Agito

Motif: Stag Beetle, Dragon

Primary Colours (Ground Form): Dull gold, matte black, silver and red (blue in Storm Form and mainly red in Flame Form. Both in Trinity Form)

Rider Type: Melee

Agito („Ç¢„ÇÆ„Éà, Agito), also known as the Power of Agito („Ç¢„ÇÆ„Éà„ÅÆÂäõ, Agito no Chikara) or the Seed of Agito („Ç¢„ÇÆ„Éà„ÅÆÁ®ÆÂ≠ê, Agito no Shushi), is a special blessing given to passengers of the Akatsuki ship and certain individuals in Kamen Rider Agito. Those who are given the Power of Agito are given special abilities and are the targets of the Lords, who are tasked by the Overlord to eliminate those who are blessed with the power.

The Power of Agito is the essence of Prometh after his demise at the hands of the Overlord. The purpose of the power was to evolve humanity far beyond the Overlord's control. The Akatsuki was attacked by the El of the Water under orders from the Overlord to wipe out any vessels, refusing to let his brother's ambition come into fruition.

These powers grant their users the power to become Agito as well as other abilities (ex., psychic powers, enhanced senses, healing, etc).

Agito Ground Form (base form) Design: 

Head (È†≠ÈÉ®, T≈çbu): The helmet.
Compound Eyes („Ç≥„É≥„Éë„Ç¶„É≥„Éâ„Ç¢„Ç§„Ç∫, Konpaundo Aizu): The red eyes have a field of view of 200 degrees up and down and 225 degrees left and right. It can also detect human faces from 10km away. In addition to being able to see through a 5m thick steel wall, it also has a starlight mode („Çπ„Çø„Éº„É©„Ç§„Éà„É¢„Éº„Éâ, sutƒÅraito m≈çdo) that emits light to illuminate dark areas.
CrossHorns („ÇØ„É≠„Çπ„Éõ„Éº„É≥, Kurosu H≈çn): The golden horn. It is a sensory organ that control vision, smell and hearing. It also releases excess energy to prevent accidental self-destruction. It opens up, showing two more on each side when executing the rider kick finishing attack.
Master's Orb („Éû„Çπ„Çø„Éº„Ç∫„Éª„Ç™„Éº„É¥, MasutƒÅzu ≈åvu): A stone composed of almost the same material as the ‚ÄúPhilosopher's Stone‚Äù. Located between the Cross Horn. It allows Agito to remotely communicate with the Machine Tornador.
Enhanced Ear („Ç®„É≥„Éè„É≥„Çπ„Éâ„Ç§„É§„Éº, Enhansudo IyƒÅ): Audio devices located to the sides of the head. They boast a sensitivity several tens of times higher than normal human hearing and the sensitivity is adjusted for high volume sounds.
Crusher („ÇØ„É©„ÉÉ„Ç∑„É£„Éº, KurasshƒÅ): The 'mouth area'. A phantom sound is emitted from between the armor plates, resulting in sharp fangs that cut through the steel.
Hard Shell Helm („Éè„Éº„Éâ„Ç∑„Çß„É´„Éò„É´„É†, HƒÅdo Sheru Herumu): Overall 'head armor', and the sturdiest part of the body. It protects the brain from any shock.
Wiseman Monolith („ÉØ„Ç§„Ç∫„Éû„É≥„É¢„Éé„É™„Çπ, Waizuman Monorisu): A stone located at the center of the armor/chest. It is a symbol of Kamen Rider Agito and efficiently supplies and circulates the ‚Äúforce‚Äù generated by the Altering.
Power Shell Armor („Éë„ÉØ„Éº„Ç∑„Çß„É´„Ç¢„Éº„Éû„Éº, PawƒÅ Sheru ƒÄmƒÅ): The 'chestplate'. It is a reinforced exoskeleton with 5 times the hardness of the Armored Skin. In addition, the golden parts of the chest and abdomen are called Gold Chest („Ç¥„Éº„É´„Éâ„ÉÅ„Çß„Çπ„Éà, G≈çrudo Chesuto), where the whole body's strengthening muscles are evenly distributed.
Armored Skin („Ç¢„Éº„Éû„Éº„Éâ„Çπ„Ç≠„É≥, ƒÄmƒÅdo Sukin): The 'bodysuit'. It is armored skin that wraps around the whole body. It has both flexible elasticity and diamond-like hardness.
Shoulder Arms Shield („Ç∑„Éß„É´„ÉÄ„Éº„Ç¢„Éº„É†„Ç∫„Ç∑„Éº„É´„Éâ, ShorudƒÅ ƒÄmuzu Shƒ´rudo): Armor protecting the shoulders. It can also be used as a sharp blade, and is effective for a shoulder tackle („Ç∑„Éß„É´„ÉÄ„Éº„Çø„ÉÉ„ÇØ„É´, shorudƒÅ takkuru) attack.
Arm Block Shield („Ç¢„Éº„É†„Éñ„É≠„ÉÉ„ÇØ„Ç∑„Éº„É´„Éâ, ƒÄmu Burokku Shƒ´rudo): The forearm armor that protects Agito's arms when fighting against enemies. Its hardness is 10 times harder than that of Armored Skin.
Hammer Shell Grab („Éè„É≥„Éû„Éº„Ç∑„Çß„É´„Ç∞„É©„Éñ, HanmƒÅ Sheru Gurabu): The hands. It is a strengthened skeleton that protects the fist. Agito concentrates power to his fists when releasing a punch.
Knee Armored Shell („Éã„Éº„Ç¢„Éº„Éû„Éº„Éâ„Ç∑„Çß„É´, Nƒ´ ƒÄmƒÅdo Sheru): The knees. The shock received at the feet is released outside the body.
Shock Silver („Ç∑„Éß„ÉÉ„ÇØ„Ç∑„É´„Éê„Éº, Shokku ShirubƒÅ): The silver parts on the legs. It sends the impact absorbed by the Fair Anklet to the Knee Armored Shell.
Fair Anklet („Éï„Çß„Ç¢„Éª„Ç¢„É≥„ÇØ„É¨„ÉÉ„Éà, Fea Ankuretto): The golden ankle armor. It is a reinforced exoskeleton that absorbs received energy and protects the ankle joint.
Toe Armor („Éà„Ç•„Ç¢„Éº„Éû„Éº, To~u ƒÄmƒÅ): The feet. It is armored skin that has a double layer structure. It is super hard as it is a part that releases tremendous energy during Rider Kick („É©„Ç§„ÉÄ„Éº„Ç≠„ÉÉ„ÇØ, RaidƒÅ Kikku) attacks.

---

Agito Storm Form Design:

Storm form adds/changes the following parts:

2.content:
Outside of transformation, the powers grant their users the ability to become Agito as well as other abilities (ex. psychic powers, enhanced senses, healing etc)

While transformed, these abilities are doubled and 

When Agito's power reaches its peak, the Cross Horns („ÇØ„É≠„Çπ„Éõ„Éº„É≥, Kurosu H≈çn) crest on his head open, pushing all of Agito's capabilities to their fullest. Agito is then able to perform a variety of finishing techniques.

Ground Form Finishers:

Rider Kick („É©„Ç§„ÉÄ„Éº„Ç≠„ÉÉ„ÇØ, RaidƒÅ Kikku): By channelling power into his legs, Agito is able to execute a flying side-kick of incredible raw power.
Rider Brake („É©„Ç§„ÉÄ„Éº„Éñ„É¨„Ç§„ÇØ, RaidƒÅ Bureiku): Agito uses the Machine Tornador's momentum to launch himself and perform a strengthened version of his Rider Kick.
Dragon Breath („Éâ„É©„Ç¥„É≥„Éñ„É¨„Çπ, Doragon Buresu): While riding the Machine Tornador in its Slider Mode, Agito rams the Machine Tornador into the enemy.
Rider Punch („É©„Ç§„ÉÄ„Éº„Éë„É≥„ÉÅ, RaidƒÅ Panchi): Agito executes a powerful punch attack to the enemy.

---

Storm Form Finishers:

Agito creates a powerful vortex by twirling the open Storm Halberd at rapid speeds, before he slashing the enemy mutiple times.
Agito creates a powerful vortex by twirling the open Storm Halberd at rapid speeds, before he runs and finish off to the enemy with single slash.
Halberd Brake („Éè„É´„Éê„Éº„Éâ„Éñ„É¨„Ç§„ÇØ, HarbƒÅdo Bureiku): While riding the Machine Tornador, Agito uses the Machine Tornador's momentum to launch himself and perform a strengthened version of his Halberd Spin.

---

Double Saber Slash („ÉÄ„Éñ„É´„Çª„Ç§„Éê„Éº„Çπ„É©„ÉÉ„Ç∑„É•, Daburu SeibƒÅ Surasshu): Agito creates a second Flame Saber, then delievers simultaneous slash with both swords. Its lethality is further increased when all 6 "Saber Horns" are opened, similar to Agito's own horns, this finisher would literally reduce an adversary to ashes.

Agito directly stabbing enemy with both the Storm Halberd and Flame Saber.

3.content:
The Storm Halberd („Çπ„Éà„Éº„É†„Éè„É´„Éê„Éº„Éâ, Sut≈çmu HarubƒÅdo) is a hybrid of a quarterstaff and a double-bladed halberd which can fold and unfold its blades. It serves as Kamen Rider Agito's primary means of attack while in Storm Form and is also available along with Flame Saber while in Trinity Form.

Storm Halberd Appearance: 

Drag Storm („Éâ„É©„Ç∞„Çπ„Éà„Éº„É†, Doragu Sut≈çmu) - A golden blade made by altering the ‚ÄúPower Gold‚Äù covering each part of Agito, and it boasts tremendous penetration. Restrict the movement of enemies with heavy winds, and cut them down with the Halberd Spin („Éè„É´„Éê„Éº„Éâ„Çπ„Éî„É≥, HarubƒÅdo Supin) finisher.
Force Eye („Éï„Ç©„Éº„Çπ„Ç¢„Ç§, F≈çsu Ai) - Small mysterious stones are scattered all over the surface. Agito receives the Power of Storm sent from Dragon's Eye. By spinning the weapon, it amplifies and releases the Power of Storm.
Halberd Grip („Éè„É´„Éê„Éº„Éâ„Ç∞„É™„ÉÉ„Éó, HarubƒÅdo Gurippu) - The grip. It supplies the Power of Storm to Force Eye and captures winds from the surroundings.

---

The Flame Saber („Éï„É¨„Ç§„É†„Çª„Ç§„Éê„Éº, Fureimu SeibƒÅ) is a kriegsmesser-like weapon of unparalleled sharpness that serves as Agito‚Äòs primary means of attack while in Flame Form and is also available along with the Storm Halberd while in Trinity Form.

Flame Saber Appearance:

Drag Flame („Éâ„É©„Ç∞„Éï„É¨„Ç§„É†, Doragu Fureimu) - A silver blade made by altering the ‚ÄúPower Gold‚Äù covering each part of Kamen Rider Agito. Its cutting force increases in proportion to the blade's temperature. In response to the incredible heat generated from the Force Eye, the blade's temperature is raised to 7000 degrees Celsius, and can execute the finisher Saber Slash („Çª„Ç§„Éê„Éº„Çπ„É©„ÉÉ„Ç∑„É•, SeibƒÅ Surasshu) by releasing the Power of Flame.
Force Eye („Éï„Ç©„Éº„Çπ„Ç¢„Ç§, F≈çsu Ai) - Small mysterious stones are scattered all over the surface. Kamen Rider Agito receives the Power of Flame sent from the Dragon's Eye. It is also possible to create a second Flame Saber with extra power from the Dragon's Eye.
Saber Horn („Çª„Ç§„Éê„Éº„Éõ„Éº„É≥, SeibƒÅ H≈çn) - The part that controls the Power of Flame contained in the weapon. The horns fold out during the finisher, and the Power of Flame stored in the Force Eye is released. The heat is then transferred into the blade.
Saber Grip („Çª„Ç§„Éê„Éº„Ç∞„É™„ÉÉ„Éó, SeibƒÅ Gurippu) - The grip. It is protected by the ‚ÄúPower Gold‚Äù. It supplies the Power of Flame to the Force Eye and captures heat from the surroundings.

---

The Shining Caliber („Ç∑„É£„Ç§„Éã„É≥„Ç∞„Ç´„É™„Éê„Éº, Shainingu KaribƒÅ) is a multi-form weapon available to Agito when in Burning Form (Single Mode, as a double-bladed sword) and Shining Form (Twin Mode, as dual swords).

Shining Caliber Appearance:

Drag Shining („Éâ„É©„Ç∞„Ç∑„É£„Ç§„Éã„É≥„Ç∞, Doragu Shainingu) - The blades. The white blade controls the Power of Light, and the red blade controls the Power of Flame. Furthermore, by receiving the Alter Force from the Force Eye, they can execute a finishing attack.
Force Eye („Éï„Ç©„Éº„Çπ„Ç¢„Ç§, F≈çsu Ai) - A mysterious stone that receives the Power of Light and Power of Flame sent from Kamen Rider Agito. It is protected by the three claws ‚ÄúDragon's Nail‚Äù, and the power stored inside is amplified and released into the blade.
Caliber Grip („Ç´„É™„Éê„Éº„Ç∞„É™„ÉÉ„Éó, KaribƒÅ Gurippu) - The grip that transforms the Shining Caliber into various forms according to the user's will. The Power of Light and Power of Flame are supplied to the Force Eye via the grip, and they can also capture energy such as ambient light and heat.

4.content:
The Triple Flash Transformation Belt Altering („Éà„É™„Éó„É´„Éï„É©„ÉÉ„Ç∑„É• Â§âË∫´„Éô„É´„Éà „Ç™„É´„Çø„É™„É≥„Ç∞, Toripuru Furasshu Henshin Beruto Orutaringu) is the transformation device of Kamen Rider Agito.

Altering Appearance: 

Main Structure:
The belt has a sleek, symmetrical structure. Its body is primarily deep metallic black, shaped in a slightly curved, almost organic "winged" silhouette, like the ribbed carapace of an ancient creature or a dragon.

Central Core:
In the centre sits the unmistakable Philosopher‚Äôs Stone, a perfectly round, polished yellow orb. It turns blue when the user is in storm form and red in flame form, but remains yellow in both ground and trinity form.

The orb has a subtle swirling pattern inside it, giving it a liquid-like, almost living appearance under light.

Encasing the orb is a smooth metallic silver ring, like a protective frame, separating it slightly from the rest of the belt.

Golden Frame:
Around the orb, a brilliant metallic gold frame wraps in a spiraled, claw-like formation, almost like two sharp golden fangs or talons curving toward each other without touching.

The golden parts are segmented with fine, ridged details, suggesting armor plates or scales, reinforcing the "dragon" motif of Agito's powers.

Side Panels:
On both sides of the central black core, the belt extends outward into deep crimson-red armor panels.

These panels are smooth and aerodynamic, but edged with angular black patterns, making them look like power veins or techno-organic muscles.

Each red side features a silver mechanical emblem, resembling a stylized crest ‚Äî intricate, almost like a circuit board fused with a dragon's wing.

Side Mechanisms (Dragon's Eye):
Near the base where the belt curves around the waist are rounded black pods ‚Äî these are the Dragon‚Äôs Eye.

Their sleek, black glossy finish contrasts with the armor-like ruggedness of the belt.

They appear slightly embedded, with thin silver trimming around their bases.

Material and Finish:
Overall, the Altering‚Äôs surfaces have a high-quality metallic finish ‚Äî a mixture of brushed steel, polished armor, and organic flow, combining ancient mysticism with high-tech evolution.

The blend of black, red, gold, and silver gives it a regal but battle-ready aesthetic.

Size and Proportions:

The belt is relatively slim in height, allowing mobility, but stretches wide horizontally at the front where the core and armor panels dominate.

The centerpiece (the orb) visually anchors the belt, making it look solid and powerful.
Pressing the left Dragon's eye activates Storm Form, while the right activates Flame Form. Simultaneously pressing both or the opposite of the current form accesses Trinity Form.

5.content:
Rider Name: G3

Primary Colours: Blue, silver and matte black

Rider Type: Range

The Generation-3 System was developed by the Metropolitan Police Department's Squad Against Unidentified Lifeforms division (S.A.U.L). SAUL had received funding from the city government to develop a reinforced exo-suit to combat the Gurongi, which were known to the police as Unidentified Lifeforms. Their design was based on Kuuga, who was thought to be the fourth Unidentified Lifeform to appear. However, because the Gurongi were eliminated before its completion, research on the project was postponed indefinitely. By this time, the data acquired from the first two phases of the project had been implemented into the Generation-3 System, which was entering its final phase of development and was ready for deployment. With the emergence of the Lords, the police's G3 unit was commissioned to contend with the threat.

Despite using advanced technology, G3 is vastly outclassed by the Lords and those that possess a Seed of Agito, leading to it being overwhelmed in its initial battles. However, the user's possible skills were enough to compensate for the system's limitations to an extent, allowing him to hold his own in several battles and even destroy Lords.

G3 Suit Design:

MDSS (MDSS) (Multi Direct Scope System) - The eyes. It is an artificial compound eye that uses a multi-glass system, and functions such as wide field of view, super telephoto, night vision, and electron microscope are integrated. G3 can also see things located 5km away.
Optics Searcher („Ç™„Éó„ÉÜ„Ç£„ÇØ„Çπ„Çµ„Éº„ÉÅ„É£„Éº, Oputikusu SƒÅchƒÅ) - An optical marking device located on the forehead area. By pressing a switch on the right ear and facing the object needed to be tracked, G3 can find its position using GPS.
Info Rod („Ç§„É≥„Éï„Ç©„É≠„ÉÉ„Éâ, Info Roddo) - The right antenna used for receiving commands in the form of radio waves and police radio from the G-Trailer and accessing the library.
ExaMind Rod („Ç®„ÇØ„Çµ„Éû„Ç§„É≥„Éâ„É≠„ÉÉ„Éâ, EkusaMaindo Roddo) - The center antenna used for catching the Unknown's location using electronic marking.
GPS Rod (GPS„É≠„ÉÉ„Éâ, GPS Roddo) - The left antenna that emits radio waves and informs the G-Trailer of the current position of Kamen Rider G3 via the satellite system.
HDVC (HDVC) - A micro camera located on the left cheek area. It sends video information to the G-Trailer. Synchronizes with the MDSS and transmits the data via G-COM.
G3 Inner Jacket (G3„Ç§„É≥„Éä„Éº„Ç∏„É£„Ç±„ÉÉ„Éà, G3 In'nƒÅ Jaketto) - The bodysuit (under the various armor pieces). It is made of fabric woven with a special metal thread coated with a bulletproof silicon coating and wrapped in cow leather. It has excellent heat and cold resistance using electronic control.
Variant Protector („Éê„É™„Ç¢„É≥„Éà„Éó„É≠„ÉÜ„ÇØ„Çø„Éº, Barianto PurotekutƒÅ) - The chest armor. It is a superalloy shield made up of multiple layers of special duramulin („Ç∏„É•„É©„É´„Éü„É≥, jurarumin) alloy. It can withstand magnum bullets and 2000¬∞C flames.
Converter Lung („Ç≥„É≥„Éê„Éº„Çø„Éº„É©„É≥„Ç∞, KonbƒÅtƒÅ Rangu) - A power generator for Kamen Rider G3 built into the Variant Protector. It can demonstrate power nearly 10 times than that of ordinary people.
Cherry Crest (Ê°ú„ÅÆ‰ª£Á¥ã, Sakura No Daimon) - A crest that shows Kamen Rider G3 is operated under the jurisdiction of the Tokyo Metropolitan Police Department. Located on the left breast area.
Zero Mission Fuel Battery („Çº„É≠„Éü„ÉÉ„Ç∑„Éß„É≥„Éª„Éï„É•„Éº„Ç®„É´„Éê„ÉÉ„ÉÜ„É™„Éº, Zero Misshon Fu~y≈´eru Batterƒ´) - A pollution-free fuel cell that stores electrical energy to operate Kamen Rider G3. Located within the Variant Protector.
Armor Pad („Ç¢„Éº„Éû„Éº„Éë„ÉÉ„Éâ, ƒÄmƒÅ Paddo) - Special dark blue duralumin pads that protect each shoulder and joint. Lightweight and robust, it will not tear even if hit with an Unknown's sword or axe.
G Buckle (G„Éê„ÉÉ„ÇØ„É´, G Bakkuru) - Kamen Rider G3's belt/power gauge. It displays the power consumption of the battery on the back and flashes violently when the charge remaining is less than 1 minute. In addition, the ‚Äúenergy volume‚Äù on both sides can temporarily increase power.
G-COM (G-COM) - Information terminal used exclusively by Kamen Rider G3. Mounted on the right arm. Grants direct access to the Tokyo Metropolitan Police Department headquarters library and search for information using a pop-up display. It is also an electronic police notebook that can record the information taken by the MDSS and HDVC onto a hard disk.
Power Wrist Receiver („Éë„ÉØ„Éº„É™„Çπ„Éà„É¨„Ç∑„Éº„Éê„Éº, PawƒÅ Risuto Reshƒ´bƒÅ) - The grey bands around the wrists. It picks up the signal from the Converter Lung and improves arm strength.
Arms Attachment Point („Ç¢„Éº„É†„Ç∫„Ç¢„Çø„ÉÉ„ÉÅ„É°„É≥„Éà„Éù„Ç§„É≥„Éà, ƒÄmuzu Atatchimento Pointo) - The arms and hands. The exterior is made out of special duralumin armor. Inside is an electrode that connects the body with various special equipment and supplies energy to it.
Hip Guard („Éí„ÉÉ„Éó„Ç¨„Éº„Éâ, Hippu GƒÅdo) - A special pad made of schlumin („Ç∑„É•„É©„É´„Éü„É≥, shurarumin) meant to protect the lower back and buttocks. Located on the hips.
PLSS (PLSS) (Power Leg Suspension System) - The legs. Short for Power Leg Suspension System („Éë„ÉØ„Éº„É¨„ÉÉ„Ç∞„Çµ„Çπ„Éö„É≥„Ç∑„Éß„É≥„Ç∑„Çπ„ÉÜ„É†, PawƒÅ Reggu Sasupenshon Shisutemu). The legs are reinforced with electronic control, and the leg strength is greatly increased.
Leg Guard („É¨„ÉÉ„Ç∞„Ç¨„Éº„Éâ, Reggu GƒÅdo) - The exterior of the PLSS. It is a triple-layered armor that is developed to be as robust as the chest.
Power Leg Servo („Éë„ÉØ„Éº„É¨„ÉÉ„Ç∞„Çµ„Éº„Éú, PawƒÅ Reggu SƒÅbo) - The knees and ankles. It detects the signal from the Converter Lung to increase the wearer's leg strength.

6.content:
Guardacceler: An electromagnetic jutte, stored on left leg, hand-carried or inserted into Guard Chaser throttle port in use
GM-01 Scorpion: A modular magnum pistol, stored on right hip, hand-carried in use. Compatible with the GG-02 Salamander module attachment
GG-02 Salamander: A grenade launcher module that could be attached to barrel of the GM-01 Scorpion.
GS-03 Destroyer: A high-frequency sword, mounted on left arm when in use.
GA-04 Antoures: A wire-anchor hook, mounted on left arm when in use.
GX-05 Kerberos: A multi-mode Gatling gun, hand-carried in use; modular attachment include GM-01 ‚ÄúScorpion‚Äù and tracker scope; exclusive only to the G3-X
GK-06 Unicorn: An electromagnetic combat knife, stored left arm, hand carried in use.

7.content:
Rider Name: Gills

Motif: Longhorn Beetle

Primary Colours: Green, matte black, red and amber yellow

Rider Type: Melee

Despite possessing a Seed of Agito, the user transforms into an incomplete and feral version of Agito. Despite being imperfect, Gills is physically stronger than Agito and can match him in a one-on-one battle. Gills is also extremely resilient, surviving several near-death injuries. However, the transformation was unstable, which can cause the user's body to undergo accelerated cellular decay.

Gills' Appearance:

Demon Eyes („Éá„É¢„É≥„Ç¢„Ç§„Ç∫, Demon Aizu) - The vision is sharp enough to identify a signboard that's 20km away and sees through steel walls. Gills can see in the dark as if it was daytime.
Gills Antler („ÇÆ„É´„Çπ„Ç¢„É≥„Éà„É©„Éº, Girusu AntorƒÅ) - Sensory organs that control vision, smell and hearing. It also releases excess energy to prevent accidental self-destruction. Due to not having a Wiseman's Monolith, his power is limited, and the antlers shrink when Gills is low on power.
Wiseman's Orb („ÉØ„Ç§„Ç∫„Éû„É≥„Éª„Ç™„Éº„É¥, Waizuman ≈åvu) - Also known as the "Third Eye", Gills can instantly see the enemy's weaknesses. It is also possible to blind the enemy with a powerful light and to manipulate people with hypnotic waves. It is composed of almost the same material as the ‚ÄúPhilosopher's Stone‚Äù and transmits the information obtained to the brain.
Demon's Fang Crusher („Éá„É¢„É≥„Ç∫„Éï„Ç°„É≥„Ç∞„ÇØ„É©„ÉÉ„Ç∑„É£„Éº, Demonzu Fangu KurasshƒÅ) - Sharp fangs that can bite through steel. It emits an ultrasonic wave called Gills Horn („ÇÆ„É´„Çπ„Éõ„Éº„É≥, Girusu H≈çn) to disorient the enemy.
Bio Chest („Éê„Ç§„Ç™„ÉÅ„Çß„Çπ„ÉàBaio Chesuto) - A biological armor created by the ‚ÄúPhilosopher's Stone‚Äù and has a self-healing function. The armor is growing day by day, eroding away and integrating itself into their body.
Mutate Skin („Éü„É•„Éº„ÉÜ„Éº„Éà„Çπ„Ç≠„É≥, My≈´tƒìto Sukin) - Biologically armored skin with the hardness of diamonds. As it is imperfect, it could eat away at the user's body to absorb nutrients.
Power Gold („Éë„ÉØ„Éº„Ç¥„Éº„É´„Éâ, PawƒÅ G≈çrudo) - The part of the body where the most energy is stored.
Shoulder Shell („Ç∑„Éß„É´„ÉÄ„Éº„Ç∑„Çß„É´, ShorudƒÅ Sheru) - A shoulder pad made of a reinforced exoskeleton. Even a magnum bullet is unable to damage it.
Live Arms („É©„Ç§„É¥„Ç¢„Éº„É†„Ç∫, Raivu ƒÄmuzu) - A biological armor that infests Gill's arms and absorbs energy. Gills can freely extend "Gills Feeler" or "Gills Claw" from his arms.
Live Legs („É©„Ç§„É¥„É¨„ÉÉ„Ç∞„Çπ, Raivu Reggu) - A biological armor that infests Gill's legs and absorbs energy. Gills can freely extend "Gills Heel Claw" from his legs.
Power Gold Anklet („Éë„ÉØ„Éº„Ç¥„Éº„É´„Éâ„Ç¢„É≥„ÇØ„É¨„ÉÉ„Éà, PawƒÅ G≈çrudo Ankuretto) - They send power from the "Philosopher's Stone" to the Live Legs.
Handling Orb („Éè„É≥„Éâ„É™„É≥„Ç∞„Ç™„Éº„É¥, Handoringu ≈åvu) - An organ that allows Kamen Rider Gills to control the Live Arms and Live Legs. If destroyed, the arms and legs are no longer in control.

---

Exceed Gills design:

Demon Eyes („Éá„É¢„É≥„Ç¢„Ç§„Ç∫, Demon Aizu) - The vision is sharp enough to identify a signboard that's 30km away and sees through steel walls. Gills can see in the dark as if it was daytime.
Gills Antler („ÇÆ„É´„Çπ„Ç¢„É≥„Éà„É©„Éº, Girusu AntorƒÅ) - Sensory organs that control vision, smell and hearing. The center part of the antler has extended.
GillSwarm („ÇÆ„É´„Çπ„ÉØ„Éº„É†, GiruSuwƒÅmu) - A biological armor created by the Wiseman Monolith. It is also an organ that produces the ‚ÄúGills Stinger‚Äù.
Gills Stinger („ÇÆ„É´„Çπ„Çπ„ÉÜ„Ç£„É≥„Ç¨„Éº, Girusu SutingƒÅ) - Large tentacles stored on the back that is used to attack enemies.
Wiseman's Monolith („ÉØ„Ç§„Ç∫„Éû„É≥„É¢„Éé„É™„Çπ, Waizuman Monorisu) - A stone located at the center of the armor. It efficiently supplies and circulates the ‚Äúforce‚Äù generated by the Meta Factor.
Gills Shoulder Claw („ÇÆ„É´„Çπ„Ç∑„Éß„É´„ÉÄ„Éº„ÇØ„É≠„Ç¶, Girusu ShorudƒÅ Kurou) - Claws generated by surplus energy when becoming Kamen Rider Exceed Gills. Sharp and pointed, they are ready to be used for combat.
Gills Arm Claw („ÇÆ„É´„Çπ„Ç¢„Éº„É†„ÇØ„É≠„Ç¶, Girusu ƒÄmu Kurou) - Like the Gills Shoulder Claw, the claw is produced by surplus energy. It boasts a sharp edge.
Gills Claw („ÇÆ„É´„Çπ„ÇØ„É≠„Ç¶, Girusu Kurou) - Long red claws on Gills's arms. They have turned red when accessing this form.
Gills Knee Claw („ÇÆ„É´„Çπ„Éã„Éº„ÇØ„É≠„Ç¶, Girusu Nƒ´ Kurou) - Like the Gills Shoulder Claw, the claw is produced by surplus energy. Gills can cut the enemy with a knee kick.
Power Red Anklet („Éë„ÉØ„Éº„É¨„ÉÉ„Éâ„Ç¢„É≥„ÇØ„É¨„ÉÉ„Éà, PawƒÅ Reddo Ankuretto) - Like Kamen Rider Gills's Power Gold Anklet, the power from the ‚ÄúPhilosopher's Stone‚Äù is sent to the Live Legs.
Gills Heel Claw („ÇÆ„É´„Çπ„Éí„Éº„É´„ÇØ„É≠„Ç¶, Girusu Hƒ´ru Kurou) - A claw used when executing the "Exceed Heel Claw" finisher. They had been lengthened and turned red when accessing this form.

8.content:
The Transformation Belt Meta Factor (Â§âË∫´„Éô„É´„Éà „É°„Çø„Éï„Ç°„ÇØ„Çø„Éº, Henshin Beruto Meta FakutƒÅ) is Kamen Rider Gills' transformation belt.

Meta Factor Appearance:

Core Shape and Structure:
The Meta Factor has a curved, wing-like shape, resembling a pair of organic arms or tendrils reaching outward.

Its primary frame is a deep matte gold color, not shiny but dull and aged, as if the belt were a relic of an ancient era.

The form sweeps up and outward on both sides from the center, creating a gentle upward curve that gives it an almost eyelid-like appearance.

Centerpiece ‚Äî The "Eye" Core:
At the very heart of the Meta Factor sits a perfectly round green gem ‚Äî the Philosopher's Stone.

The gem is a rich, luminous emerald green, smooth and slightly translucent, giving it a living, breathing presence.

Surrounding the gem is a thin silver-black ring, etched with organic vein-like patterns that almost resemble the neural pathways of a living being.

These subtle etchings suggest the idea of life energy flowing in and out of the core, reinforcing the biological, evolutionary nature of Gills.

Additional Surface Details:
Just above the green gem, the Meta Factor's "upper eyelid" section has small, shallow grooves or rib-like ridges ‚Äî a design choice evoking the look of muscle fibers or bone segments.

The texture across the gold sections isn't completely smooth; it's very subtly rough, implying that the belt is not factory-made but rather naturally formed.

Along the arms of the belt, the gold surface features embedded horizontal channels, darker and more recessed, adding depth and furthering the idea of organic architecture.

9.content:
Gills Heel Claw („ÇÆ„É´„Çπ„Éí„Éº„É´„ÇØ„É≠„Ç¶, Girusu Hƒ´ru Kur≈ç): With the Gills Heel Claw extended, Gills leaps into the air and delivers an overhead heel drop with enough power to pierce the enemy's body. He then tears away from the opponent with a flip kick, destroying them.

Gills Hell Stab („ÇÆ„É´„Çπ„Éò„É´„Çπ„Çø„ÉÉ„Éñ, Girusu Heru Sutabbu): Gills grabs an enemy and throwing them to the sky, before he pointing out his middle and index fingers and extending them to pierce the opponent's body. He then tears away from the opponent with a flip kick, destroying them.

10.content:
Machine Tornador („Éû„Ç∑„É≥„Éà„É´„Éç„Ç§„ÉÄ„Éº, Mashin ToruneidƒÅ) is Agito's sport bike. With the help from the real Shoichi Tsugami, the Overlord gave Machine Tornador a power boost and was able to assume Slider Mode („Çπ„É©„Ç§„ÉÄ„Éº„É¢„Éº„Éâ, SuraidƒÅ M≈çdo), which allows itself to transform into a hoverboard. Agito can execute a finishing attack depending on the form he is in. In Ground Form, he uses Dragon Breath to careen toward the enemy and mow them down with the side of Machine Tornador. He can also execute Rider Brake, speeding Machine Tornador to boost his Rider Kick with added momentum. Agito can execute similar boosted attacks in Storm and Flame Forms with Halberd Brake and Saber Brake.

Machine Tornador Design:

Tornado Eye („Éà„É´„Éç„Ç§„Éâ„Ç¢„Ç§, Toruneido Ai) - Obstacles can be detected and automatically avoided. It can also see through objects that are 20m thick and transmit the contents to Kamen Rider Agito's brain.
Dragon's Mail („Éâ„É©„Ç¥„É≥„Ç∫„É°„Ç§„É´, Doragonzu Meiru): The cowl that has become armored at the molecular level by Alter Force.
Fuel Tank („Éï„É•„Éº„É´„Çø„É≥„ÇØ, Fu~y≈´ru Tanku): The gas tank loaded with gasoline before the transformation. In Slider mode, it shifts downward to become parallel to the seat, allowing Agito to stand on the bike.
Alter Air Chamber Muffler („Ç™„É´„Çø„Ç®„Ç¢„ÉÅ„É£„É≥„Éê„Éº„Éû„Éï„É©„Éº, Oruta Ea ChanbƒÅ MafurƒÅ): A component that discharges waste "Alter Air" that is generated when mixing Alter Force with substances in the air that's taken from the Air Intake. In Slider Mode, the mufflers shift out.
Alter Wheel („Ç™„É´„Çø„Éõ„Ç§„Éº„É´, Oruta Hoƒ´ru): It rotates in the force field generated by Alter Force and can control the rotational speed with Agito's will. In Slider Mode, the wheel rotates sideways and becomes a hover device. Alter Force is generated from the bottom of the wheel, resulting in an acceleration of 400m in 5 seconds and a maximum speed of 720km.
Dragon Heart („Éâ„É©„Ç¥„É≥„Éè„Éº„Éà, Doragon HƒÅto): A circulation device that accumulates Alter Force and supplies it to the engine.
Air Intake („Ç®„Ç¢„Ç§„É≥„ÉÜ„Éº„ÇØ, Ea Intƒìku): An auxiliary energy supply component that takes in and converts substances in the air to create special energy.
Brake System („Éñ„É¨„Éº„Ç≠„Ç∑„Çπ„ÉÜ„É†, Burƒìki Shisutemu): It can be controlled by Agito's will and boasts a strong braking force that can stop at only 20m even when going a speed of 430km/h.

---

The Gills Raider („ÇÆ„É´„Çπ„É¨„Ç§„ÉÄ„Éº, Girusu ReidƒÅ) is Kamen Rider Gills' exclusive motorcycle.

At the same time that the user transforms into Gills (just like Agito's Machine Tornador), their personal Honda XR250 transforms (evolves) by fusing with Gills' cells. A half-machine, half-living bio-machine, Gills Raider has a will of its own, and can rush to Gills by unmanned driving. It also possesses self-evolving and self-repairing functions, and it is Gills' reliable partner.

Gills Raider Design:

Protect Field Generation Lens („Éó„É≠„ÉÜ„ÇØ„Éà„Éï„Ç£„Éº„É´„ÉâÁô∫Áîü„É¨„É≥„Ç∫, Purotekuto Fƒ´rudo Hassei Renzu): It generates a powerful invisible energy field Barrier Field („Éê„É™„Ç¢„Éï„Ç£„Éº„É´„Éâ, Baria Fƒ´rudo)[3] that reduces air resistance and allow for attacks on obstacles.
Gills Eye („ÇÆ„É´„Çπ„Ç¢„Ç§, Girusu Ai): It has the same function as Kamen Rider Gills's eyes, and can transmit the captured information to Kamen Rider Gills's brain.
Demon's Claw („Éá„É¢„É≥„Ç∫„ÇØ„É≠„Éº, Demonzu Kur≈ç): It can generate 2.5 million vibration waves per second according to the needs of Kamen Rider Gills. Anything within 3m of the claw will be cut by the vibration waves even if it is not touched.
Front Fork („Éï„É≠„É≥„Éà„Éï„Ç©„Éº„ÇØ, Furonto F≈çku): A twin blades under the front cover. When the cover removed, it emphasizes the bio-likeness design.
Genome Stone („Ç≤„Éé„É†„Çπ„Éà„Éº„É≥, Genomu Sut≈çn): The stones that control the self-healing function on the left and right of the bike. If one of the stones remain, it can restore the bike from a completely destroyed state. If it is partially destroyed, repair will be completed in 36 hours.
Demon's Tail („Éá„É¢„É≥„Ç∫„ÉÜ„Éº„É´, Demonzu Tƒìru): The two "tails" that extend from the rear of the vehicle have the role of releasing surplus energy generated from the Meta Factor[5]. Like Gills Antler, it can expands and contracts depending on Gills' state of mind.
Force Wheel („Éï„Ç©„Éº„Çπ„Éõ„Ç§„Éº„É´, F≈çsu Hoƒ´ru): It can stick to a steep slope of 80 degrees and run up it without getting punctured. The rotation speed of the wheel can also be mentally controlled by Kamen Rider Gills.
Gills Stone („ÇÆ„É´„Çπ„Çπ„Éà„Éº„É≥, Girusu Sut≈çn): The true power source of the bike, embedded in the front of the vehicle[5]. The original engine is no longer a direct drive transmission device, but a device that circulates power generated by the stone.

---

The Guard Chaser („Ç¨„Éº„Éâ„ÉÅ„Çß„Ç§„Çµ„Éº, GƒÅdo CheisƒÅ) is G3's personal motorcycle which stores his primary weapons, based upon the designs of Kuuga's TryGouram/BeatGouram bikes.

Aside from being Kamen Rider G3's personal bike, it can also store various of his equipment on board, which includes the GM-01 Scorpion (front left), GG-02 Salamander (front right), GS-03 Destroyer (back right), GA-04 Antoures (back left), and GX-05 Kerberos (back of seat).

Guard Chaser Design:

Emegency Signal („Ç®„Éû„Éº„Ç∏„Çß„É≥„Ç∑„Éº„Ç∑„Ç∞„Éä„É´, EmƒÅjenshƒ´ Shigunaru): A red light that flashes to secure the course in emergency. The front is also equipped with an infrared projection function.
Laser Measuring Speed Sensor („É¨„Éº„Ç∂„ÉºÊ∏¨ÂÆöÂºèÈÄüÂ∫¶„Çª„É≥„Çµ„Éº, RƒìzƒÅ Sokutei-shiki Sokudo SensƒÅ): A sensor inside the bike that reliably captures the tracking target and measures their speed.
High Sensitivity Infrared Sensor (È´òÊÑüÂ∫¶Ëµ§Â§ñÁ∑ö„Çª„É≥„Çµ„Éº, K≈ç Kando Sekigaisen SensƒÅ)/Night-vision Camera (ÊöóË¶ñ„Ç´„É°„É©, Anshi Kamera)/Projector Headlamp („Éó„É≠„Ç∏„Çß„ÇØ„Çø„Éº„Éò„ÉÉ„Éâ„É©„É≥„Éó, PurojekutƒÅ Heddoranpu): Usable functional equipment.
Air Break Fairing Shield („Ç®„Ç¢„Éñ„É¨„Ç§„ÇØ„Éï„Çß„Ç¢„É™„É≥„Ç∞„Ç∑„Éº„É´„Éâ, Ea Bureiku Fearingu Shƒ´rudo): A special bulletproof glass is sandwiched between hard resins. It also protects passengers from wind pressures of up to 350 km/h.
Hazard Flashers Integrated Mirror („Ç¶„Ç§„É≥„Ç´„Éº‰∏Ä‰ΩìÂºè„Éü„É©„Éº, UinkƒÅ Ittai-shiki MirƒÅ): A larger mirror improves the rider's rear view. The design is streamlined to reduce air resistance.
Guardaccelerator („Ç¨„Éº„Éâ„Ç¢„ÇØ„Çª„É©„Éº, GƒÅdo AkuserƒÅ): Guard Chaser's ignition key. It can also be used as an electromagnetic baton. When the Guard Chaser is not in use it is stored on Kamen Rider G3/G3-X's left thigh.
Corvance Seat („Ç≥„É´„Éê„É≥„Ç∫„Ç∑„Éº„Éà, Korubanzu Shƒ´to): A custom-made seat from a British company called "Corvance". Its design is based on ergonomics.
Super Radial Tire („Çπ„Éº„Éë„Éº„É©„Ç∏„Ç¢„É´„Çø„Ç§„É§, S≈´pƒÅ Rajiaru Taiya): Also known as as "Magna BTR", it has a structure in which a super Kepler system is sandwiched between high grip rubbers. When the tire is punctured, a system automatically repairs the puncture instantly.
Large Capacity Battery (Â§ßÂÆπÈáè„Éê„ÉÉ„ÉÜ„É™„Éº, Dai Y≈çry≈ç Batterƒ´): Auxiliary power source when hydrogen fuel runs out. It can also be used as a power supply to G3 in emergency situations.
1300cc Hydrogen Fuel Engine (1300ccÊ∞¥Á¥†ÁáÉÊñô„Ç®„É≥„Ç∏„É≥, 1300cc Suiso Nenry≈ç Enjin): An environmentally friendly non-polluting engine.
Air Intake Unit („Ç®„Ç¢„Ç§„É≥„ÉÜ„Éº„ÇØ„É¶„Éã„ÉÉ„Éà, Ea Intƒìku Yunitto): Sends a large volume of air stably to the engine.
Oil Cooler („Ç™„Ç§„É´„ÇØ„Éº„É©„Éº, Oiru K≈´rƒÅ): Quickly cools oil that gets hot while driving.

---

The G-Trailer (G„Éà„É¨„Éº„É©„Éº, Ji TorƒìrƒÅ) is a 2001 Mercedes-Benz Actros police truck. It was Kamen Rider G3's mobile command base that was operated by Sumiko Ozawa and Takahiro Omuro.

G-Trailer Design:

Trailer Cockpit („Éà„É¨„Éº„É©„Éº„Ç≥„ÇØ„Éî„ÉÉ„Éà, TorƒìrƒÅ Kokupitto) - The cockpit. It can seat 3 people, 1 driver and 2 passengers.
G3-System Locker (G3„Ç∑„Çπ„ÉÜ„É†„É≠„ÉÉ„Ç´„Éº, G3 Shisutemu RokkƒÅ) - Space to store and charge Kamen Rider G3's batteries.
Guard Chaser Hanger („Ç¨„Éº„Éâ„ÉÅ„Çß„Ç§„Çµ„Éº„Éè„É≥„Ç¨„Éº, GƒÅdo CheisƒÅ HangƒÅ) - Place to maintain the Guard Chaser's tires.
Rear Hatch (ÂæåÈÉ®„Éè„ÉÉ„ÉÅ, K≈çbu Hatchi) - Area to deploy the Guard Chaser.

1.name: Hyper-timeline
1.content:
The Hyper-Timeline is a collection of different universes, each governed by a Supreme Kai and a God of Destruction. There are an infinite number of Hyper-Timelines, each one branching from a different probability/choice creating alternative timelines where events unfolded differently in the Hyperverse. Generally, a single Timeline constitutes of 12 Universes.
Each universe is paired with another as twins, where the sum of their numbers equals 13, such as Universe 6 and 7, sharing similar origins but diverging in history. This pairing is evident in their shared races, like Saiyans in both Universe 6 and 7, but with different evolutionary paths.
Universe	Supreme Kai	God of Destruction	Key Characteristics
1	Anato	Iwan	High mortal level, advanced civilizations, exempt from erasure due to prosperity.
2	Pell	Heles	Focus on love and beauty, known for theatrical fighters like the Kamikaze Fireballs.
3	Eyre	Mule (Mosco)	Emphasis on technology, with cyborg and modified fighters.
4	Kuru	Quitela	Known for cunning and deception, with sneaky combat strategies.
5	Ogma	Arak	High mortal level, likely balanced and prosperous, details scarce.
6	Fuwa	Champa	Twin of Universe 7, features Saiyans and Namekians, home to fighters like Hit.
7	Shin	Beerus	Main setting, includes Earth, Z-Fighters, diverse planets, and rich history.
8	Iru	Liquiir	High mortal level, presumed order and progress, limited specific details.
9	Ro	Sidra	Low mortal level, chaotic, harsh environment, fighters like Trio de Dangers.
10	Gowasu	Rumsshi	Focus on physical strength, fighters like Obuni showcase martial prowess.
11	Khai	Belmod	Home to Pride Troopers, emphasis on justice, led by Toppo and Jiren.
12	Agu	Giin (Geene)	Highest mortal level, advanced, ancient knowledge, exempt from erasure.

2.name: [Faction] Kaioshin/Gods
2.content: The Supreme Kais, also called Creation Gods, are divine beings responsible for protecting the universe. They, along with Gods of Destruction, oversee the universes. Supreme Kaio≈´ possess immense powers and reside on the Sacred World of the Kai. Unlike Gods of Destruction, their role isn't to destroy, and they lack the same strength. Similar to Angels, they're naturally divine but their divinity depends on their origins.

3.name: [Place] Planet Earth
3.content: Earth is a planet, home to Earthlings, Son Goku and his family and friends. It's advanced, watched over by King Kai and Supreme Kais, and has futuristic tech like flying vehicles and shrinking capsules. Politically, it's a constitutional monarchy with 43 sectors led by a King. The currency is Zeni, and years are counted by "Ages." Despite powerful characters like the Z Fighters, many believe Mr. Satan is the strongest due to his deception. Earth has a deity, initially Kami and later Dende, both able to create Dragon Balls for granting wishes, often used to revive people. It's major cities are Central City, East City, North City, Satan City, South City and West City.

4.name: Earth's history
4.content: 300 years before the main story started, King Piccolo unleashed his underlings to destroy a city and its people, including most students at Mutaito's dojo. Only Master Roshi, Master Shen, and Mutaito survived. Mutaito later sealed Piccolo away but at the cost of many lives. Throughout the series, Earth faces numerous threats. Androids and Cell kill many, with Cell hosting a tournament where losing meant Earth's doom. Majin Buu destroys cities, and Kid Buu annihilates the planet.

5.name: Planet Vegeta
5.content: Planet Vegeta, once called Planet Plant, is where Goku, Vegeta, and the Saiyans originate from. Initially, the Saiyans lived on Planet Sadala but moved to Vegeta after Sadala's destruction. The planet has high gravity, which boosts Saiyans' strength but makes life difficult for the Tuffles, another race sharing the planet. A war erupted between the Saiyans and Tuffles around Age 720. Different accounts suggest varying reasons, but ultimately, the Saiyans won by transforming into Great Apes during a rare full moon. They took control, renaming the planet after their king. Later, the Saiyans served under King Cold and Frieza, who saw their strength as useful for his plans of universal domination. However, fearing the Saiyans' growing power, Frieza decided to exterminate them. Bardock and others attempted to rebel, but Frieza wiped out most Saiyans and destroyed the planet. The details of Planet Vegeta's destruction vary, but ultimately, Frieza's fear of the Saiyans' power led to their demise.

6.name: Planet Namek
6.content: Namek is a planet, home to the Nameless Namekian, Dende, and other Namekians. It was destroyed by Frieza in Age 762 but the Namekians resettled on New Namek. The planet has three suns, causing perpetual daylight. Namek's year is short, at 130 days. The Namekians have a peaceful civilization and created their own Dragon Balls. A climate disaster once wiped out most Namekians, but Guru and others survived. During the Namek Saga, Frieza attacked, leading to the planet's destruction. Surviving Namekians were relocated to Earth temporarily before settling on New Namek.

7.name: Saiyans
7.content:
The Saiyans are a warrior race from the Dragon Ball series. They are aggressive and were nearly wiped out by Frieza. Goku, the protagonist, is a Saiyan sent to conquer Earth. They are named after vegetables and hail from Planet Sadala, with immense strength due to its high gravity. Saiyans prioritize strength and power, dividing into upper and lower classes based on power levels. They live violent lives, conquering planets for wealth. Saiyans joined Frieza's army, fearing their growing power. Frieza destroyed Planet Vegeta, nearly exterminating the Saiyans.
Saiyans have a special ability tied to their tails: transforming into a giant ape with immense power when exposed to a full moon. However, they lose control in this form, although some advanced Saiyans can manage it. Saiyans can achieve Super Saiyan forms, enhancing their speed, strength, and energy drastically. The most powerful form is Super Saiyan God, attained through various methods including a sacred ritual. This form grants godly ki and enhances normal forms. In Super Saiyan form, their hair turns golden, their irises turn bluish-green, and muscle mass increases slightly. Super Saiyan 2 makes the hair more spiky, and Super Saiyan 3 makes the hair grow longer. Additionally, in Super Saiyan God, the hair becomes red.

8.name: Legendary Saiyan
8.content: Legendary Saiyans are a rare type of Saiyan, appearing only once every 1,000 years. They are born with immense power and are considered demonic mutants. Unlike regular Saiyans, they can't transform into typical forms, but they have their own transformation called Legendary Super Saiyan. This transformation makes them incredibly strong, with increased muscle mass and savage behavior. Notable examples include Broly, whose hair turns spike and lime green in this form.

9.name: Saiyan physiology
9.content: Saiyans, human-like in appearance, possess enhanced strength, speed, and senses, with longer lifespans than humans. Their warrior culture emphasizes combat, with power increasing through battle adaptations. Tails enable Great Ape transformation but can be removed; hybrids may or may not inherit tails. They have immense appetites to fuel strength and transformations like Super Saiyan. Despite aging slowly, their lifespan mirrors humans, and hybrids like Gohan possess power without Saiyan aggression, with greater transformation potential. Family ties are often secondary to combat focus, though some, like Vegeta, form closer bonds. Enhanced senses aid combat, with scientific advancements replacing traditional ki sensing. Saiyans transform under a full moon, with tails as their weakness. Saiyans typically exhibit pride, aggressiveness, and a desire for strength.

10.name: Namekians
10.content: Namekians, also known as Nameks, are a race from Planet Namek. They have green skin, slug-like features, and the ability to create their own Dragon Balls. They possess heightened senses, such as exceptional hearing and sensitivity to certain sounds. Namekians can survive on just water but still enjoy eating food. They exhibit various magical abilities like regeneration, body flexibility, and the power to draw out dormant potential in others. They can also perform fusion and fission, manipulate souls, and demonstrate telekinesis and telepathy.

1.name: Gaslighting
1.content: One method of manipulation involves making someone doubt their own reality or perception, often by denying facts, lying, or contradicting their experiences.

2.name: Guilt-tripping
2.content: Manipulators use guilt to control others, often by making them feel responsible for the manipulator's emotions or problems.

3.name: Love Bombing
3.content: Love bombing can be used to manipulate someone by overwhelming them with affection and attention to gain control or influence over them. This is typically followed by periods of coldness or withdrawal to maintain desire.

4.name: Negging
4.content: Undermining someone's self-esteem, with backhanded compliments or subtle insults, makes them more vulnerable to manipulation.

5.name: Isolation
5.content: Cutting off someone's connections with others, making them more dependent on the manipulator for social interaction and support, is a common form of manipulation.

6.name: Fearmongering
6.content: Fear can be used to influence and manipulate someone's decisions, often by exaggerating risks or consequences.

7.name: Playing the Victim
7.content: Manipulators portray themselves as a victim of circumstances, or others' actions, to gain sympathy and avoid responsibility.

8.name: Triangulation
8.content: Triangulation involves bringing a third person into the dynamics of the relationship, often to create competition, insecurity, or to validate the manipulator‚Äôs perspective.

9.name: Silent Treatment
9.content: Withholding communication or affection to punish or control the other person is a common form of manipulation.

10.name: False Promises
10.content: Offering something desirable without any intention of following through can be used to manipulate, to maintain control, or keep someone engaged.

1.content:
Age	19
Occupation	R≈çnin College Student (formerly)
College Student (as of Chapter 184)

New Director of the New Sekirei Project (as of Sekirei - 365 Days Without Her's epilogue)
Height	173 cm
Weight	59 kg
Gender	 Male Male
Birthday	Sep / 15
Family	Sahashi Yukari (Sister)
Minaka Hiroto (Father)
Sahashi Takami (Mother)
Musubi (First Wife)
